Company: HEINEKEN Vietnam
Job Description: Manage the spare parts store and related activities in a safe manner. Lead to implement safety improvement activities, act immediately when unsafe behaviour occurs, stop unsafe behaviours and report high-risk activities and give feedback to the relevant people. Ensure critical spare parts (e.g. flowmeters, temperature transmitter, pressure transmitter, PLC) related to inspection machines or quality defects and master calibration tools have to be stored in the proper environment. Manage the spare parts store in accordance with the supply and inventory work processes (receiving, issuing, reconciliation and 5S). Manage & organise stock cycle counting following procedures and escalate to promptly resolve discrepancies between physical stock and stock data. Cooperate and align with procurement and planning about required and to-be-ordered parts and services; i.e. proper executing of the supply work process. Cooperate with procurement team to ensure spare parts and services supplies are delivered OTIF and effectively Manage coordination and alignment regarding handovers between the planning team and the maintenance execution team; both from handing over to execution and/or receiving returned materials from the execution team. Coordinate and align between maintenance planners and maintenance technicians; i.e. ensure proper spare segmentation and proper MRP (Material Resource Planning)-settings are in place and further reduce costs. Conduct Tagging if required or appropriate. Ensure that Spare Part Management reports and KPIs are monitored monthly on CMMS systems and SPM dashboard Manage material catalogue and technical document system Centralize manages asset drawings, documents, permits (licenses), warranties. Keep the spare parts stores well organized and clean through applying 5S methodology and using good visual management (VM). Manage the MRP data and ensure the settings are up to date. Manage the material catalogue data and ensure it is up to date. Manage the spare segmentation data and ensure it is up to date. Report to the Maintenance Team Leader.
Job Requirements: Preferably Bachelor's degree in Technical field: Mechatronic or Mechanical. At least 3 years of experience in an electrical and mechanical warehouse, repair center, dealership, or similar facility highly preferred. English proficiency: able to read and understand technical documents in English. Basic understanding of automotive parts and mechanical systems. Basic mathematical skills to develop and maintain invoices and inventories. Strong IT Skills including MS-Office Applications (MS-Outlook, MS-Word, MS-Excel, MS-Powerpoint). Implement digital & technology solutions to collect and manage spare parts master data (e.g. Maximo, BCS, PowerBI, Paperless...). Enthusiastic, dynamic and result oriented. Adaptable to new process / procedures. Ability to work as a team. Ability to work independently to meet deadlines. Good Communication Skills. Good knowledge of Technical spare part controlling (Store keeping).

The four major KPIs include: o Timely receipt rate o Timely delivery rate o Inventory accuracy rate o Delivery accuracy rate • Oversee safety, 5S (Sort, Set in order, Shine, Standardize, Sustain), inventory checks, and ensure standardized operations at the warehouse managed by third parties. • Monitor third-party efficiency, personnel attrition rate, and changes in core management personnel. • Maintain close communication with regional warehouse management and corresponding professional line management at the headquarters to issue and train on system requirements. • Identify opportunities for process optimization, lead pilot summaries of on-site operational micro-innovations, and provide feedback. • Cooperate with the management department to verify expense settlement data. • Check monthly expense settlements with third-party vendors. 2. Job Description: According to the monthly target issued by the headquarters, track the performance and grasp the daily turnover data of the city stores to ensure the sales target is achieved. Responsible for the selection, employment, training and team capacity building of store employees, supervise and implement the company's standards and systems, and summarize, feedback and make optimization suggestions in a timely manner. According to the operation standards, strictly implement the operation procedures of each store in the city to provide consumers with a comfortable shopping environment. Monitor the store's daily inventory and product expiration dates and other inventory management tasks in real time, and formulate loss prevention and theft prevention plans to reduce store losses. Regularly inspect stores as required by the company, audit store product data, ensure accuracy and authenticity (warehouse entry and exit, inventory, etc.), report any abnormalities in a timely manner, ensure the accuracy of store data, and assist stores in solving on-site problems (engineering/weak current/safety). Inspect and manage merchandise display according to display standards, supervise store display execution and problem feedback. Improve the safety management awareness of all store staff in cities, and make safety management requirements for special store equipment such as cash registers, fire equipment, and monitoring equipment. At the same time, all store staff are required to work in a standardized manner to reduce the occurrence of work-related injuries. Understand and convey the company's brand concept and company development vision, monitor public opinion in real time, and maintain the brand image.
Job Requirements: College degree or above, with English or Chinese skills for daily communication preferred. More than 3 years of retail terminal business experience, single store management experience in the apparel retail industry, basic understanding and implementation experience of store sales management, performance improvement, personnel management, and product management. Have basic experience in identifying people and cultivating work experience, be good at summarizing experience, have experience in formulating teaching plans and replicating and promoting them, and empower the team. Have strong execution ability, can effectively convey the requirements of superiors, and implement the tasks undertaken in a timely manner; can solve and feedback problems in a timely and effective manner. Priority will be given to candidates with strong data sensitivity and the ability to effectively control losses; candidates who can obey the company's cross-regional/national transfers and identify with the company's corporate culture and values.

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH GALAXY DIGITAL HOLDINGS
Job Description: Conduct periodic (daily, weekly, monthly, annually) and ad-hoc reconciliations with partners and vendors to ensure the accuracy of loyalty point and payment transactions. Extract, collect, clean, and analyse data from multiple sources to identify, investigate, and resolve discrepancies; work cross-functionally with internal teams and external partners to address issues and prevent recurrence. Ensure all reconciliation activities are completed within defined service level agreements (SLAs) to support downstream financial operations such as invoicing and payment collection. Prepare and manage reconciliation reports; handle both physical and digital documentation, including printing, obtaining approvals, dispatching, receiving, and archiving. Serve as the primary point of contact for reconciliation-related matters with both new and existing partners. This includes developing and improving reconciliation workflows, providing guidance, facilitating discussions, and contributing to the drafting and review of relevant contractual terms. Identify opportunities for continuous process optimisation; support the development and implementation of tools and automation solutions to enhance reconciliation efficiency and accuracy. Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation; keep detailed records of discrepancies, adjustments, and resolutions to support audit and compliance requirements. Ensure alignment with internal policies and procedures. Prepare reconciliation summaries for management, highlighting key metrics, outstanding issues, and corrective actions taken. Assist partners with ad-hoc requests within the agreed scope of support between Galaxy Joy and our partners. Undertake other duties as assigned by management in support of the Operations team’s goals.
Job Requirements: Education & Work Experience: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience in reconciliation, finance operations, data analysis, or a similar role - preferably in loyalty, fintech, or e-commerce industries. Proficiency in Excel (or similar data processing tools) and SQL (or equivalent data query languages). Familiarity with financial operations, billing processes, and payment workflows is an advantage. Skills & Personal Attributes: Exceptional attention to detail and a high degree of accuracy in all work. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret and manipulate large datasets. Proactive problem-solving mindset with the ability to identify root causes and implement solutions. Effective communication skills in both written and spoken English and Vietnamese. Disciplined in following established processes with a continuous improvement mindset. Reliable in delivering results on time with minimal supervision. Strong work ethic and the ability to handle confidential information/documents. Confident and assertive, with strong organizational and time management skills.
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Job Description: 1. Data Center (DC/DR) Infrastructure Management & Operation: Design, deploy, manage, and operate all server systems (physical, virtualized with Hyper-V & VMware), operating systems (Linux & Windows), centralized data storage (SAN, NAS), and IT infrastructure devices across On-premise and Cloud Data Centers. Ensure High Availability (HA), performance, and scalability. Perform maintenance, optimize solutions, and troubleshoot complex issues. 2. Platform & Cloud Service Management & Operation: Responsible for designing, deploying, operating, and optimizing core platform services (Web Servers, Mail Service, DHCP, DNS, AD, CA). Comprehensively manage and operate Microsoft 365 services (Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, Teams, OneDrive, Security & Compliance Center), including account management, licensing, security policies (MFA, Conditional Access, DLP), and synchronization (Azure AD Connect). Advise on optimizing Cloud service (AWS, Azure) licensing and resource costs. 3. CCTV Systems: Ensure image quality, recording capability, storage, and remote access. Troubleshoot camera-related issues and coordinate with relevant departments. 4. Backup & Disaster Recovery (DR) Plan Development & Monitoring : Lead the development, execution, and monitoring of backup and disaster recovery plans for all server systems, centralized data storage, and critical applications. Organize and conduct regular DR drills to meet RPO and RTO objectives. 5. Operational Documentation Development & Monitoring: Directly develop and oversee the quarterly review and update of processes and operational guidelines for server systems, centralized data storage, and platform services, including SOPs and troubleshooting guides.
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree or higher in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related fields. Minimum 5 years of experience in operating, managing, and deploying large-scale IT infrastructure systems in DC/DR. At least 1 year of direct experience managing and operating Microsoft 365 (Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, Teams, OneDrive for Business, Azure AD Connect, Security & Compliance Center). Solid experience in deploying, operating, and managing Data Center (DC) and Disaster Recovery (DR) sites. Practical experience in managing and operating server systems (Windows Server, Linux), virtualization platforms (VMware vSphere, Hyper-V), SAN/NAS storage systems, and Backup & Recovery solutions. Prior experience with Cloud Computing (AWS, Azure) is a plus. Technical Knowledge: Profound knowledge of enterprise IT infrastructure architecture (servers, storage, networking, security), HA, DR, and BCP solutions. Deep understanding of server operating systems (Linux, Windows Server), virtualization technologies (Hyper-V, VMware), network services (DNS, DHCP, VPN, VLAN, Routing Protocols), and Microsoft 365/Azure AD services and policies. Ability to script (PowerShell, Bash, Python) and knowledge of system monitoring tools. Soft Skills: Leadership, delegation, monitoring, and team coaching. Excellent design thinking, critical thinking, problem analysis, and complex problem-solving skills. Professional, clear, and articulate communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Ability to work independently and effectively in a multidisciplinary environment. Highly responsible, meticulous, careful, and proactive. Quick adaptability to new technologies and changing work environments. Certifications (Preferred): Microsoft Certified (MCSA, MCSE, Azure Administrator Associate, M365 Administrator Expert), VMware Certified Professional, Cisco Certified (CCNA, CCNP).

Job Description: 1. Business Planning & Strategy Collaborate in developing medium- and long-term business strategies to align with the company’s vision and objectives. Develop business models and identify key factors influencing growth and profitability. Propose strategic initiatives to enhance operational efficiency and optimize products/services. Conduct market analysis, competitor benchmarking, and industry trend assessments to provide strategic forecasts and recommendations. 2. Target Planning Develop annual, quarterly, and monthly revenue targets at different levels: Company, retail channels, branches, and brands. Advise and support departments in setting, allocating, and adjusting business targets for each phase. Monitor business performance, analyze variances between planned and actual results, identify risks, and recommend timely adjustments for execution at company, brand, and branch levels. Define KPIs and methods for measuring business performance, prepare periodic performance reports for brands/branches. 3. Data & Technology Applications in Business Strategy Utilize data analysis tools (Advanced Excel, Power BI/Tableau, Python/R, SQL,...) to collect, process, and visualize business data. Automate reporting and analytical processes to enhance operational efficiency and decision-making support. 4. Strategic Initiatives Development & Execution Participate in key strategic projects of the company, providing consulting and implementation support. Identify new growth opportunities and propose plans for market expansion and product/service development. Collaborate with various departments (Sales, Marketing, Finance, Operations...) to ensure effective and aligned strategy execution.
Job Requirements: 1. Qualifications & Experience Bachelor’s degree or higher in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, or related fields. Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in Business Strategy, Business Planning, Business Analysis, or equivalent roles. Experience working in multinational corporations, large enterprises, or industries such as finance, banking, or in the jewelry industry is a plus. 2. Technical Skills Strong knowledge of business strategy, business models, and financial analysis. Proficiency in data analytics tools: Advanced Excel, Power BI/Tableau, Python/R, SQL. Ability to analyze, synthesize data, and present strategic reports. Experience in financial planning methods and business forecasting. Understanding market trends, industry dynamics, customer behavior, and business operations factors. 3. Soft Skills Strategic thinking, problem-solving, and quick decision-making abilities. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to present reports to senior management. Ability to work independently, proactively, and under high pressure. Strong teamwork skills and the ability to collaborate across departments for effective strategy execution. Job Description: Job Purpose The Underwriting Senior Expert will play a key role in the setup phase of a new life insurance company, focusing on developing underwriting guidelines, integrating data-driven risk assessment models, and enhancing the underwriting experience for customers. This role will require close collaboration with reinsurance partners, the product development team, IT, distribution teams at Techcombank, and third-party medical service providers. The Underwriting Senior Expert will also drive the integration of underwriting processes with Techcombank’s data ecosystem to create a seamless, efficient, and innovative underwriting experience. Key Responsibilities Underwriting Strategy & Guideline Development - Develop and implement underwriting guidelines that align with business strategy, regulatory requirements, and market trends. - Work closely with reinsurance companies to refine underwriting principles and establish risk selection criteria. - Collaborate with product development teams to design innovative underwriting solutions for new life insurance products. Collaboration with Techcombank & Distribution Teams - Engage with Techcombank’s distribution teams to understand customer risk profiles, sales needs, and underwriting support requirements. - Analyze customer financial and health risk data from the bank to tailor underwriting criteria to different customer segments. - Ensure underwriting processes align with the needs of bancassurance and agency distribution models. IT & Data Integration for Underwriting Innovation - Define business requirements for IT teams to develop underwriting platforms, automation tools, and AI-driven risk assessment models. - Oversee the integration of customer data between Techcombank and the insurance company to enable pre-approved underwriting and seamless customer onboarding. - Implement automated underwriting (AUW) systems to enhance efficiency and reduce manual underwriting efforts. Collaboration with Third-Party Medical Service Providers - Work with panel doctors, clinics, and third-party medical service providers to establish efficient medical underwriting procedures. - Develop partnerships with external underwriting engines and digital health platforms to expand underwriting capabilities. - Ensure that medical examination processes are seamless, reducing friction for customers while maintaining high-quality risk assessment. Process Optimization & Customer Experience Enhancement - Develop SOPs and workflows for underwriting operations, ensuring best practices are in place from the company's inception. - Identify opportunities to streamline underwriting processes and improve turnaround times. - Ensure a balance between risk management and an enhanced customer experience by minimizing delays and unnecessary medical requirements. Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement - Define and track key underwriting performance indicators (KPIs), such as approval rates, processing times, and risk quality. - Implement underwriting audit programs to ensure compliance with company policies and regulatory requirements. - Continuously analyze underwriting outcomes and recommend improvements based on data insights.
Job Requirements: Education - Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Insurance, Actuarial Science, or a related field. - Advanced certifications such as Fellow, Life Management Institute (FLMI), Fellow, Academy of Life Underwriting (FALU), or Chartered Life Underwriter (CLU) are preferred. Experience - Minimum of 7-10 years of life insurance underwriting experience, with strong expertise in medical and financial underwriting. - Experience in setting up underwriting processes, defining guidelines, and implementing automated underwriting models. - Proven ability to work with reinsurance companies to develop underwriting policies and obtain facultative support. - Experience collaborating with IT teams to implement digital underwriting tools and AI-based risk assessment models. - Exposure to bancassurance and an understanding of financial risk profiles within banking ecosystems. Skills & Competencies - Underwriting Strategy & Risk Assessment – Strong ability to develop underwriting principles that balance risk and business growth. - Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge – Deep understanding of Vietnam’s insurance regulations and their application in underwriting. - IT & Data Integration – Experience in defining business requirements for IT teams to build underwriting platforms and automation solutions. - Third-Party Collaboration – Strong negotiation and relationship management skills to work with reinsurance firms, medical service providers, and underwriting technology partners. - Process Optimization & SOP Development – Ability to design workflows and SOPs for efficient underwriting operations. - Data-Driven Decision Making – Expertise in utilizing financial and medical data to drive underwriting enhancements. - Stakeholder Management – Strong communication and leadership skills to work effectively with distribution teams, product development, and IT teams. Personal Attributes - Analytical & Detail-Oriented – Ability to assess complex underwriting cases with accuracy and precision. - Innovative & Strategic Thinker – Ability to develop next-generation underwriting solutions that drive competitive advantage. - Customer-Centric Mindset – Ensures underwriting processes enhance the customer experience while maintaining risk control. - Proactive & Agile – Thrives in a fast-paced startup environment, leading initiatives with minimal supervision. - Leadership & Initiative – Capable of setting up underwriting operations and driving process improvements from day one.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Bảo hiểm , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Job Title: Strategic Business Assistant (Executive Assistant to MD)
Company: Công ty TNHH Olam Việt Nam
Job Description: ofi (olam food ingredients), part of the Olam Group, offers sustainable, natural food products and ingredients, including cocoa, coffee, dairy, nuts, and spices. Operating in Vietnam since 1997, ofi has built a strong presence with its head office in Ho Chi Minh City, along with regional offices and seven major factories across various provinces. As the largest exporter of cashews, pepper, and instant coffee, and among the top exporters of green coffee, ofi Vietnam works closely with a vast network of farmers. With over 4,500 employees, the company is committed to performance, diversity, and talent development. Its ‘ Choices for Change’ strategy targets long-term impact by 2030, focusing on prosperous farmers, thriving communities, climate action, and sustainability. JOB IN SUMMARY We are looking for a highly intelligent, agile, and analytical individual to become the Strategic Business Assistant to the Vietnam’s CEO (MD). This manager-level executive assistant role offers deep exposure to business and operations support across multiple geographies and functions. This is a high-trust position suited for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, high-stakes environment and can adapt to new challenges with maturity, discretion, and business acumen. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 1/ Business Data & Strategic Analysis Consolidate and analyze business data across functions and geographies. Extract insights from operational, financial, and commercial datasets to support strategic decisions. 2/ Delegation & Information Management Attend and summarize key meetings, streamline information, synthesize discussions into clear, actionable summaries. Act as a trusted filter of information to streamline the Leader’s priorities. Manage delegated tasks with high ownership and follow-through. 3/ Stakeholder Communication & Coordination Communicate and collaborate with key internal and external stakeholders across functions and regions. Coordinate cross-functional and cross-country interactions smoothly and professionally. Maintain strong follow-up systems to ensure alignment and timely execution of priorities. 4/ Business Tools, Reporting & Presentations Ensure accuracy and consistency of data across reporting platforms. Create sharp, executive-level presentations and reports for internal and external use. 5/ Market & Strategic Project Support Conduct market and competitive research to support potential new ventures and expansion opportunities. Support special projects, business development initiatives, and project management tasks as needed. 6/ Be a flexible, dependable resource to the MD for both strategic and operational matters.
Job Requirements: EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS Young talented with 3 - 5 years of relevant experience in business analysis, consulting, strategy, or executive support. Strong analytical and data-handling capabilities across varied data sources. Experience working across full ecosystems, with internal stakeholders and cross-professional collaboration Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills. Strategic thinker with high adaptability, emotional intelligence, and people sensitivity. Demonstrated discretion in handling confidential information Mobility: Willingness to travel for business and market visits as needed. This role will provide high visibility and exposure for a proactive self-starter with the ability to manage change, drive multiple priorities. You will be mentored directly by the MD and play a pivotal role in shaping business and operations. Our Purpose is to “be the change for good food and a healthy future”. At ofi , we celebrate our diversity. ofi provides equality of opportunity for all persons with respect to hiring without discrimination on the grounds of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, pregnancy, age, disability, veteran status, or sexual orientation. All employment decisions will be based on qualifications, merit, and business needs.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Ngành khác

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH GALAXY DIGITAL HOLDINGS
Job Description: Job Overview The Sr. Software Engineer, Genesys Cloud Systems will be responsible for delivering expert-level support for CCaaS (Contact Center as a Service) solutions to Galaxy Connect clients within a managed services environment. This role requires extensive experience in contact center services support, coupled with deep proficiency in at least one leading CCaaS platform such as Amazon Connect, Genesys Cloud CX, Google CCAI, or NICE CXone. As a key member of our support team, you will provide comprehensive administration, troubleshooting, incident management, and proactive support to our external clients. This is a direct client-facing role, demanding a seasoned professional adept at providing application support for CCaaS platforms, messaging platforms, and other cloud or hosted applications as a service. You will serve as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) across multiple CCaaS and messaging platforms, offering both platform operations and support expertise. As a Senior Contact Center and Software Engineer, you will handle direct support, escalation, and resolution for incidents of all severities. You will also be responsible for maintaining accurate client relationship information and Support Desk runbooks, including contacts, processes, and procedures. Regular feedback sessions and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs) with clients are essential for maintaining strong client relationships and driving high CSAT scores. This role is critical for ensuring the continuous support of our contracted managed services clients, maintaining high availability, enhancing CSAT scores, and driving sales growth within existing accounts. Key Responsibilities Provide expert-level technical support for CCaaS platforms, resolving complex issues and ensuring optimal performance. Design, configure, and manage cloud contact center processes, including application modifications, workflow adjustments, policy updates, and system integrations (DID numbers/IVR, skill-based routing). Serve as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in at least one major CCaaS platform (Amazon Connect, Genesys Cloud CX, Google CCAI, NICE CXone). Manage incident resolution, escalation processes, and follow-through to ensure timely and effective problem resolution. Maintain accurate client relationship information and Support Desk runbooks. Conduct regular feedback sessions and QBR meetings with clients to ensure satisfaction and identify areas for improvement. Monitor and analyze operational KPIs, interpret platform reports, and identify opportunities for optimization. Evaluate reporting needs and implement custom reporting solutions as required. Ensure adherence to best practices in solution design, security, and data protection, integrating with core client systems. Integrate AI solutions. Implement AI into existing software systems to enhance functionality and user experience. Conduct software/call center solution testing and support User Acceptance Testing (UAT). Contribute to the development and maintenance of solution requirements. Understand and support the needs and requirements to run a successful contact center solution.
Job Requirements: Proven experience in contact center processes and technologies. Strong understanding of IVR, channel flow scripts, CRMs, telecommunications, and skill-based routing. Experience with agent scripting, workforce management, and quality management. Proficiency in interpreting and explaining platform reports and operational KPIs. Hands-on experience with at least one leading CCaaS platform (Amazon Connect, Genesys Cloud CX, Google CCAI, NICE CXone). Hands-on experience in AI development, data analysis, and machine learning techniques. Strong understanding of call center business operations. Excellent problem-solving, communication, and client-facing skills. Proficiency in programming languages like Python, Java, and TensorFlow; Ability to follow best practices in solutioning and security/data protection and integrate with core system client. Experience in conducting software/call center solution testing and supporting UAT.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: Under minimal direction, the IIoT engineer serves as a liaison between New Technology Development and Operations. The IIoT engineer is responsible to lead the design, development and delivery of integration system, data connectivity, supervisory and data acquisition system (or SCADA), digitalization solution to support production strategy and production roadmap. This position facilitates the modernization initiatives with Process Engineering and Manufacturing teams to successfully launch new products, on time and on budget. This role is a fundamental part of our Manufacturing engineering team located in a fast-paced manufacturing environment. We are looking for a self-motivated individual with proven integrated system design experience, passion in new technology application, as well as someone who exhibits the drive for continuous improvement. 1. IIoT Project Management: - Attend improvement meetings, work with the Operations Team to develop action plans for new IIoT solution, system integration, data connectivity and scheduling needs. - Coordinate development plan and follow up actions, including but not limited to design, prototyping, trialing and pilot run. - Develop and maintain Gantt Charts, Project Schedule, Risk Assessment, and Contingency plans - Develop agendas to facilitate and document project meetings, and update project status to leadership. - Manage suppliers of capital solutions regarding cost, timing and budget of each project. 2. IIoT Technology Development - Have ability to conduct research, development, and implementation of new IIoT technologies , IIoT platforms and IIoT equipment/devices to improve manufacturing visibility, reduce cost, improve quality, reliability and stability. - Have ability to build real prototypes to confirm feasibility as well as implementation time/cost estimates and test proposed implementation processes. - Conduct system testing and buy-off as well as data validation. - Have capability to use CAD to design an embedded/ integration system, or electrical schematics. - Have capability to use PLC, HMI, computer-based and cellphone-based language to program automatic equipment, integration system. 3. Analysis and Continuous Improvement - Possess a systematic as well as creative approach to problem solving process - Assist with risk assessment analysis, Kaizen activities, visual management, 5S... - Understand well financial impacts of problem and solution - Perform a wide variety of calculations and analysis using software.
Job Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in Automation Control Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering - Minimum two years related experience in design and implementation of IIoT Integrated System (most preferable), data connectivity, digitalization solution in manufacturing or an equivalent industrial environment - Minimum one-year project management experience. - Experience in Industrial Embedded System, Integrated Control System, and/or SCADA system. Specialty in Software and Electrical Design, IIoT and Digitalization. - CAD Proficient with electrical schematics design ability. - Programming Proficiency Automation System, IIoT, Factory Automation (PLC, HMI, C#/Python) - From intermediate English skills in both written and verbal communication. - Being eager to learn, willing to promote innovative course by the ability to develop agile decision-making and grasp technical concepts quickly. - Self-starter with sense of urgency, a team player with excellent communication skills.
Industry: Cơ khí / Ô tô / Tự động hóa , Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: De Heus LLC
Job Description: REPORT TO: Asia IT Solution Architect Specialist JOB PURPOSE: - The Integration and Deployment Specialist develops, implements, and maintains integration solutions, plan and execute software deployments to ensure smooth data flow between systems and stable releases in production environments. The role involves collaborating with development and project teams to understand requirements, troubleshoot issues, and optimize processes. ACCOUNTATBILITIES: 1. Integration development Analyze business and technical requirements to design scalable, secure, and reliable integration solutions. Build and maintain integrations across applications, databases, and third-party systems using APIs, middleware, ETL tools, and other technologies. Implement data mapping, transformation, and synchronization processes to ensure accurate and timely data exchange Develop custom scripts and tailored solutions for complex integration scenarios, including support for testing and validation. 2. Deployment Planning and Execution Plan, coordinate, and execute software and system deployments across 3rd party development company and De Heus. Develop comprehensive deployment plans, including runbooks and rollback procedures, to ensure smooth and low-risk transitions Corporate with supplier to rollouts by orchestrating timing, sequencing, and stakeholder communication. Enforce compliance with security standards and internal procedures throughout the deployment lifecycle 3. Monitoring and Troubleshooting Continuously monitor the performance of integrations and deployed systems to identify bottlenecks and areas for optimization Proactively troubleshoot and resolve integration issues and deployment failures to minimize downtime and service disruption. Provide timely technical support to users experiencing post-deployment issues, ensuring smooth operational continuity 4. Documentation and Communication Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for integration architectures, deployment procedures, system configurations, and best practices. Clearly communicate project progress, updates, and any identified risks or delays to both internal and external stakeholders Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams including developers, business analysts, project managers to ensure alignment and successful delivery. RESULTS: Well-architected integration designs that align with business goals and technical constraints Accurate, real-time data exchange across platforms Tailored solutions that address unique business needs and edge cases Smooth, predictable software and system rollouts across all environments. Well-timed and well-communicated releases. Deployments that meet internal and external security standards Early detection of performance bottlenecks and system inefficiencies Rapid identification and resolution of integration and deployment failures. Timely assistance for users encountering issues after deployment Clear, accessible records of system architecture, configurations, and procedures. Timely updates and transparency on project status, risks, and milestones.
Job Requirements: QUALIFICATION: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience. EXPERIENCES: 03 years of experience in system integration, software development, or a similar role. Proven experience in designing, developing, and deploying complex integration solutions. Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, JavaScript, or C#. Hands-on experience with integration tools and platforms (e.g., RabbitMQ, Apache Kafka, Middle layer, or other tools). Strong understanding of API design and management (REST, SOAP, API Gateways). Experience with ETL tools and data integration methodologies. Familiarity with various databases (SQL, NoSQL) and data modeling concepts Understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies. COMPETENCIES: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills Strong attention to detail and a focus on accuracy Good communication and interpersonal abilities Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to manage multiple priorities. A willingness to change and learn new technologies LANGUAGE: English: Fluent (reading, writing, listening, verbal, presentation) OTHERS: Willing to travel based on scope request Certifications in relevant integration platforms or cloud technologies Experience with specific industry-standard ERP, CRM, HRM and devices related to animal feed systems Knowledge of network and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY This position will lead a team in Milwaukee HT Vietnam factory, take charge of In-Process Quality Control, Outgoing Quality Control and Process Quality Support. Work closely with all cross functional teams to drive for customer satisfaction and continuous improvement. KEY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES - Manage the process of In-Process Quality Control and Outgoing Quality Control, ensure all products meet internal / external quality standards. - Support manufacturing process improvement, failure analysis, non-conformance disposition, ensure quick investigation and effective Corrective / Preventive Actions are in place. - Set up proper processes for IPQC and OQC including but not limited to prepare checkcard, sampling plan, process audit, non-conforming product disposition, data collecting system (Critical Features, DPPM, Data Analysis), etc. - Coordinate customer returns or complaints to drive effective preventive actions and verify effectiveness of error avoidance and sustainability - Maintain and optimize IPQC, OQC and PQE management system (SOP, OI / WI) according to ISO9001. - Ensure team staffs are well trained with needed skills to perform required functions. - Work closely with cross functional team to meet delivery schedules and production goals, while actively maintaining the expected level of quality
Job Requirements: Education College above of Engineering in Mechanical/Chemical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Electrical/Electronic Engineering or Science Experience Minimum 3 year experience in quality field Knowledge - 7 QC tools - 5 Core tools - ISO 9001:2015 or IATF 16949:2016 Functional Skills - Problem solving skills - 8D method, 5 Why, Fishborn, Pareto - Audit skills is required - Minitab skill - Familiar with ASTM testing standard, GB or JIS standard - Data analysis skills Other Abilities - Good at English - Good at MS Excel, powerpoint skills - Teamwork
Industry: Cơ khí / Ô tô / Tự động hóa , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC) , Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần TARA
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Customer Service Operations Management (50%) Supervise daily operations of the CS team to ensure performance meets pre-defined KPIs. Develop and implement procedures for receiving and handling complaints and supporting customers across channels (hotline, email, chat, social media). Ensure that the average complaint resolution time is optimized to meet targets (under 2 hours). Control service quality to ensure interactions are consistent, professional, and aligned with the company’s culture. Submit regular reports on CS performance and analyze data to propose quality improvement solutions. Team Management & Staff Development (30%) Recruit, train, and develop the CS team to ensure strong communication, problem-solving, and emotional management skills. Develop internal training programs focused on customer service, workflow processes, and support tools. Collaborate with the Training & Quality Specialist to assess CS quality and roll out improvement programs. Process Improvement & Customer Experience Enhancement (20%) Work cross-functionally with Sales, Marketing, Product, Warranty, Logistics, and other teams to improve the customer experience. Proactively propose and implement service process improvement initiatives to increase CSAT (Customer Satisfaction Score) and NPS (Net Promoter Score). Apply technology (CRM, Chatbot, AI, etc.) to enhance customer experience. Monitor and analyze customer data to recommend solutions that reduce complaints and improve retention rates.
Job Requirements: Experience & Skills Minimum 3 years of experience in customer service, preferably in home appliances, kitchenware, or FMCG. At least 3 years in a Team Leader or equivalent position. Proven experience in team management (recruitment, training, performance evaluation, development). Knowledge of CRM systems, ticketing tools, live chat, and omnichannel support tools. Strong communication and problem-solving skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire a team. Customer-centric mindset and ability to analyze CX data. Excellent time management, planning, and problem-solving skills. Education & Others Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Customer Service, or a related field. Proficient in Microsoft Office (Excel, PowerPoint) and Google Sheets. Preferred candidates with CX or CS Management certifications/training.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Hàng gia dụng / Chăm sóc cá nhân

Job Title: Learning Management System LMS Administrator Life Insurance
Company: NGÂN HÀNG TMCP KỸ THƯƠNG VIỆT NAM (TECHCOMBANK)
Job Description: Department Training & Development / Learning & Development (L&D) Reports To Head of Training Job Purpose To manage and administer the Learning Management System (LMS) used for digital and blended training programs across the life insurance organization. This role ensures effective system operations, content delivery, compliance tracking, and reporting to support employee and agent capability development. Key Responsibilities · Maintain and configure the LMS (e.g., SuccessFactors, Moodle) for optimal performance. · Upload and manage digital learning content, including SCORM packages and multimedia. · Create user accounts, assign roles, and manage access permissions. · Support trainers and managers with training assignments, course creation, and learner enrollment. · Track training completion and generate reports for compliance and business metrics. · Ensure regulatory training modules (e.g., AML, sales conduct) are properly assigned and tracked. · Provide first-line support for LMS-related issues and liaise with IT or vendors for escalations. · Coordinate with HR for integration of LMS with employee data systems. · Implement enhancements such as gamification, mobile compatibility, and learning analytics. · Maintain system documentation and perform routine audits for data accuracy. Key Interactions Internal: HR, IT, Compliance, Sales Training Teams External: LMS Vendors, System Integrators
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Experience · Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Education Technology, HR, or related field. · Minimum 2 years of experience administering LMS platforms in corporate environments. · Experience in insurance or financial services industry preferred. · Familiarity with SCORM, xAPI, and LMS reporting dashboards. · Strong problem-solving and communication skills. Skills and Competencies · Attention to detail and data accuracy. · Proficiency in LMS administration and troubleshooting. · Ability to manage multiple priorities and stakeholders. · Good understanding of digital learning tools and trends. · Fluency in Vietnamese and English.
Industry: Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Hành chính / Thư ký , Ngân hàng

Job Title: Unit Head of Digital Business Intelligence & Sales planning
Company: CÔNG TY TÀI CHÍNH TNHH NGÂN HÀNG TMCP SÀI GÒN - HÀ NỘI  (SHBFinance)
Job Description: - Hợp tác với các bộ phận Tài chính, Quản lý Danh mục, Quản lý và phát triển giá trị khách hàng và Rủi ro để phát triển và triển khai các kế hoạch kinh doanh nhằm đạt được mục tiêu về doanh số, lợi nhuận, rủi ro và chất lượng danh mục . Partner with Finance, Portfolio, Customer Value Management, Risk Division to develop and implement strategic digital sales plans to achieve digital sales volume, PnL, Risk and quality of portfolio targets - Xác định và đánh giá tác động của toàn bộ vòng đời kinh doanh số, bao gồm các nguồn tăng trưởng và hiệu suất của ứng dụng bán hàng, như tỷ lệ giữ chân người dùng và khả năng tạo doanh thu. Define and analyze the full lifecycle impact of digital business, including growth sources and mobile app performance, such as user retention and monetization. - Đề xuất các chiến lược và chiến thuật bán hàng mới dựa trên phân tích dữ liệu nhằm cải thiện việc thu hút và giữ chân khách hàng, đồng thời thúc đẩy tăng trưởng kinh doanh tổng thể. Recommend new sales strategies and tactics based on data-driven analysis to enhance customer acquisition and retention and overall business growth. - Đưa ra dự báo doanh số, kế hoạch dự tính và các thông tin chi tiết có thể triển khai để nâng cao kết quả bán hàng. Provide sales forecasts, projections, and actionable insights to improve sales outcomes. - Theo dõi và không ngừng cải thiện các chỉ số hiệu quả kinh doanh, đảm bảo độ chính xác của dữ liệu trong mọi báo cáo và hệ thống phân tích kinh doanh. Monitor and continuously improve sales performance metrics, ensuring data accuracy across all reports and business intelligence systems. - Hợp tác với các đội ngũ tiếp thị, sản phẩm và bán hàng để điều chỉnh các chiến lược bán hàng dựa trên dữ liệu phù hợp với các mục tiêu kinh doanh tổng thể. Collaborate with marketing, product, and sales teams to align data-driven sales strategies with overall business objectives. - Quản lý và cập nhật các bảng theo dõi hiệu suất và báo cáo để trình bày cho ban lãnh đạo. Maintain and update performance dashboards and reports for leadership review. - Tiến hành nghiên cứu thị trường và phân tích đối thủ để cung cấp thông tin cho việc lập kế hoạch bán hàng và chiến lược định vị cạnh tranh. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to inform sales planning and competitive positioning. - Phối hợp với IT để đảm bảo theo dõi dữ liệu chính xác và chịu trách nhiệm về vòng đời dữ liệu bán hàng số, từ việc thu hút khách hàng đến giữ chân và tạo doanh thu. Collaborate with IT to ensure accurate data tracking and own the digital sales data lifecycle from acquisition to retention and monetization.
Job Requirements: A. Năng lực Kiến thức, Kinh nghiệm / Knowledge capacity, Experience 1. Bằng cấp: Đại Học hoặc sau đại học (ưu tiên). Các chuyên ngành Kinh Tế, Ngân hàng, Marketing, Công nghệ/ BA or Master (preferred). Major: Economic, Banking, Marketing, Technology 2. Kinh nghiệm: Tối thiểu 05 năm kinh nghiệm tại vị trí tương đương tại các công ty TMĐT, Ngân hàng số, Tài Chính Tiêu Dùng, Fintech/ Edutech/ Insutech, v.v. / At least 05 years of experience at similar position at e-commerce companies, Digital Banking, Consumer Finance, Fintech, Edutech, Insutech, etc. 3. Ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh: Thông thạo Nghe - Nói - Đọc - Viết/ English: Fluent in Listenning - Speaking - Reading - Writing 4. Am hiểu sản phẩm, dịch vụ, chính sách của đơn vị: Am hiểu về sản phẩm, dịch vụ của ngành tài chính tiêu dùng và ngân hàng./ Deep understanding of products and services of the Consumer Finance and Banking Sector B. Năng lực, kỹ năng chuyên môn / Competence, Professional skills 1.Kiến thức sâu rộng và kinh nghiệm trong lập kế hoạch bán hàng và phân tích dữ liệu; Thành tích đã được chứng minh trong việc lập kế hoạch và quản lý ngân sách hiệu quả; Kinh nghiệm về phân tích dữ liệu, xây dựng bảng điều khiển và diễn giải báo cáo phân tích để đưa ra các thông tin có thể hành động; Kinh nghiệm làm việc với các đội ngũ liên phòng ban và xây dựng sự đồng thuận./ In-depth knowledge and experience of sales planning and data analysis; Proven track record of effective budget planning and management; Experience in data analytics, building dashboards and interpreting analytics reports and producing actionable insights; Experience working with and building consensus across cross-departmental teams 2. Kỹ năng giao tiếp xuất sắc/ Excellence in Communication skills 3. Kỹ năng quản lý các dự án phức tạp có liên quan đến nhiều bộ phận bao gồm Domain Architect, Solution architect, Engineering, Operations, Data, Risk, Digital Sales, Legal and Compliance/ Ability to manage complex projects with a diverse range of stakeholders including Domain Architect, Solution architect, Engineering, Operations, Data, Risk, Digital Sales, Legal and Compliance 4. Tư duy phân tích, logic xuất sắc/ Good in Project management skill 5. Cộng tác: xuất sắc trong việc thương lượng, trao đổi và xây dựng sự đồng thuận giữa các nhóm làm việc/ Collaboration: Exellent in working with and building consensus across cross-departmental teams

Company: VIETNAM GOBUY E-COMMERCE - CÔNG TY TNHH THƯƠNG MẠI ĐIỆN TỬ GOBUY VIỆT NAM
Job Description: We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs), and Computer Vision to develop intelligent solutions, particularly for chatbots, interaction automation, and image-based document processing Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and optimize intelligent chatbots by integrating LLM technologies to enhance conversational ability and contextual understanding. Apply NLP techniques to extract information, analyze text, and build language data processing pipelines. Develop computer vision solutions for chatbot-related systems, such as image-based information extraction (OCR), document/form parsing, and image search. Integrate AI models into backend systems, APIs, or other platforms. Package and deploy solutions in production environments using Docker and Kubernetes. Collaborate with relevant teams to understand business requirements and propose suitable technical solutions. Maintain, improve, clean, and manipulate data; troubleshoot and resolve existing issues. Continuously monitor, evaluate, and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies in LLM, NLP, and Computer Vision.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Information Technology, Applied Mathematics, Electronics & Telecommunications, or a related field. At least 2 years of experience in a similar role. Hands-on experience in developing chatbots or natural language interaction systems. Strong knowledge of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Large Language Models (LLMs), such as GPT, Claude, LLaMA, etc. Experience with frameworks like Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, or similar. Knowledge or experience in computer vision or OCR. Proficient in Python and popular AI/ML libraries (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn). Experience working with SQL databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.) and Vector Databases like Redis, Qdrant. Experience with containerization platforms (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus. Strong logical thinking, problem-solving skills, and a fast learning ability. Preferred (Not Required): Experience deploying AI products into production (cloud deployment, API integration, etc.). Experience working with Vietnamese language data is a plus. Understanding of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and vector search. Ability to write technical documentation or user guides for models. Benefits Competitive salary and benefits, negotiated based on skills and experience. Social insurance contributions are based on the full gross salary. Full compliance with Vietnam Labor Law, including contributions to social, health, and unemployment insurance. Annual leave and public holiday entitlements according to the regulations of the Vietnamese government. A dynamic, professional, and friendly work environment with ample opportunities for growth and advancement. Working Hours: Monday to Saturday Monday to Friday: from 08:30 to 17:30. Saturday: from 09:00 to 17:00.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Đầu Tư Nam Long
Job Description: Job Purpose Support the Group Planning function in managing real estate project development plans, analyzing project and business performance, and providing strategic insights to support executive decision-making. This role requires strong experience in real estate project planning, data analysis, and enterprise systems such as SAP and Power BI. Key Responsibilities 1. Real Estate Project Planning & Tracking (40%) Collect and update data on real estate project development plans. Coordinate with project teams to track implementation progress vs. approved schedules. Identify delays or risks in execution and escalate to management. Prepare reports related to variation orders, extensions of time, and project status. 2. Performance Monitoring & Analysis (30%) Monitor sales and product plans for each project (product types, pricing, launch phases). Analyze data from Sales & Marketing teams to assess product performance and absorption rate. Provide strategic recommendations to support business decisions. Prepare monthly/quarterly reports on project KPIs using Power BI. 3. Planning System & Process Management (15%) Maintain and enhance planning-related modules on SAP (project structure, timelines, budget). Collaborate with Finance, Investment, and other teams to integrate planning data. Support forecasting, budgeting, and strategic planning cycles. 4. Cross-functional Coordination & Reporting (15%) Prepare presentation materials for internal and BOD reporting. Support Group Planning team in ad-hoc strategic projects and internal initiatives.
Job Requirements: Education & Experience: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Real Estate, Construction Management, Business, or related fields. At least 3–5 years of experience in real estate development, project planning, or corporate strategy. Experience working at property developers is highly preferred. Technical Skills Proficient in Power BI (data modeling, dashboards, visualization). Familiar with SAP, SAP S4 Hana (project planning, budgeting, scheduling modules). Solid understanding of real estate project lifecycle and investment feasibility. Strong Excel & PowerPoint skills. Soft Skills: Strong analytical thinking and attention to detail. Good interpersonal and communication skills. Ability to work cross-functionally and manage multiple deadlines. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with Master Planning, Urban Development Projects, or Integrated Townships. Familiarity with Vietnamese Real Estate regulations and planning processes. Knowledge of basic financial modeling or project finance is a plus.
Industry: Bất động sản , Ngành khác

Company: RAWLPLUG VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED
Job Description: Key Responsibilities: Full responsibility for financial and controlling functions within the plant, ensuring compliance with both group standards and local regulations. Preparation of accurate and timely financial and management reports for headquarters and local management. Supervision of all tax-related matters, including the coordination of VAT refund processes. Oversight of transfer pricing documentation and compliance with local and international regulations. Coordination and supervision of the accounting function, with full responsibility for all accounting-related processes and compliance with local and corporate standards. Ongoing cost control and variance analysis against budgets and financial plans. Supervision and optimization of production cost accounting mechanisms. Analysis of production process efficiency – covering both direct and indirect costs. Participation in the preparation of the plant’s operational budget and ongoing monitoring of its execution. Preparation of regular reports and analyses related to production costs and operational efficiency. Verification of product cost calculations to ensure accuracy and alignment with actual production data.
Job Requirements: Requirements: University degree in finance, accounting, economics, or a related field. Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar role within a manufacturing environment, preferably in an international setting. Strong knowledge of local tax regulations and accounting standards. Proven experience with ERP systems and financial reporting tools. Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including expertise in data analysis, reporting, and the use of advanced functions and tools. Fluent English – both written and spoken – for effective communication in a multinational environment. Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, independence and a results-oriented mindset

Company: Công ty TNHH, Liên Doanh Vĩnh Hưng (TMI Việt Nam)
Job Description: Order Management & Data Entry Receive Orders: Process orders twice monthly (mid-month and end of month). Upload Surcharge Tables: Upload surcharge tables for each buy to the system. Process Purchase Orders (POs): Accept, download, and save POs after verifying them against the surcharge table. Update Surcharges: After confirmation, update the team and upload POs with increased surcharges to the system. Revise Order Information: Update order details and the master tracking sheet upon surcharge table completion (e.g., cancelled POs, quantity changes, delivery dates, export locations). Surcharge Verification: 14 days after surcharge table upload, check the system for any POs not yet updated with surcharges and make a note. Download TOP Orders: Accept, download, and save PO sheets for TOP orders (Wednesday of the week following the buy). Process Pai, BCS, SLT Orders: Receive, verify FOB and delivery dates for Pai, BCS, and SLT orders; save PO sheets; email relevant departments; and update the master file. Track & Update FOB Prices: Monitor and update seasonal FOB prices based on information provided by Development and the Customer. If PO prices differ from the seasonal update, re-check and upload to the system for correction. Daily PO Change Report: Download, check, and track daily changes in VAS, FOB, quantity, and export placement from the detailed PO change report. Revise & Distribute PO Sheets: Revise PO sheets for changes (quantity, export placement, shipment) and email them to relevant departments. Update System for Quantity Changes: Update POs with quantity changes on the system to ensure correct pricing. Shipment & Reporting FOB Confirmation for Import/Export: Verify and confirm FOB prices for the Import-Export Department. Unupdated Shipment Dates: Identify and report to Import-Export any shipped POs that lack updated delivery dates. System Discrepancy Reporting: Check the system for POs not included in monthly orders but still present, and report these. Weekly Delivery Date Updates: Track and update changing delivery dates weekly on each team's tracking file. Cancellation Cost Management: Update cancellation cost information (cost, start/end line dates) and upload to the system. Order Quantity Report: Prepare a report on order quantities for the Development team. WIP Report: Generate a report including Destination and FOB information for the WIP staff after a buy drops. Quality & Compliance Post-Shipment PO Changes: Daily check and update PO information after shipment (FOB price, export placement, etc.). PO Sheet vs. Order Verification: Verify style, season, quantity, customer number, and delivery date on the PO sheet against the actual order. If discrepancies exist, re-check. ISO Activities: Participate in ISO-related activities.
Job Requirements: Proven experience in order management, data entry, or a similar administrative role. Strong attention to detail and accuracy. Proficiency in using order management systems and Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel). Excellent organizational and time management skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Good communication skills.
Industry: Biên phiên dịch , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang , Thu mua / Vật tư
