Company: BUYMED LIMITED COMPANY
Job Description: Tech Lead will play a crucial role in improving user experience, optimizing transactions, and ensuring seamless order processing across our platform. You will lead a cross-functional team of engineers, collaborating closely with Product, UX/UI, and Data teams to build high-performance, scalable, and user-friendly solutions for our customers. Key Responsibilities: Technical Leadership – Own the architecture, development, and optimization of PDP, Checkout, and Dashboard to drive conversions and improve user engagement. Scalability & Performance – Ensure fast load times, reliable order processing, and a seamless checkout experience for thousands of daily transactions. Collaboration – Work closely with Product, UX/UI, Data, and Engineering teams to create intuitive and data-driven customer experiences. Mentorship & Code Quality – Lead by example, conducting code reviews, mentoring engineers, and driving a culture of technical excellence. System Design & Innovation – Continuously improve Buymed’s PDP, checkout, payments, and customer dashboard, integrating the latest technologies and best practices. Monitoring & Troubleshooting – Ensure high availability, reliability, and bug-free experiences across core purchasing flows.
Job Requirements: Must-Have: 5+ years of software engineering experience, with at least 2 years in a Tech Lead role. Proficiency in backend and frontend technologies, such as React, Golang Experience building & maintaining scalable microservices, API design, and GCP Deep understanding of performance optimization, caching strategies, and high-traffic database scaling Experience leading cross-functional teams and driving technical roadmaps. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to make data-driven product decisions. Proven ability to lead a squad focused on continuous improvement, dev & QA automation, and increasing dev efficiency/throughput. Nice-to-Have: Experience in eCommerce, B2B marketplaces, or fintech platforms. Familiarity with A/B testing, analytics, and personalization for improving user engagement. Exposure to GraphQL, event-driven architectures, or AI-powered recommendations. Prior experience optimizing PDP and checkout.
Industry: Dược phẩm/ Hóa Mỹ Phẩm , CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Company: Vietmap - Công ty Cổ phần Ứng Dụng Bản Đồ Việt
Job Description: We are seeking E-commerce Sales Leader with the following key responsibilities: Develop and execute sales plans (monthly/quarterly/annual), including revenue targets, pricing strategies, promotions, and marketing campaigns across e-commerce platforms (Shopee, Lazada, Tiki, TikTok Shop, website, etc.). Forecast sales performance based on historical data, market trends, and promotional activities to ensure sales targets and optimal inventory management. Monitor and optimize shop performance: traffic, conversion rate (CR), average order value (AOV), return rate, ensuring revenue maximization. Collaborate with the Marketing team to implement platform advertising campaigns (Shopee Ads, Lazada Sponsored Search, TikTok Ads, …) and optimize Ads spending. Manage inventory planning, ensuring appropriate stock levels to prevent overstocking or stockouts. Track order fulfillment status, ensuring smooth processing, monitoring shipping lead time, return rate, and improving customer shopping experience. Work closely with the e-commerce platforms to negotiate promotions and participate in platform-supported campaigns. Train and oversee the direct sales team, ensure high-quality customer engagement and conversion optimization. Coordinate with the design & content team to optimize product listings, images, descriptions, and videos for better engagement. Utilize data analytics tools (Google Analytics, Power BI, Excel, Looker Studio) to track performance, generate reports, and provide data-driven recommendations to improve sales.
Job Requirements: At least 3 years of experience in B2C e-commerce, with at least 1 year in a sales leadership role. Strong understanding of e-commerce platforms (Shopee, Lazada, Tiki, TikTok Shop, Amazon, etc.), including operation fee, ranking mechanisms, and advertising tools. Experience in sales planning and sales forecasting, ensuring optimal stock levels and revenue growth. Proficiency in data analysis tools (Google Analytics, Power BI, Looker Studio, CRM) to monitor sales performance. Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret key e-commerce metrics such as ROAS, ROI, AOV, CR, CPC, CPO and develop strategies for improvement. Experience in working with logistics & 3PL partners to ensure seamless inventory management and order fulfillment. Familiarity with graphic design & content editing tools like Photoshop and Canva is a plus. Good command of English (both written and verbal). Passion for automotive technology and car accessories is a plus.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Thương mại điện tử

Company: Wanek Furniture
Job Description: 1. Lead and facilitate continuous improvement projects: Utilize Lean, Six Sigma, and other methodologies to drive projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and achievement of project goals. 2. Analyze current processes and workflows: Conduct thorough assessments of existing processes to identify inefficiencies, bottlenecks, and areas for improvement. Use data-driven analysis to support recommendations. 3. Develop and implement strategies: Create and execute detailed plans to optimize processes, reduce waste, and increase efficiency. Ensure strategies align with organizational goals and objectives. 4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work closely with departments such as production, quality, and supply chain to implement improvement initiatives. Facilitate communication and coordination to ensure successful project execution. 5. Monitor and report on progress: Track the progress of improvement projects using key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics. Prepare and present regular reports to management, highlighting achievements, challenges, and next steps. 6. Training: Provide training on continuous improvement tools and techniques, such as Kaizen, 5S, Line Balancing, Value Stream Mapping ect… to Production, cross function team. Encourage others to build a culture of continuous improvement and empower them to contribute to improvement initiatives. 7. Foster a culture of continuous improvement: Promote a mindset of continuous improvement throughout the organization. Encourage employees to identify and suggest improvements, and recognize their contributions. 8. Implement technology solutions: Identify and implement technology solutions that support continuous improvement efforts, such as process automation tools and data analytics software. 9. Work as one of key member to drive the Lean events and problem solving teams throughout the Production 10. Maintain continuous personal development : - Share new knowledge with the Team - Keeps up-to-date on reading material in the CI area 11. Develop and maintain daily/ weekly Report for all activities and projects that Facilitator is a part of 12. Control and audit processes to ensure that they are maintained after projects completion 13. Complete other assignments and special projects as requested
Job Requirements: 1. Education College or University graduation in Engineering, Industrial Engineer or a related field. Knowledge or Certification in Lean, Six Sigma, or other continuous improvement methodologies. 2. Experience Minimum 3 -5 years’ experience in a manufacturing environment Project Management Experience 3. Knowledge of: LEAN Manufacturing Concepts Statistical Process Control DMAIC Principles 4. Skills and Abilities Proven experience in leading continuous improvement initiatives. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Proficiency in data analysis and process mapping tools. Strong project management skills. Demonstrated ability to work hard and stay driven to achieve results. Passion for continuous improvement and operational excellence. High sense of responsibility and accountability in all tasks. Proficiency in using data analysis software and tools (e.g., Excel, SQL,…). Basic in using AutoCAD (layouts) and SolidWorks
Industry: Cơ khí / Ô tô / Tự động hóa , Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Nội ngoại thất

Job Title: Head of C&B cum HRBP (Domestic & International scope)
Company: Tập Đoàn Karofi Holding
Job Description: A. Total Rewards Strategy (C&B): Design and manage the Group’s total compensation and benefits strategy – applicable to both local and international markets – ensuring competitiveness, transparency, legal compliance, and cost efficiency. Propose and implement effective reward and retention programs for different employee levels and talent segments. Lead C&B budgeting, monitor cost trends, and ensure alignment with business objectives. B. Performance Management (BSC/KPIs): Develop and implement a BSC/KPIs-based performance management system , fully aligned across the organization – individual, departmental, and corporate levels. Provide training and guidance to ensure consistent and effective implementation across all units. Analyze performance trends and productivity data to support strategic HR decision-making. Analyze HR and operational data to propose policy initiatives that support business growth across markets. Act as a trusted advisor to BU leaders (domestic & international), understanding their structure, challenges, and providing tailored HR solutions. Support the rollout of corporate HR programs and change initiatives, ensuring local relevance and ownership. C. Strategic HR Business Partnering: Analyze HR and operational data to propose policy initiatives that support business growth across markets. Act as a trusted advisor to BU leaders (domestic & international), understanding their structure, challenges, and providing tailored HR solutions. Support the rollout of corporate HR programs and change initiatives, ensuring local relevance and ownership. D. HR Operations Management: Oversee day-to-day operations of the C&B and HRBP functions , including payroll, performance tracking, bonus, workforce cost monitoring, and reporting. Ensure labor law compliance across all locations and provide guidance on internal policy interpretation and application. Lead and develop C&B and HRBP teams across different business units and markets. E. Organizational Health Monitoring: Design and implement systems for tracking and reporting key workforce health indicators : engagement, capabilities, performance, turnover risk, etc. Deliver periodic workforce insights reports to the CHRO and business leaders to inform strategic workforce planning.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Human Resources, Business Administration, Finance, Economics, or related field. At least 5 years of experience in C&B , with 2+ years in a management role . Preferably experienced in MNCs or regional organizations with international HR operations. Deep understanding of BSC/KPIs performance systems , and compensation frameworks. Fluent in English (listening, speaking, reading, writing); able to work directly with international stakeholders and markets. Strong data-driven mindset, system thinking, and ability to build cross-functional collaboration. Excellent communication, internal consulting, team leadership, and policy deployment skills.
Industry: Nhân sự

Company: Công Ty TNHH Tư Vấn Kỹ Thuật Và Tin Học Thương Mại Viet C.A.D
Job Description: Relationship Management: Manage, build and sustain strong relationships with key accounts. Satisfaction & Retention: Monitor customer satisfaction, assess renewal rates and execute tailored retention strategies to minimize churn, ensuring long-term client retention. Predictive Analysis: Analyze customer data to forecast renewals, identify potential risks, and recommend solutions to improve customer success. Upsell & Cross-sell Opportunities: Determine customer demands and expectations, collaborate with Sales and Marketing team to identify and execute upsell and cross-sell opportunities that fit customer needs. Feedback-Driven Enhancements: Identify and recommend product and service enhancements informed by customer feedback to improve client satisfaction and long-term business growth.
Job Requirements: Ability to analyze customer data and make decisions based on the collected information. At least 2-3 years of experience in customer management, particularly in B2B. Knowledge of CRM systems. Proficiency in Microsoft Office. Strong communication skills, capable of building and maintaining relationships with clients. English reading, writing, and communication skills. Strong time management and organizational skills, with the ability to work independently as well as in a team. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits in accordance with state regulations. Opportunities for career advancement and professional development. Work in a professional, friendly, and dynamic environment. Continuous training and development of professional skills. Working Hours: Monday to Friday (8:00 AM – 5:00 PM) Saturday mornings on alternate weeks
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Dịch vụ khách hàng , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS Record monthly accounting transactions into Quickbooks software and reconcile account balances. (15%) Monitor accounts payable (AP) details and send weekly payment plans. Check the details of each customer‘s debt based on documents and payment terms, and report to the direct manager. Reconcile debts with each supplier. (25%) Track accounts receivable (AR) details for each market. (25%) Monitor the implementation of the terms of purchase contracts. (10%) Support detailed data processing for related accounting sections to prepare financial reports. (5%) Prepare monthly debt reports. (5%) Maintain and organize documents fully, scientifically, and consistently according to department regulations. (10%) Perform other tasks as required. (5%)
Job Requirements: II. REQUIREMENTS Knowledge: Bachelor‘s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field. Familiarity with accounts payable and accounts receivable processes. Skills: Strong attention to detail and accuracy. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Good communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to analyze financial data and prepare reports. Proficient in Microsoft Office, especially Excel. Experience: 5 - 7 years of experience in accounting, preferably in accounts receivable and accounts payable. Experience working with accounting software, Quickbooks preferred. Previous experience in a similar role within a multinational or e-commerce company is an advantage.
Industry: Thương mại điện tử , Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Job Title: General Accountant – Kế Toán Tổng Hợp
Company: Công ty TNHH Microtec Việt Nam
Job Description: Accounting: - Preparing monthly, quarterly and yearly financial reports, tax reports and other analysis reports as required. - Manage AR, AP, ensure to collect AR, make payment on time. - Prepare cash flow forecast for finance controlling. Monitor cash requirement. Prepare budgeting and planning periodically. - Ensure all revenue/sales and expenses are properly recognized in a timely manner and explainable. - Review general ledgers, P&L, BS. Ensure all transactions are recorded accurately and comply with Vietnam regulations. - Review all accounting procedures to improve internal control. Be required to recognize risks of data and report to BOD for solution. - Work with the auditor for annual financial reports. - Other tasks assigned by manager. Tax: - Double check monthly, quarterly and yearly tax reports (VAT, PIT, CIT, and FCT) - Check the validation of all tax invoices. - Be able to deal with Tax officers if there are any Tax issues.
Job Requirements: Requirements - At least 3-year experience in relevant positions. - Bachelor’s degree in Accountant / Finance is required. - Experience working with ERP Software is an advantage. - Good command of written and spoken English. - Proficiency in computer applications (Microsoft office, Excel, PowerPoint). - Ability to analyze, make decisions and solve problems, attention to detail. - Good planning and organization skills. - Ability to gather data, compile information, and prepare reports. Benefits: - Attractive salary and lunch allowance - Salary reviews every year and bonus twice per year - Social insurance according to the Law - Extra Health and Accident Insurance, Annual health check-up and other benefits following the Company’s policy - Working in a professional environment, training and career development
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Hành chính / Thư ký , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: LOTTE VIETNAM SHOPPING JOINT STOCK COMPANY
Job Description: - Survey and analyze the product and market to launch potential overseas products to achieve the target. - Advise and consult the BOD on market trends of Global Sourcing products. - Sourcing and managing overseas products - Communicating with Korean headquarters and Korean clients - Managing overseas promotion projects for Korean products (bidding, planning, settlement) - Managing performance data and preparing reports - 목표 달성을 위한 잠재적인 해외 제품 출시를 위해 제품과 시장을 조사하고 분석합니다. - 글로벌 소싱 제품의 시장 동향에 대해 이사회에 조언하고 협의합니다. - 해외상품 소싱 & 관리 - 한국 본사 및 한국 클라이언트 소통 - 한국상품 해외 판촉사업 관리(입찰, 기획, 정산) - 업무실적 수치관리, 보고서 작성
Job Requirements: - Bachelor's Degree in Economics, Business Administration, Import/Export, ... - Korean nationality and willingness to work in Vietnam - Proficient in English and Vietnamese for business communication - Over 3 years of experience in import/export (sourcing experience preferred) - Proficient in MS Excel (able to analyze inventory and sales data and create reports) - Strategic thinking, planning and execution. - Communication, negotiation, presentation, and problem-solving skills. - 경제학, 경영학, 수입/수출, ... 학사 학위 - 한국 국적자, 베트남 근무 가능자 - 영어 & 베트남어 : 비즈니스 소통 가능 수준 - 3년 이상 수출입 경력 보유(소싱 경력 우대) - MS 엑셀 사용 가능자(엑셀을 활용한 재고, 매출 분석 및 업무 보고 가능 수준 - 전략적 사고, 계획 및 실행. - 커뮤니케이션, 협상, 프레젠테이션 및 문제 해결 기술.

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH MỘT THÀNH VIÊN ĐẦU TƯ VÀ PHÁT TRIỂN  GIÁO DỤC NHÂN VĂN
Job Description: Job Purpose : Responsible for developing and implementing B2C, B2B(*) sales strategies to attract and maintain relationships with high-income clients and partners, driving revenue growth for the school. Key Responsibilities : Develop and execute B2B sales strategy : Create long-term and short-term sales strategies to target and convert businesses, organizations, and high-income families for student enrollment at the school. Analyze the market and competitors to propose effective sales solutions. Manage and maintain client relationships : Build and maintain long-term relationships with business partners and target clients. Update customer information and needs to propose suitable educational solutions. Work closely with the Marketing & Admissions Manager : Collaborate with the Marketing & Admissions Manager to optimize marketing campaigns that support sales efforts. Provide market insights, customer feedback, and campaign results to adjust the sales strategy. Meet and exceed revenue targets : Ensure revenue goals are met through effective sales strategies and exploiting new business opportunities. Report and analyze sales performance : Regularly report on sales results, business opportunities, and client status to the Marketing & Admissions Manager. Analyze sales data to adjust strategies and improve results. Organize and participate in events and seminars : Coorporate with Marketing team in organizing and attending events related to student enrollment, school introductions, and educational programs. Build partnerships with organizations and businesses with potential for collaboration.
Job Requirements: At least 3-5 years of experience in sales, especially B2B experience Preferably in the education industry. Strong skills in building and maintaining client relationships, especially with high-income clients. Ability to work closely with other departments (Marketing, Finance, etc.) to achieve common goals. Excellent communication and negotiation skills with the ability to engage with large partners. Proficient in MS Office, CRM tools, and sales data analysis. Bachelor’s degree or higher, preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Education, or related fields.
Industry: Tư vấn , Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Company: Công ty TNHH Một Thành Viên Thương mại Thời trang Tổng hợp
Job Description: 1. Buying process Work directly with brands to manage the buying process, including issuing purchase orders (PO) and aligning product assortments. Ensure timely and accurate communication with brands regarding order status, deliveries, and inventory needs. 2. Demand Planning & Forecasting Collaborate with the planning team to ensure that buying decisions align with demand forecasts and inventory strategies. Provide input and coordinate with the planner on forecast adjustments, stock needs, and replenishment schedules. 3. Merchandise & Profitability Management Optimize the merchandise mix to achieve sales and gross profit (GP) targets. Ensure effective stock management to minimize overstock and improve sell-through performance. 4. Inventory & Supply Management Oversee PO management, stock transfers, and inventory control, ensuring accurate tracking and stock availability. Communicate and adjust supply plans based on actual sales performance and any unforeseen demand changes. 5. Sales & Promotion Analysis Continuously review historical sales data, promotional impacts, and forecast accuracy to improve purchasing strategies. Provide insights and contingency plans in response to abnormal demand or shifts in market conditions. 6. Product Launches & Coordination Manage the execution of new product launches, promotional activities, and packaging updates through close coordination with brands and internal departments. 7. Cross-Functional Collaboration Partner with other departments to ensure alignment on inventory, promotions, and issue resolution related to purchasing and supply chain activities. 8. Reporting & Analysis Provide daily, weekly, and monthly reports on sales, inventory, PO status, and shipments to inform strategic decisions.
Job Requirements: Minimum 3 years of progressive experience in Retail Buying, must have Fashion Retail industry. Strong understanding of retail purchasing, product assortment, and supplier management. Proficiency in Microsoft Excel for managing inventory and purchase orders. Strong negotiation and relationship-building skills with brands. Able to analyze market trends and sales data to inform buying decisions. Capable of managing multiple tasks and product launches efficiently. Flexible in a fast-paced, dynamic retail environment. Team-oriented with strong cross-functional and external collaboration abilities. Proficiency in English
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang

Company: BlueMedia Việt Nam
Job Description: What You'll Do: As our E-commerce Live Streaming Manager, you will be the driving force behind our live streaming success. Your key responsibilities will include: Lead Live Streaming Strategy & Execution: Oversee all aspects of our e-commerce live streaming business in Vietnam, from strategic planning to flawless execution across platforms like TikTok and Shopee. Achieve Ambitious GMV Targets: Take full responsibility for setting and achieving Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) targets, developing innovative strategies to drive consistent growth and maximize revenue. Optimize Performance & ROI: Continuously analyze live streaming performance data, refine traffic acquisition strategies, and enhance product conversion tactics to improve ROI and boost GMV. Develop Engaging Content: Design compelling product selections, content plans, and scripts tailored to Vietnamese consumer habits and platform features. You'll ensure our live streams are not just sales channels, but engaging experiences. Lead & Empower Your Team: Recruit, mentor, and manage a high-performing live streaming team, including hosts, studio operators, and content planners. Foster continuous skill development and drive peak performance. Foster Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner closely with internal teams (IMC, KOL partnerships, advertising, brand partners, supply chain, marketing) to ensure seamless coordination of live streaming schedules, inventory, pricing, and promotions. Build Platform Relationships: Establish and maintain strong relationships with key platforms like Shopee, Lazada, and TikTok to secure resources, enhance exposure, and maximize conversion rates for our live streaming sessions. Innovate & Stay Ahead: Continuously monitor the latest trends in Vietnam's e-commerce and live streaming landscape. Study competitor strategies and explore innovative approaches to strengthen our brand competitiveness and expand market share
Job Requirements: 3+ years of experience in e-commerce live streaming (TikTok Live, Shopee Live, Facebook Live, etc.). Strong understanding of Vietnam's e-commerce ecosystem (Shopee, TikTok Shop, Lazada). Data analysis skills and a proven track record of achieving sales targets through live streaming. Excellent leadership and communication skills to manage and inspire a team. Deep insight into Vietnam market and consumer behavior . Experience with KOLs/influencers is a plus. Proficiency in English or Chinese.
Industry: Thương mại điện tử , Giải trí , Quảng cáo / Đối ngoại / Truyền Thông

Company: Vietnamese-German University (VGU)
Job Description: 1. Student recruitment activities Participate and coordinate recruitment events, including VGU campus tours, open days, high-school visits, career fairs, and online information sessions; Provide accurate and timely advice to prospective students on admissions processes, program offerings, and scholarship information; Build and maintain relationships with schools, community organizations, and other external partners to enhance recruitment pipelines; Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional materials and campaigns tailored to target audiences. 2. Reporting and analysis Prepare detailed reports on recruitment activities, including event outcomes, attendance metrics, and conversion rates; Conduct market analysis to identify trends and opportunities for student recruitment, particularly in STEM fields; Evaluate the effectiveness of recruitment strategies and provide data-driven recommendations to meet VGU's enrollment goals. 3. Other duties Attending events as required out of normal office hours; Occasional weekend work (a day in lieu will be implemented); Occasional travel to other areas across Vietnam for up to 5 days.
Job Requirements: 1. Qualification: Bachelor's degree in business analytics, data analytics, marketing, communications, or a related field with a focus on business analytics 2 . Experiences: At least 2 years of experience in student recruitment, marketing, or a customer-facing role Experience working in higher education Proven experience in event planning and delivery Experience in preparing reports and analyzing data to inform decision-making 3 . Knowledge: Good knowledge of statistics and reporting models Good knowledge of the higher education landscape and admissions processes in Vietnam and ASEAN region 4 . S kills Excellent English proficiency (oral and written) is essential Must have a secure command of MS Office, including the ability to perform basic statistical analysis and manage databases Proven ability in teamwork and communication Ability to work efficiently is required 5 . Behaviours required Professional attitude in all situations, strategic thinking, creativity, ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines, willingness to work with others to achieve shared objectives Ability to act with self-confidence in an international working environment
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Company: Concung.com - Con Cung Joint Stock Company
Job Description: Managing and ensuring the collection of all the investment, incentive, and discount from the suppliers. Work closely with the suppliers and be a partner with Internal departments to ensure the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of the accounts receivable. Responsibilities: Control backsales receivable process. work closely with other department (Commercial, Supply Chain), Supplier to: + Ensure SOP backsales receivable process is follwed. + Record accruaratelly, fully and timely accroding to plan. + Reconciliaton and collection process is carried out accurately and completely Monitor aging receivables, expedite, and report overdue collections in a timely manner. Handle issues related to debt recovery: + Check /perfom/ arrange and store commercial contract to sent supplier. + Send emails for comparison, export value-added invoices and remind supplier when payment is due. Communicate and negotiate with suppliers to ensure timely and complete receipt and resolution of all issues or disputes. Prepare reports and analyze financial data, identify trends, more visibility. Job Requirements: Bachelor degree in accounting, finance, or a related field is essential. Trained in Finance and Accounting area or equivalent experience. 2-3 years of experience in accounting, Experience in receivable control is an advantege. Strong knowledge of accounting principles, practices, and procedures. Familiarity with the specific industry's revenue streams and financial practices can be crucial Proficiency in financial software, ERP systems, and advanced Excel skills are typically necessary Data processing skills: collect from multiple sources, clean, identify anomalies. (Excel is a must) Efficiency mindset: find ways to automate tasks, design templates or propose solutions that can be reproducible and transferable with ease Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze financial data and extract meaningful insights for FA optimization. Communication Skills: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills are necessary for dealing with internal teams and external suppliers. Problem-Solving: Identifying and resolving issues that may impact revenue or financial reporting. Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS Category Management & Business Strategy Develop and Execute Product Strategies: Align with established KPIs to drive growth for 7 priority categories (out of 13) across 5 key markets, proposing adjustments to retail prices (RRP) and forecasting costs (FC) as needed. Plan Sales Initiatives: Collaborate with the Digital Marketing (DMKT) team to create and adjust sales plans, including promotions, ads, and product bundles to boost GMV. Monitor Product Lifecycle: Review product lifecycles and notify relevant departments of updates or phase-outs to ensure seamless category management. Propose Growth Strategies: Recommend new product development initiatives to support long-term category growth and market competitiveness. Sales Performance & Data Analysis Track Key Metrics: Monitor daily Revenue Share (RS), Gross Merchandise Value (GMV), Traffic, Net PPM, and retail pricing for 42 product lines using Dashboard, Helium, and Keepa. Analyze Competitor Dynamics: Conduct market size/share analysis (via Helium) and manually track competitor pricing and promotions for direct and indirect competitors. Optimize Listings: Check listings daily across 20 countries for title, images, content, ratings, reviews, Buy Box, and organic rankings, resolving issues with domain experts. Generate Insights: Process data to provide actionable insights, focusing on 8/14 key countries, and integrate external data for deeper market perspectives. Sales Planning & Forecasting Evaluate Forecast Accuracy: Analyze discrepancies between actual sales and forecasts monthly, proposing solutions to improve forecasting accuracy for 42 product lines. Update Rolling Forecasts: Maintain and update rolling forecasts (FC) using internal tools, ensuring alignment with sales targets across 8/14 countries. Support Planning Feedback: Provide feedback on planning gaps, follow up on action items post-meetings, and ensure alignment with business goals. Coordinate with Teams: Work with cross-functional teams (T&I, DMKT, OPS) to align sales forecasts with inventory and marketing strategies. Business Initiatives & Process Improvement Refine Internal Processes: Update workflows monthly to reflect changes, ensuring operational efficiency across departments. Document Actions for AI Training: Record daily actions and insights to support AI training and knowledge sharing within the team. Drive Strategic Initiatives: Propose and implement initiatives for product development and process optimization to support sustainable growth. Collaborate on Cross-Functional Projects: Work with marketing, B2B, and operations teams to streamline processes and enhance category performance. Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Address Customer Feedback: Raise bad reviews/ratings to the Support Product Development (SPD) team via email and Wrike tasks, preparing data for resolution meetings monthly. Implement Review Solutions: Collaborate with SPD to address negative feedback through strategies like rating improvements or launching new ASINs (requesting UPCs and creating listings). Monitor Customer Sentiment: Track customer reviews and ratings daily across 30% of listings with issues, ensuring timely resolution to maintain brand reputation. ​ Operations Coordinate Cross-Departmentally: Participate in weekly internal (Category, Country Group) and cross-departmental (T&I, DMKT, OPS) meetings to align operations with business goals. Support Ad Hoc Tasks: Handle ad hoc operational tasks, such as urgent listing fixes or market research updates, to ensure smooth category operations.
Job Requirements: II. REQUIREMENTS Bachelor's degree in Economics, Business Administration, Marketing, E-commerce, or related fields. · At least 1-2 years of experience in a similar role (e.g., Sales Executive, Category Development Specialist, E-commerce Specialist) or in category management/project management. · Solid understanding of category management principles, including market/competitor analysis and consumer behavior. · Proven ability to analyze sales data (GMV, conversion rates, traffic, ad spend, etc.) to drive business decisions. · Experience in sales planning, forecasting, and inventory management. · Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (especially Excel for data analysis) and Google Suite. · Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a logical and creative approach. · Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team environment, coordinating with various departments. · Proactive, responsible, eager to learn, adaptable, with strong time management and multitasking abilities. · (Optional, based on previous context) Familiarity with e-commerce platforms and an interest in AI/automation in business are advantageous

Job Description: We are looking for a Marketing Team Leader to lead strategic marketing initiatives, product marketing, and enhance engagement for SkyJoy. This role will focus on brand awareness, campaign management, and partnerships to scale our loyalty program and maximize customer lifetime value. Marketing Strategy & Planning: Develop and execute marketing strategies to drive SkyJoy’s growth, ensuring alignment with business goals and the loyalty program’s objectives. Brand Management: Build and strengthen the SkyJoy brand through consistent messaging, storytelling, and creative execution across all channels. Campaign Development: Plan and oversee multi-channel marketing campaigns, including digital, social media, CRM, PR, and offline activations, ensuring high engagement and ROI. Market Research & User Insight: Conduct market research and analyze user insights to understand customer behaviors, trends, and preferences, ensuring informed marketing decisions. Competitor Research: Monitor industry trends and analyze competitors to identify opportunities and differentiate SkyJoy in the market. Supervise Design & Content: Oversee the creation of marketing materials, ensuring high-quality visual and written content that aligns with brand guidelines and campaign objectives. Manage Agency: Work closely with external agencies to ensure high-quality deliverables, effective campaign execution, and alignment with SkyJoy’s marketing strategy. Performance & Data Analytics: Track, analyze, and report on key marketing KPIs, optimizing campaigns based on performance insights. Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with Product, Data, Ops, and Partnership teams to ensure seamless execution of marketing initiatives. Budget Management: Manage marketing budgets efficiently to maximize returns on investment.
Job Requirements: Education & Work Experience University degree in business or related discipline BS/BA in Marketing or related field. Minimum 4+ years of marketing experience, with 2 years’ experience at manager level. Marketing experience in travel, airline, loyalty programs, lifestyle, OTA or retail is preferred. Experience with integrated marketing communication. Experience with social media (Facebook, Tiktok), or the creative media industry is a plus Skills & Personal Attributes Detail-oriented with the ability to manage projects from inception through execution. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written. Comfortable with data, analytics, CRM and loyalty programs coupled with creativity and a passion for branding. A hunger to learn and ability to flourish in a dynamic, high-growth, entrepreneurial environment. Entrepreneurial, self-starter with hands-on approach.

With 2,000+ SKUs on platforms like Amazon, Wayfair, and Walmart, we continue to scale. Guided by Mr. Nguyen Chi My, we leverage Vietnam’s competitive strengths and strategic manufacturing partnerships to drive innovation. Job Title: Trưởng bộ phận vận hành mô hình - Trung tâm Quản trị dữ liệu
Company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Tiên Phong (TPBank)
Job Description: Mục đích chức danh Nhân sự chịu trách nhiệm quản lý công việc chung của bộ phận Vận hành Mô hình, đảm bảo các thực hành của bộ phận tuân theo best practice về MLOps, đảm bảo tiến độ và chất lượng công việc của các nhân sự trong bộ phận cũng như là đầu mối thực thi vai trò quản trị hoạt động Khoa học Dữ liệu (KHDL) trên toàn hàng. Mô tả công việc Chuẩn hóa và thiết lập các thực hành tốt nhất về MLOps tại bộ phận bao gồm nhưng không giới hạn xây dựng feature store, áp dụng CI/CD, thiết lập kho lưu trữ meta data mô hình, thiết lập các quy định/ quy trình liên quan đến mảng MLOps nói riêng và toàn bộ mảng về KHDL nói chung… Chuẩn hóa và thiết lập các yếu tố về mặt vận hành của bộ phận bao gồm hệ thống báo cáo theo dõi tổng thể hiệu năng các mô hình trên môi trường vận hành, hệ thống báo cáo theo dõi hoạt động của bộ phận; Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý các hoạt động BAU của đơn vị bao gồm deploy các mô hình PTNC trên môi trường vận hành, theo dõi thường xuyên hiệu năng của các mô hình này để đảm bảo khả năng hoạt động ổn định trong toàn bộ vòng đời. Thúc đẩy và triển khai các dự án nghiên cứu và đào tạo của bộ phận, bao gồm nhưng không giới hạn trong các chủ đề về khung đánh giá mức độ trưởng thành về thực hành MLOps, Opensource về MLOps,… Xây dựng chính sách, quy định, quy trình liên quan đến hoạt động MLOps và KHDL cũng như là đầu mối quản lý và đảm bảo các artifact của hoạt động KHDL tuân theo các chính sách, quy định, quy trình liên quan.
Job Requirements: a. Kinh nghiệm : - Ứng viên có 05 năm trở lên làm việc trong lĩnh vực về KHDL hoặc 7 năm trở lên làm việc trong các lĩnh vực khác của CNTT như DevOps, Software Engineering, Data Engineering. - Ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm hơn 1 năm làm việc trong lĩnh vực tài chính ngân hàng. - Ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm quản lý nhóm về KHDL, MLOps. b. Yêu cầu chuyên môn : - Am hiểu hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu: SQL, NoSQL. Ư tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các nền tảng commercial thông dụng trên thị trường để phát triển/vận hành mô hình ML như IBM Cloud Pak for Data, AWS, Azure hoặc các nền tảng cloud service khác. - Am hiểu ít nhất một Framework ML/AI: scikit-learn, torch, tensorflow. - Am hiểu về kiến trúc hệ thống, một số platform như hadoop,.. thành thạo linux, có kinh nghiệm về scale hệ thống, thành thạo docker, k8s,… - Ưu tiên ứng viên đã có kinh nghiệm triển khai 01 hệ thống MLOps hoàn chỉnh từ data ingest, workflow orchestration, model training, model/data drift monitoring, model registry, model serving, feature store… - Các kỹ năng/yêu cầu khác: + Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, làm việc tốt dưới áp lực; có khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt; + Có khả năng tự tìm hiểu/tự nghiên cứu tốt;
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư , CNTT - Phần mềm

Job Title: Management Accountant (open for Fresher) - Dau Giay (Having shuttle bus)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY We are seeking for a detail-oriented and analytical Management Accountant to support our manufacturing finance operations. This role plays a critical part in analyzing costs, supporting budgeting processes, and driving process improvements to enhance financial and operational performance KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES - Cost control & analysis: + Assist in the annual budgeting process and oversee expenditure within the business to ensure that expenditure is in line with budgets. + Analyze financial data to evaluate business profitability and growth, including labor variances, overhead cost variances, and departmental budget performance. + Conduct detailed analysis of material costs and follow up on job close variances. + Perform personnel cost analysis, including labor rate and labor (production) efficiency review. + Monitor capital expenditures (CAPEX) funding and department spending & provide variance analysis to management as needed. + Track actual production KPIs versus targets and monitor progress on improvement plans. + Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure accurate and timely month-end closing of costing journals. + Prepare accurate and timely management reports to support decision-making. - Inventory Management + Review and inventory health (aging), stock adjustments, shortage/surplus inventory and other inventory activities + Review and analysis inventory costing; coordinate with departments to ensure accurate system entries. - Process & System Enhancement + Participate in systems and process improvement initiatives to enhance operational and financial efficiency. + Support ad-hoc projects and tasks as assigned by the Finance Manager, including the system enhancement and process build-up
Job Requirements: Education: A Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance is required , while a Master's degree in these fields or professional certifications like ACCA, CFA, or CMA are highly advantageous. Experience: Minimum of 1 year of experience in operation finance, preferably within a manufacturing environment. Experience working in Big 4 accounting firm is an advantage Knowledge: Fluent in English, both spoken and written skills Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel and experience with ERP systems (preferably Oracle) is a plus. Functional Skills: Strong communication skills with the ability to collaborate effectively across departments to deliver results Proficient in financial reporting and data analysis with the ability to translate complex financial data into meaningful business insights Other Abilities: Eagerness to learn and a proactive mindset to embrace challenges and grow professionally
Experience: Experience working in Big 4 accounting firm is an advantage
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Company: NGÂN HÀNG TMCP KỸ THƯƠNG VIỆT NAM (TECHCOMBANK)
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Job Purpose The Senior Expert, Claims, will play a critical role in setting up and managing the claims function for a newly established life insurance company. This role is responsible for developing claims processes, defining Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), collaborating with IT to implement claims management systems, working with reinsurers on claims policies, and establishing strong partnerships with third-party service providers such as medical panels and claims investigators. The Senior Expert, Claims, will also work closely with Techcombank to integrate data insights and ensure a seamless claims experience for customers. Key Responsibilities Claims Process Setup & SOP Development - Develop and implement Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for claims processing, ensuring efficiency and compliance. - Design end-to-end claims workflows, from claim submission to assessment, approval, and payment. - Ensure alignment of claims processes with regulatory requirements and industry best practices. Collaboration with IT & Digital Transformation - Define business requirements for IT teams to implement a digital claims management system. - Work with IT and digital teams to integrate claims automation tools and AI-driven claims assessment models. - Ensure seamless integration of claims processing with policy administration and customer service platforms. Claims Risk Management & Reinsurance Coordination - Collaborate with reinsurance companies to define claims handling guidelines and facultative claims assessment. - Establish governance frameworks for claims risk monitoring and fraud detection. - Work closely with actuarial and underwriting teams to ensure claims trends inform future risk assessment strategies. Stakeholder Engagement & Collaboration with Techcombank - Engage with Techcombank’s distribution and risk teams to develop claims service standards that meet customer expectations. - Work on data integration between Techcombank and the insurance company to ensure smooth claims verification and settlement. - Provide training and support to distribution teams on claims procedures and fraud detection measures. Collaboration with Third-Party Service Providers - Establish and manage relationships with third-party medical panels, hospitals, clinics, and claims investigation firms. - Negotiate and monitor service level agreements (SLAs) with external partners to ensure high-quality claims services. - Ensure that external medical evaluations and claims assessments support the company’s risk management objectives. Customer-Centric Claims Experience - Develop a customer-friendly claims process that balances risk management with a smooth and transparent experience. - Implement digital solutions to allow self-service claims submission, tracking, and updates for customers. - Continuously monitor claims turnaround times and propose improvements to enhance customer satisfaction. Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement - Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for claims processing efficiency, fraud detection, and settlement ratios. - Analyze claims data to identify trends, potential risks, and areas for process optimization. - Ensure that claims policies evolve based on claims experience and market trends.
Job Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Education - Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Insurance, Law, or a related field. Experience - Minimum of 7-10 years of experience in life insurance claims management, including experience in setting up claims processes and guidelines. - Experience working with reinsurance companies on claims policies and facultative claims support. - Proven track record in digital transformation of claims operations, including automation and system implementation. - Strong experience in managing third-party claims service providers, including medical panels and claims investigators. - Exposure to bancassurance operations and an understanding of financial data integration to support claims processing. Skills & Competencies - Claims Management & Risk Assessment – Expertise in designing claims policies and handling complex claims cases. - Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge – Strong understanding of Vietnam’s insurance claims regulations and legal frameworks. - IT & Data Integration – Experience in working with IT teams to implement claims automation and digital claims processing. - Reinsurance & Fraud Prevention – Ability to collaborate with reinsurers to ensure risk-appropriate claims handling and fraud mitigation. - Stakeholder & Third-Party Management – Strong skills in engaging with Techcombank, reinsurers, and medical service providers. - Customer-Centric Approach – Ability to balance efficient risk management with an excellent customer experience in claims processing. Personal Attributes - Detail-Oriented & Analytical – Strong ability to assess claims cases with precision and accuracy. - Proactive & Strategic Thinker – Capable of setting up claims processes from scratch while anticipating future challenges. - Customer-Focused – Ensures claims operations are transparent, efficient, and customer-friendly. - Leadership & Initiative – Capable of driving claims transformation and operational setup in a startup environment. - Collaborative & Solution-Oriented – Works effectively with internal teams, reinsurers, and third-party service providers.
Industry: Luật / Pháp lý , Hành chính / Thư ký , Bảo hiểm

Company: KDI EDUCATION
Job Description: From August 2025, KDI Office will be moved to Diamond Island (District 2) permanently!!! As a Finance and Investment Analyst for the BOD, you will play a pivotal role in supporting the board with crucial investment insights, growth scenario analysis, and engaging with funds, investors, and banks. Your primary focus will be on identifying and evaluating investment opportunities, strategizing for growth, and managing relationships with financial stakeholders. 1. Investment Analysis: Research and analyze potential investment opportunities, including emerging markets and innovative ventures. Prepare detailed investment reports, including risk assessments, return projections, and growth potential. Monitor and evaluate the performance of existing investments, recommending adjustments as needed. 2. Growth Scenario Analysis: Conduct in-depth analysis of various growth scenarios and their financial implications. Develop financial models to predict future growth and profitability under different market conditions. Provide strategic recommendations to the board based on growth scenario analyses 3. Stakeholder Engagement: Support BOD in maintaining relationships with funds & investors. Prepare and deliver presentations to potential investors and financial institutions. Support BOD in investment negotiation on deals and financing arrangements. 4. Market Research: Conduct market research to identify new investment opportunities and stay updated on industry trends and economic conditions. Provide insights and forecasts to inform investment strategies and growth plans. 5. Support in Decision Making: Gather and maintain financial data from various sources & utilize financial data to support investment decisions and growth strategies. Provide analytical support during board meetings and strategic planning sessions. Assist in developing financial models and business cases to support decision-making and growth initiatives. 6. Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with financial regulations and internal policies related to investments and stakeholder engagements. Identify and evaluate financial risks associated with investments and provide recommendations for mitigation.
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. A Master's degree or professional certification (e.g., CFA, CPA) is an advantage. At least 3-5 years of experience in investment analysis, fund management, or a related position. Experience working in the education field is a plus. Strong analytical and quantitative skills. Proficiency in financial modeling and statistical analysis, with a focus on investment and growth scenarios. Proficiency in financial software and tools. Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI) is a plus. High level of accuracy and attention to detail in investment analysis and reporting. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to work with Educational government departments. Ability to present complex financial information clearly and concisely. Excellent command of English. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Ability to handle multiple tasks and meet tight deadlines.
Industry: Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Hành chính / Thư ký , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Job Description: 1, Development, Review, and Upgrade of Credit Risk Measurement Models (e.g., Scoring/Rating, PD, LGD, EAD, Risk Pricing, Expected Loss, Economic Capital, Stress Testing, IFRS, etc.): • Organize, assign, and guide staff in the development, review, and upgrade of risk measurement models. • Develop a plan and execute the construction, review, and enhancement of risk measurement models. • Document and archive all materials related to the process of developing, reviewing, and upgrading models (in accordance with internal regulations on risk measurement model governance of the Bank). • Establish regulations, processes, policies, and guidelines related to the construction/deployment/review of risk measurement models. • Communicate and train on risk measurement models. • Analyze and propose the application/adjustment/improvement of risk measurement models. 2, Collaboration in Building and Upgrading Databases, Tools, and Systems for Credit Risk Measurement: • Organize, assign, and guide staff in building databases for risk measurement purposes, including identifying data requirements, conducting data validation, and documenting and archiving all materials related to the database construction. • Organize, assign, and guide staff in developing and upgrading risk measurement tools and systems: • Develop User Requirements Documentation (URD), create test cases, conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and develop/adjust user manuals for tools/systems. • Communicate and train users on the utilization of risk measurement tools and systems. • Document and archive all materials related to the construction and upgrading of tools/systems, user manuals, and user training. 3, Monitoring and Reporting on the Operation of Credit Risk Measurement Tools and Systems: • Organize, assign, and guide staff in the governance/monitoring and reporting of the operation of risk measurement tools and systems: • Support business units and address user inquiries. • Monitor and report potential operational risks related to the tools/systems (user behavior, system errors, etc.). • Adjust parameters of tools/systems (as authorized), modify or request modifications to tools and systems; test tools/systems after adjustments/modifications; document and archive all related materials. • Identify, receive, aggregate, and resolve issues arising in the application of risk measurement models, tools, and systems. • Propose solutions for (i) revising/upgrading/developing risk quantification models, tools, and systems; (ii) amending related documentation. 4, Management of Unit Objectives: • Develop detailed plans, assign tasks, and monitor the progress of work implementation. • Evaluate the performance of employees within the unit. • Train and support the professional development of employees in the unit; participate in the adjunct faculty program as mobilized by the Training Center. • Participate in recruitment efforts and build the team under management. • Update, disseminate, guide, and assign staff to implement relevant institutional documents. • Foster a professional, effective, and cohesive working environment within the unit. • Report to direct leadership on (i) the progress and quality of work, (ii) arising issues and solutions during the implementation process.
Job Requirements: - A minimum of 5 years in developing credit risk models/model validation/credit risk analysis, data analysis and statistics, or in Finance/Banking, with at least 2 years in a managerial role. - Education: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, Banking, or Mathematics. Preference will be given to: • Candidates who graduated in relevant specialized fields such as Financial Mathematics, Economic Mathematics, Econometrics, or Mathematical Informatics. • Candidates who have studied abroad or hold a Master's degree. • Candidates with work experience in Finance/Banking, Banking Risk Management, and a good understanding of Machine Learning. • Proficient in English for business communication. • Candidates familiar with working in an Agile Model environment. - Knowledge of credit risk model development and credit risk management, including counterparty credit risk. - Understanding of Basel II regulations. - Familiarity with policies/regulations/processes within the unit: Well-versed in internal policy processes as well as legal regulations.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: Viet Thai International
Job Description: Lead the Trade Marketing across all CPG channels—On-Premise (CVS, HoReCa, Canteens, Vending, etc.), Off-Premise (Supermarkets, Minimarts, Wholesalers), and Online - to drive sustainable revenue growth, enhance ASMPQ brand visibility at point-of-sale, and improve channel profitability. Act as the strategic bridge between Marketing, KAM, Sales, and Channel teams to develop and execute integrated trade marketing plans aligned with business goals and channel P&L ownership. Strategic Planning & Trade Marketing Leadership Own the annual and quarterly Trade Marketing for all CPG channels nationwide, aligned with brand and business objectives. Define the channel segmentation strategy, identify key growth drivers, and develop differentiated activation playbooks for each channel (On-Premise, Off-Premise, Online). Lead channel-level business planning in collaboration with Sales and Key Account teams, ensuring trade plans are embedded in the commercial strategy. Channel Performance Management & P&L Ownership Oversee and drive performance across channels to meet revenue, volume, and profit targets. Monitor channel-specific P&Ls, optimize trade investment, and improve ROI across customer types and touchpoints. Promotion & Activation Governance Oversee the design, deployment, and governance of all trade programs, including promotional calendars, in-store activations, ASMPQ visibility, and POSM development. Ensure activation excellence with strong controls on execution as of ASMPQ and in-store execution standards, budget adherence, and ROI analysis. Drive best-in-class execution through collaboration with cross-functional teams and third-party partners (agencies, suppliers,...). Data, Insights & Process Optimization Lead post-activity evaluations, performance dashboards, and trade marketing effectiveness reviews (promotion, display, sampling, ...) Champion the use of off-take data and shopper insights to inform investment decisions, and channel development opportunities. Continuously improve trade processes, tools, and playbooks to elevate operational excellence and agility Leadership & Capability Building Build and lead a high-performing Trade Marketing team across channel verticals, instilling commercial mindset, operational discipline, and shopper-centric thinking. Foster collaboration across Marketing, KAM, Sales, Supply Chain, and F&A to ensure aligned execution and value creation. Develop succession plans and talent development roadmaps for the Trade Marketing function.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. Experience: 8–12 years of experience in Trade Marketing, Channel Management, or Commercial roles within FMCG/CPG. Work related skills Proven track record in managing trade strategies across multiple channels (modern trade, general trade, on-premise, and digital commerce). Strong analytical and strategic thinking; P&L ownership experience preferred. Excellent leadership, influencing, and cross-functional collaboration skills. Fluent in commercial planning tools, data analysis, and performance tracking systems. Soft skills Microsoft (Excel, PPT) Power BI Advanced level of English (English speaking fluency). E-commerce
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống

Company: Concung.com - Con Cung Joint Stock Company
Job Description: The Online Commercial Leader – Product Owner will take lead in projects aimed at improving the company’s eCommerce platform. The role involves gathering requirements, describing user stories, and building dashboards to capture key performance metrics. It also includes collaborating with stakeholders to plan, participate in, and execute integration testing, functional and non-functional testing, as well as user acceptance testing (UAT). This position will be part of the e-Commerce team. Key stakeholders are Brand Managers, Sales Growth Leaders, and Product Development team, as well as internal e-Commerce teams to implement new features. External Function Requirement Understand business objectives and user needs to guide product development direction. Collaborate with Product Development, Sales Growth, and Operations teams to ensure all web/app features meet business requirements. Collect, analyse, and prioritize requirements from stakeholders. Coordinate with the development team to ensure accurate understanding and implementation of features. Perform feature testing and acceptance (UAT) before official releases. Internal Function Requirement Partner with O2O and Livestream teams to gather internal needs for the web/app and livestream platforms. Align feature development with internal operations and customer experience goals. Coordinate feedback loops and testing across internal teams to enhance usability and relevance of features. Document Collection Collect, structure, and maintain documentation of business requirements and feature specifications. Record and update release information including scope, behavior, purpose, and user impact. Ensure all documentation is clear, consistent, and accessible to both business and technical stakeholders. Business Intelligence Design and develop dynamic dashboards to visualize key eCommerce performance metrics (e.g., sales, cost, voucher, user behaviour, etc.). Work closely with EC-functional teams to identify reporting needs and translate them into actionable insights. Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and timely updates to support data-driven decision making. ------------------------------------- About Concung.com Working time: 8:30 - 17:30 Monday - Friday Working place: 14th Floor, Phu My Hung Tower, Tan Phu Ward, Dist. 7, HCMC
Job Requirements: Having bachelor’s degree in computer science, data analysis, or related field. Having 3 years of related BA experience and 1–2 years of technical BA experience in eCommerce projects. Knowledge of UX/UI; basic experience working with Figma and creating wireframes. Knowledge of Excel, SQL, Power BI is a plus ------------------------------------------------ Benefit Annual bonus: 2 - 3 months under minimum KPI requirement Fast promotion opportunities based on personal ability Work in a dynamic, open, creative environment Regular training, company team building, birthday bonus
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Thương mại điện tử

Job Title: Brand Executive (WH/GI) - Abbott Pharmaceuticals (3rd Party Contract)
Company: Abbott
Job Description: WORKING AT ABBOTT At Abbott, we believe that the access to high-quality, trusted branded generics is essential to the success of patients’ treatment all over the world. That’s why our business brings value to its patients and customers through deep localization and a growing portfolio of high-quality established pharmaceutical products. As the leader in branded generics, we serve the people in emerging markets across the continuum of their lives. We commit our talent and enthusiasm to earn our customers trust by providing innovative, affordable medicines and healthcare solutions In Vietnam, Abbott’s Established Pharmaceuticals Division has committed to enhance the care of patients. Our products cover several therapeutic areas, including gastroenterology, women health, cardiology, primary care, specialty and food supplement. Our key prescription products include Lipanthyl, Klacid, Duphaston, Drosperin and BetaSerc. Our key over-the-counter products are Duphalac, CG210, Estraceptin, Brufen, Fatig, Surbex. We also have the Influvac vaccine. MAIN PURPOSE OF THE ROLE • Develop strategic approach in implementation for brand strategy • Show excellent execution of marketing activities • Conduct stakeholder management well MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES • Build brand plan for assigned products & execute marketing with Marketing Manager effectively & efficiently. • Develop sufficient promotional materials such as brochures, catalogues, information booklet which are in line with product positioning. • Cooperate with related partners (in-house or outsource) to do market surveys on promotional programs to understand customer behaviors, perception, and acceptance. • Evaluate effectiveness of promotion efforts through strictly follow up the execution of promotional programs. • Support in developing product training to field force on an ongoing basis. • Keep Field Force updated on product knowledge and competitor information. • Review complaints and propose solutions relating to assigned products. • Collect, compile, verify, analyze data on market trends, consumer behaviour and competitor activities to propose market opportunities for product. • Collect, compile, verify, analyze data on product performance and customer feedback and make report to relevant managers. • Provide information in forecasting market’s product demand, identify potential supply issues, and develop contingency plans. • Actively assist Marketing team in arranging symposiums, seminars, public education and exhibitions in coordination with field force.
Job Requirements: MINIMUM BACKGROUND/ EXPERIENCE REQUIRED Work Experience: • More than 2-3 years experience relate in a representative role in the pharma Industry • Comprehensive industry knowledge Professional skills: • Communication skill • Project management skill • Data analysis • Customer insight Behavioral skills: • Continuous Improvement behavior • Apply Abbott Capabilities Framework Language skills: • Good at English and Vietnamese Computer skills: • Good knowledge of computer-based programs including spreadsheets and graphics. MINIMUM EDUCATION REQUIRED • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in pharmacist.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Dược phẩm/ Hóa Mỹ Phẩm , Y tế / Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp

Company: Thermtrol Co., Ltd.
Job Description: Follow company rules and all procedures/instructions. Monitor and maintain production improvement goals. Create production schedules based on customer orders. Report production plans based on the Master Plan from Customer Service. Make sure production meets delivery timelines and customer requirements. Use production resources (people, machines, tools) efficiently. Work with other departments to improve quality, productivity, and delivery. Plan and improve production activities. Estimate labor needs and suggest changes to improve processes or layout. Train team members on safety, new products, processes, and job skills. Track production progress and fix problems quickly to stay on schedule. Check and control materials and product stock during production. Join internal audits and help with improvement actions. Experience : At least 2–3 years of experience in production planning or manufacturing operations. Experience working in a foreign manufacturing company is a plus. Knowledge & Skills : Good understanding of production processes, planning, and scheduling. Familiar with lean manufacturing, inventory control, and improvement tools. Strong data analysis, reporting, and problem-solving skills. Language : Good English communication (written and verbal). Computer skills : Proficient in MS Excel, Word, PowerPoint. Soft skills : Good teamwork and coordination with cross-functional departments. Strong attention to detail, time management, and ability to work under pressure. Positive attitude, continuous improvement mindset.

Job Description: Account Management : build great partnership with person-in-charge (PIC) of OTAs to manage partnerships and optimize business opportunities. Job Description: • Implementation of Huawei storage, virtualization and server products including enterprise storage devices, storage solutions (business continuity, disaster recovery, data migration, etc… ), cloud storage, virtualization suite, cloud computing software & tools, rack servers, blade servers, high density servers and related storage/server management software. • Providing project/solution implementation in coordination with partner and/or cross-functional team members to have the ICT network implemented on time. • Providing technical support, handling problem analysis and providing other required service to company’s agents and other valued service partner. • Providing support and guidance to company’s service partner which relate to technical enquiry, issue analysis, technical solution and document. • Assisting and auditing project designs and solutions for company’s partner and customer. • Recognizing problems need to be escalated to HQ and keep track of the whole process flow. • Providing support to sales team which includes solution demonstration, configuration guide, presales testing, and service presentation. • Resolving single- and cross technology incidents independently, and working with team members to resolve unusually complex or cross technology incidents. • Planning and execution of product demonstrations and proof of concept tests in the pre-sales cycle by closely cooperating with the sales team. • Designing and implementing data migration projects.
Job Requirements: • Bachelor’s degree in Electronics, Computer Engineering or related discipline. • Excellent Chinese verbal, written, and communication skills. • Prefer has experience of installing and implementing server operating systems, virtualization, VDI, HCI, data backup software, object storage, SAN, NAS and related technologies in an enterprise environment. • Has experience of administrating server and storage systems. • Having ability to install, operate and maintain monitoring and management systems. • Ability to provide basic network level support including configurations, diagnostics, and troubleshooting. • Must be able to multitask and work under pressure. • Vendor certification will be a plus. • Able to travel domestic and international. WORKING TIME AND BENEFITS: 1. Monday to Friday (08:30-18:00) 2. Short-term and long-term awards 3. Huawei University online and offline aboard training 4. Participating in full insurance benefits (health insurance, social insurance, unemployment insurance), the company supports 24/24 accident insurance and health care insurance for employees. 5. Professional and multi-cultural working environment, clear career development opportunities. Cultural and sports activities, taking care of employees' health and life are organized periodically... 6. Salary: negotiable and competitive.

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH CÔNG NGHỆ VÀ GIẢI PHÁP PHẦN MỀM CROSSIAN VIỆT NAM
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Develop and execute performance marketing strategies on platform to acquire customers and boost customer lifetime value. Plan, set up, and optimize Facebook advertising campaigns effectively. Dive deep into campaign data to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign success, and make data-driven decisions for optimization. Collaborate closely with our creative, analytics, and product teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and cohesive messaging. Keep your finger on the pulse of Facebook advertising trends, best practices, and changes in the ecosystem, so we can stay ahead of the curve. Test and iterate ad creatives, audience segments, and campaign strategies to continuously improve performance and maximize return on investment. Provide regular reports to stakeholders, sharing insights, highlighting successes, addressing challenges, and identifying optimization opportunities.
Job Requirements: A bachelor's degree in Finance, Marketing, Business, or a related field. Extra points if you graduated from top universities (local or global) and had a GPA that sparkled. 3-5 years of experience in performance marketing, with a focus on Facebook advertising. Proven track record of driving significant growth and achieving outstanding results in performance marketing campaigns. Strong analytical skills and ability to extract valuable insights from data to optimize campaigns and deliver business outcomes. In-depth knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager, including campaign setup, audience targeting, bidding strategies, and optimization techniques. Familiarity with performance marketing metrics such as ROAS, CPA, LTV, and conversion rates. Experience in the e-commerce industry or with direct-to-consumer brands is a plus. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include: Attractive salary, bonus, fair and transparent scheme, income up to $7000/month (basic salary up to $ 1000 depending on capacity) Flexible, non-binding working time and space according to office hours Full salary during probation 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave Global health insurance package for yourself Guaranteed 13th month salary Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events General company T&D Program Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws Please note that we appreciate all applicants for their interest; however, only those candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Quảng cáo / Đối ngoại / Truyền Thông
