Company: CÔNG TY TNHH CÔNG NGHỆ VÀ GIẢI PHÁP PHẦN MỀM CROSSIAN VIỆT NAM
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: WHO IS YOUR MENTOR? 1. Head of Marketing 2. Sale & Marketing Manager 3. Content Manager 4. Product Marketing Experts CAREER ROADMAP Step 1: Crossian Aptitude Test Step 2: Interview Step 3: 1-month Onboarding Program Step 3.1: Knowledge training in D2C Business model, Acquisition Funnel & Management know-how Step 3.2: Knowledge training in Product content creation framework & Product fit market approach Step 3.3: Training in Product development life cycle Step 3.4: Onjob Step 4: Become a Product Marketing Specialist WHAT YOU WILL DO Market Research & Product Positioning - Conduct comprehensive market research to identify product-market fit in the retail industry, analyzing customer preferences, industry trends, and competitor performance to enhance product offerings. - Leverage data insights to ensure that our fashion products stand out in a competitive market and drive growth. Go-to-Market Strategy & Execution - Be the market guru, identifying US customer trends, consumer preferences, and competitor move - Mastermind go-to-market product marketing strategy for our fashion products that keeps engagement high and conversions rolling in Content Creation and Distribution - Oversee the production of top-tier content, from viral video creatives to jaw-dropping websites - Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in product marketing, implementing innovative strategies to drive results Analytics and Performance Optimization - Keep a keen eye on digital content performance and metrics, optimizing for conversions - Utilize data insights to identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions to optimize conversion rate Cross-functional Collaboration - Collaborate with Graphics and Video teams, and other creators to make visually impactful content - Collaborate with in-house teams to make sure selected product features meet industry quality standards; marketing collaterals align with market trends and customer needs - Collaborate with Performance Marketing team to track, analyze, and report on sales, advertising metrics and KPIs to measure marketing campaign effectiveness
Job Requirements: Work experience: - Track record of copywriting viral videos or building a personal/commercial brand presence on TikTok/Facebook - Proven career advancement in digital/ product content marketing or holding an equivalent title in previous role(s) - Strong understanding of market research, data analysis, and consumer behavior - Experience in e-commerce or as a retail/ e-commerce shop owner is a plus Skills: - Video ideation and script writing. No direct filming or editing skills required. - Strong command of English with contextual understanding to create compelling and audience-focused content - Critical thinking and problem solving skills - Research, task management and collaboration skills - Presentation or training/ mentoring/ coaching skill is a plus Other qualifications: - Customer-centric and proactive mindset - Aptitude for turning data into actionable insights - Passion for continuous learning and professional development - Ability to self-motivate and perform under pressure - A keen eye for detail WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include: - Well-trained program by our marketing experts, from technical skills by our seniors to soft skills by our team leads and managers - Clear & transparent career development and promotion opportunities, excel to Product Marketing Manager position within 2-3 years - Attractive salary, bonus, fair and transparent scheme, income up to $5000/month (basic salary up to $1000 depending on capacity) - Full salary during probation - 12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave - Global health insurance package for yourself - Guaranteed 13th month salary - Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program - A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve - Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events - General company T&D Program - Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws
Experience: Track record of copywriting viral videos or building a personal/commercial brand presence on TikTok/Facebook
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Truyền hình / Báo chí / Biên tập , Quảng cáo / Đối ngoại / Truyền Thông

Job Title: Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp Quản Trị Rủi Ro Danh Mục
Company: CÔNG TY TÀI CHÍNH BƯU ĐIỆN
Job Description: Thực hiện xây dựng hệ thống báo cáo danh mục phù hợp với nhu cầu sử dụng của đơn vị, cấp trên và đảm bảo tính tin cậy cao; chuẩn hóa và tăng tỷ lệ các báo cáo tự động và realtime; xây dựng hệ thống báo cáo quản trị khoa học, dễ hiểu và có tính cảnh báo. Develop a portfolio reporting system tailored to the needs of departments and manager, ensuring high reliability; standardize and increase the proportion of automated and real-time reports; build a scientific, clear, and warning-enabled management reporting system. Theo dõi định kỳ, thường xuyên và phân tích chất lượng danh mục cho vay theo nhiều chiều khác nhau nhằm phản ánh được chất lượng danh mục theo sản phẩm, theo kênh bán, theo vùng niềm, theo chân dung khách hàng, theo đối tượng bán, theo thời gian … nhằm đưa ra cảnh báo, giải pháp quản trị chất lượng danh mục theo các chiều đó. Regularly monitor and analyze the quality of the loan portfolio across multiple dimensions, such as product, sales channel, region, customer profile, seller type, and time, to provide insights and solutions for portfolio quality management. Đề xuất các giải pháp đảm bảo chất lượng danh mục và theo dõi, giám sát, báo cáo việc thực hiện các giải pháp đó, bao gồm nhưng không giới hạn các loại báo cáo cảnh báo sớm, báo cáo chất lượng nợ và dự phòng rủi ro, báo cáo nhóm nợ, tỷ lệ tổn thất, rủi ro cận biên... và các giải pháp giảm thiểu rủi ro. Propose solutions to ensure portfolio quality and monitor, supervise, and report on their implementation, including but not limited to early warning reports, debt quality and risk provision reports, debt classification reports, loss ratio, and marginal risk reports. Định kỳ tính toán, đo lường, báo cáo các chỉ số tài chính về rủi ro theo quy định của luật pháp, NHNN, chủ sở hữu và quy định nội bộ của công ty… và các báo cáo phân tích, đánh giá cùng giải pháp xử lý (nếu cần). Periodically calculate, measure, and report financial risk indicators in compliance with legal regulations, the State Bank of Vietnam, shareholders, and the company's internal policies. Provide analytical reports with proposed solutions when necessary. Đầu mối hệ thống báo cáo định kỳ theo quy định của Luật pháp, NHNN và các cơ quan chủ quản, cơ quan chức năng khác mà công ty cần thực hiện (xây dựng, tính toán, gửi báo cáo, quản trị dữ liệu…) theo phân công của CBQL. Act as the focal point for regulatory reports required by law, the State Bank of Vietnam, and other regulatory authorities that the company must comply with (including report preparation, calculation, submission, and data management) as assigned by management. Thực hiện các công việc khác do cấp trên giao. Perform other tasks assigned by superiors.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên hoặc bằng cấp tương đương chuyên ngành liên quan đến số liệu như toán ứng dụng, thống kê, kinh tế lượng, tài chính ngân hàng, quản lý thông tin, nghiên cứu vận hành… Bachelor's degree or higher (or equivalent qualification) in data-related majors, such as applied mathematics, statistics, econometrics, finance & banking, information management, or operations research. Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm trong phân tích và thống kê số liệu. At least 3 years of experience in data analysis and statistics Ưu tiên người có kinh nghiệm liên quan đến phân tích tín dụng, MIS và quản trị rủi ro tín dụng… Preference for candidates with experience in credit portfolio analysis, Management Information Systems (MIS), and credit risk management... Có khả năng nghiên cứu, phân tích, phát hiện, đánh giá, nắm bắt, nhận xét, tổng hợp, phân loại vấn đề rủi ro tín dụng Strong analytical and research skills, with the ability to identify, assess, summarize, and categorize credit risk issues. Khả năng nghiên cứu, phân tích số liệu; sử dụng thành thạo Excel, SQL, Oracle. Proficiency in data analysis tools, including Excel, SQL and Oracle. Có khả năng sử dụng tốt các phần mềm để hỗ trợ phân tích, dự báo như PowerBI, SQL, Excel macro. Ability to use analytical and forecasting software effectively, such as Power BI, SQL, and Excel macro. Khả năng nghiên cứu, tiếp cận các vấn đề phức tạp với định hướng ứng dụng thực tế Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to approach complex issues with practical application.
Industry: Ngân hàng , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Job Title: Nhân viên tư vấn giáo dục
Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN HỌC VIỆN MINH TRÍ THÀNH
Job Description: - Tư vấn cho phụ huynh về các khóa học (data khách hàng có sẵn, không cần tìm kiếm) - Giải đáp thắc mắc, hỗ trợ chốt đơn, chăm sóc khách hàng và đồng hành cùng họ Lĩnh vực: Giáo dục – Khóa học dành cho phụ huynh & con cái Làm việc tại Cầu Giấy - Hà Nội / TP.HCM / Bắc Ninh
Job Requirements: - KHÔNG YÊU CẦU KINH NGHIỆM, được đào tạo bài bản từ A-Z - Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tư vấn/kinh doanh/ chăm sóc khách hàng, ưu tiên trong lĩnh vực giáo dục, đào tạo, hoặc tư vấn dịch vụ giá trị cao. - Khả năng giao tiếp tốt, tư vấn thuyết phục khách hàng hiệu quả, và xử lý tình huống khéo léo. - Chủ động trong công việc, có khả năng làm việc dưới áp lực để đạt doanh số cao. Company: Stella Leather Goods (Ho Chi Minh)
Job Description: Quality Team Management Develop and implement quality control processes, procedures, and policies to ensure that products or services meet or exceed customer expectation. Monitor and analyze data related to quality control processes, identifying trends, and making recommendations for improvement. Communicate with other teams, departments, and stakeholders to ensure that quality control processes are aligned with business objectives. Perform audits of quality control processes, identifying areas for improvement and making recommendations for corrective action. Manage and maintain quality control documentation, ensuring that all necessary records and reports are accurate and up-to-date. Participate in cross-functional teams to develop and implement new products or services, ensuring that quality control processes are integrated into the development process. Work closely with cross function teams for problem preventing and solving. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices related to quality control, sharing knowledge and insights with team members and stakeholders. Follow up all customer complaint, work with cross function teams for CAP. Define and manage the Quality Strategy for Leather Goods, contributing to and in line with the overall Supply Chain Strategy: execute QA strategy / procedures / standards, establish KPI for the quality team in line with the overall supply chain KPI. Responsible for review and share digital / physical product standards and key attributes to central quality team, hubs and distribution teams. Driving budget & monitoring spending to deliver results in line with planned objectives. Quality Team Training and Improvement Lead and manage a team of quality control personnel, providing guidance, coaching, and supports as needed. Train team members on quality control processes, procedures, and policies, ensuring that they have the knowledge and skills necessary to perform their jobs effectively. New staff on board training Quality Standard Setting Work with suppliers and vendors to ensure that raw material and components meet established quality standards. Review all new developed samples (styles), give necessary comments for any potential risk in production or construction issue. Join all the review meeting, work closely with Product Development / Technical Team for bulk production friendly. Check raw material and work with Raw Material and Production Management Team for bulk standard setting. Lead on site Pre-Production meeting with cross function teams, follow up the sample call out, share the good practice, discuss the check point and set up detailed quality standard. Review the Pilot run for all new styles, lead the pilot run meeting with cross function teams. Collaborate with technical, industrialization and production teams to set up quality standards on product and to manage quality elevation alongside with full process. In agreement with Technical department, revise and implement product standards on materials and finished products and define quality inspection guidelines. Raise and document all the quality risks related to new collection items, providing a complete risk assessment report. Responsible for co-validating the sealing sample for final product approval and for co-validating the pre-production samples replicating the sealed product across contractors and vendors. Set clear standard of each below standard based on each brand: ① Material Defect allowance ② Workmanship standard and allowance ③ Leather Goods Type workmanship allowance Laboratory Operation Provide and follow up the test plan for materials, components, and finished product; ensure that test fail are addressed and solved in a timely manner. Make sure laboratory test SOP, standard, verifying results and judgement are following standard. Make sure laboratory test lead time and can catch up product development and bulk production. Make sure laboratory environment, facility, equipment and tool are maintained / neat / function. Laboratory test report are input and generate from system. And make sure test report are submit on-time. IQC Make sure IQC team follow inspection procedure based on each type of material / WIP. Make sure IQC team inspection and judge result based on correct standard. Make sure IQC team use correct tool or equipment to get accurate inspection result. Make ensure lead time of IQC inspection. On-time inspection report submitting to relevant parties. Make sure IQC team conduct IQC quality meeting after inspection, to share result and material issues to relevant teams. Organize and share periodical vendor quality reports, returns performance, inspection reports & return analysis, to discuss and agree required improvements with industrialization / technical teams and vendors / contractors as needed. Production QC Make sure production QC understand quality standard of each product, each brand. No discrepancy of quality standard between Production QC, Development QC, IQC and Laboratory. So quality standard is transparent through all quality team. Make sure production QC conduct correct operation, procedure, and strategies which management decided Ensure efficient operation and inspection. Ensure inspection result and data is accurate. Implement digital tools to make inspection work efficient and accurate. Ensure no any complaint from customer about bulk Finished Good or Top Sample Quality. Development QC Make sure Development QC follow operation, procedure and strategies which management decided. Ensure efficient operation and inspection. Ensure data and documentation is accurate and correct. Ensure data, documents and standard will transfer from development QC at development stage, and transparent through quality team. Ensure Development QC check WIP and FG of samples on-time. Other : Other tasks or projects assigned by management.
Job Requirements: Have more than 2 years of exeperience in Quality Manager in Garment industry Skills: Team management, Project / Time management, Communication, Problem solving skills, Basic Office (Word, Excel, Power Points) and ERP software operating skill Good at English (4 skills) Knowledge in global quality and production standards. Excellent analytical skills, with the ability to analyze data and identify trends. Excellent organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities simultaneously. Knowledge of quality control processes, procedures, and policies. Knowledge of relevant industry standards and regulations. Business Trip for meeting, conference or training will be required.
Industry: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất , Dệt may / Da giày / Thời trang , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY The Test Lab Engineer will be responsible for operating and maintaining advanced imaging equipment, including CT (Computed Tomography) scanners and SEM-EDS (Scanning Electron Microscope with Energy Dispersive X-ray Spectroscopy), to analyze lithium-ion cells. This role supports internal structure inspection and detailed electrode material analysis to aid in cell development, failure analysis, and quality assurance KEY RESPONSIBILITIES AND AUTHORITIES Operate and maintain CT scanner and SEM-EDS equipment for structural and electrode material analysis of lithium-ion cells. Perform imaging and elemental analysis using SEM-EDS to assess electrode surface morphology and composition. Conduct CT scans to visualize internal cell structure and detect defects or abnormalities. Analyze and interpret imaging and spectroscopy data to support R&D, Quality, and Manufacturing teams. Document procedures and results thoroughly, ensuring traceability and compliance with lab standards. Ensure periodic calibration and preventive maintenance of lab instruments. Promote and adhere to safety protocols in all lab operations. Train and support team members in related subjects of reliable test labs
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Materials Science, Material Technology, Chemistry, Physics, Chemical Engineering or related field Experience: Minimum 1 year of experience using CT and SEM-EDS in batteries, materials, or analytical lab setting Knowledge: Strong understanding of lithium-ion cell structures, electrode materials, and imaging/spectroscopy principles Functional Skills: SEM-EDS analysis, CT imaging, sample preparation, data interpretation, detailed documentation Other Abilities: Critical thinking, collaboration, effective communication, and a proactive approach to problem-solving

Job Title: * Quality Control Engineer (Work at Dong Nai, shuttle bus provided)
Company: Techtronic Industries Vietnam Manufacturing Company Limited
Job Description: JOB SUMMARY This role leads a team at the Milwaukee HT Vietnam factory, overseeing In-Process Quality Control (IPQC), Outgoing Quality Control (OQC), and process quality support. Collaborates with cross-functional teams to ensure customer satisfaction and drive continuous improvement. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Manage IPQC and OQC to ensure products meet internal and customer quality standards. Support manufacturing process improvements, conduct failure analysis, handle non-conforming products, and implement effective corrective/preventive actions. Establish IPQC/OQC processes, including sampling plans, process audits, non-conformance handling, and data collection/analysis (Critical Features, DPPM). Address customer complaints, implement preventive measures, and verify their effectiveness. Maintain and optimize quality management systems (SOP, OI/WI) per ISO 9001 standards. Train team members to meet job requirements. Collaborate with other departments to meet delivery schedules and production goals while maintaining quality standards.
Job Requirements: Education: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mechanical, Chemical, Industrial, Electrical/Electronic Engineering, or Science. Experience: 3 years in quality control. Knowledge: 7 QC Tools, 5 Core Tools. ISO 9001:2015 or IATF 16949:2016. Problem-solving skills (8D, 5 Why, Fishbone, Pareto). Skills: Auditing skills. Proficient in Minitab. Familiar with ASTM, GB, or JIS standards. Data analysis. Fluent in English. Other Abilities: Proficient in MS Excel and PowerPoint, strong teamwork skills.

Company: CT Semiconductor
Job Description: CT Semiconductor is a strategic member of CT Group. We are pioneers in the semiconductor industry – the foundational technology powering future innovations such as AI, IoT, electric vehicles, and smart devices. Key Responsibilities: Customer Interface & Support Serve as the technical point-of-contact for test-related issues, escalations, and inquiries at the customer site. Support customer requirements for test development, validation, and production ramp-up. Collaborate with customer engineers to understand specifications, timelines, and quality expectations. Provide timely feedback and updates to internal teams and customers on test performance and issue resolution. OSAT Test Oversight Oversee day-to-day test operations at OSATs including test program deployment, hardware debugging, and yield monitoring. Ensure test equipment and handlers at OSAT sites are functioning as expected and properly maintained. Support and audit OSATs to ensure compliance with test procedures, quality standards, and documentation. Participate in test hardware reviews (load boards, probe cards) and interface with test engineering and hardware design teams. Test Process Improvement Drive root cause analysis and resolution of test escapes, yield losses, and test time inefficiencies. Analyze test data to identify trends, anomalies, and areas for improvement. Work with OSATs to implement process changes or test optimization strategies to enhance throughput, yield, and test coverage. Support Golden Device and correlation activities between sites, testers, and test platforms. NPI and Change Management Support New Product Introduction (NPI) from test development handoff to production ramp at OSATs. Coordinate with R&D and central test engineering to validate and release test programs. Manage test engineering change orders (ECOs), including program revisions, binning changes, and test flow updates. Ensure seamless test program and hardware transitions across test platforms or OSAT sites. Documentation & Reporting Maintain up-to-date documentation of test flows, procedures, change logs, and qualification records. Generate regular reports on test KPIs (yield, OEE, retest rate, escapes, etc.) for both internal and customer review. Track and report OSAT performance metrics, and lead business reviews with key stakeholders.
Job Requirements: Requirements: Education & Experience Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related discipline. 3 years of experience in semiconductor test engineering or OSAT management. Company: XP Power  Vietnam
Job Description: As an EHS Officer, your primary responsibility will be to ensure the organization's compliance with environmental, health, and safety regulations and standards embed safety into XP’s culture / behaviors. You will work closely with employees, management, Global EHS and regulatory bodies to develop, implement, and monitor effective EHS policies and procedures. Responsibilities: 1. EHS Compliance, Policy and Procedure Development: Stay up-to-date with local, state, and federal regulations related to environmental, health, and safety. Ensure the organization's compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards. Conduct regular inspections and audits to identify and address potential EHS risks and non-compliance issues. Establish, implement, and maintain EHS policies, procedures, and guidelines. Communicate with cross functions & employees on EHS policies, procedures, and regulations. Review and update policies and procedures to reflect changes in regulations or organizational needs. 2. Risk Assessment and Hazard Identification : Conduct annual risk assessments and hazard identification or in case of change for all the processes across the organization & develop strategies to mitigate and control risks. Collaborate with relevant departments to implement effective controls and preventive measures​​​​​​ 3. Emergency Preparedness: Develop and implement emergency response plans and procedures. Conduct emergency drills and exercises to test emergency response capabilities. Coordinate with relevant stakeholders to ensure readiness for potential emergencies 4. Incident Management: Investigate incidents, accidents, and near misses to determine root causes and develop corrective actions. Maintain incident reporting systems and documentation. Track and analyze incident data to identify trends and implement preventive measures. 5. Training and Education: Establish EHS training plan & conduct annual & refreshing training as planned for employees and contractors. Provide ongoing EHS training and education to enhance awareness and knowledge. Oversee & improving process of chemical safety management activities such as PPE matrix management, training, monitoring & SDS availability. 6. EHS Performance Monitoring and Reporting: Establish, consolidate and coordinate with relevant departments to lead the 5S improvement program of the factory according to the guidelines from Global. Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to monitor EHS/ESG/Net Zero performance. Collect and analyze data to evaluate EHS performance and identify areas for improvement. Provide First Aid Response for medical emergencies including injuries, chemical exposures, and fainting incidents Prepare and submit relating reports to management and regulatory bodies as required. 7. Waste Management Optimize waste management process ( industrial waste, domestic waste, hazardous waste & waste water,…) to identify cost-saving opportunities Conduct training sessions to employees on the best practices for waste reduction and recycling. Develop and implement waste minimization strategies 8. Continuous Improvement: Continuously assess and improve EHS management systems and processes. Implement best practices and industry standards to enhance EHS performance. Stay informed about new developments and advancements in EHS practices. Cordination with customer audit & ISO 14001, 9001, 13485 audit from 3rd party. Establish & implement corrective action plan for all the EHS findings from the audits May perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Occupational Health and Safety, Environmental Science, or a related field. Good at English communication. Must be able to work within a team structure and work collaboratively to implement safety programs. Proactive & Good at problem solving skills At least 5-6 years of experiences as EHS Engineer/Officer/ Supervisor in a manufacturing company ( Electronic is preferred). Experiences, skills and knowledge in machine safety, electrical safety, LOTO, chemical safety, lifting safety, contractor management In-depth knowledge of environmental, health, and safety regulations and standards. Familiarity with industry-specific EHS requirements and best practices. Strong understanding of risk assessment methodologies and hazard identification techniques. Excellent knowledge of incident investigation and root cause analysis. Experience in developing and delivering EHS training programs. Proficient in analyzing data and preparing reports. Professional certifications in EHS (e.g., NEBOSH, OSHA) are desirable.
Industry: Môi trường

Job Description: Position Overview We are looking for a Talent Acquisition Specialist with solid experience and strong growth potential to take on a key role in proactively sourcing, screening, and selecting qualified candidates for our real estate services, mortgage, valuation, and other internal departments. You will also be responsible for implementing employer branding strategies to proactively attract high-quality talents from both within and outside the industry. Analyze, assess, and consolidate hiring needs from different departments and business units. Assist in building, updating, and managing job descriptions (JDs) for all positions aligned with business requirements. Execute the full recruitment cycle effectively, including job posting, sourcing, screening, interviewing (initial & final), offering, onboarding, and supporting contract signing. Propose, develop, and execute sourcing strategies and channels to attract potential candidates effectively. Build and organize candidate pools by job group to support recurring and urgent recruitment needs. Prepare regular (weekly/monthly) reports on recruitment performance, sources, timelines, and cost metrics. Analyze data to propose improvements in hiring processes and talent attraction strategies. Stay updated on the latest recruitment trends and recommend process optimizations accordingly. Perform other tasks as assigned by the direct manager.
Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Human Resource Management or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of recruitment experience, preferably in real estate, digital finance, or valuation industries. Knowledge of labor laws, compliance issues, and hiring regulations. Strong skills in drafting, negotiation, and presentation. Passionate about technology; proficient in using social media (Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn...), AI chat tools, and online sourcing platforms. Excellent multitasking and time management skills to meet deadlines. A team-oriented mindset with a strong willingness to support colleagues. Quick learner with the ability to adopt new tech tools, especially data management and AI-based recruitment tools. Resilient, proactive, flexible, and able to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.

Train business leaders on the Group’s planning methods. Help teams explain the logic behind their targets and business plans. Manage a central record of all planning assumptions for transparency. 2. Business Planning Advisory Act as an analytical partner to support commercial strategy and planning. Provide templates and tools to guide business planning. Review and challenge plans when needed; escalate major issues to leadership. 3. Business Reporting Management Create and update weekly and monthly reporting templates. Ensure all units use reports consistently and correctly. Manage the reporting cycle; track on-time and complete submissions. Flag and help resolve data quality or reporting delays. 4. Performance Monitoring & Insights Review business reports to identify key trends and performance issues. Advise teams on how to act on report findings. Summarize important insights for senior management. 5. Tools & Governance Ownership Own and manage planning templates and reporting frameworks. Keep all updates tracked, documented, and shared. Work with the analytics team when technical changes are needed.
Job Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, Management, or a related field. Master’s degree is a plus. 3–5 years of experience in business planning, internal consulting, or commercial performance roles. Prior experience working with multi-unit or multi-country operations (preferably in Southeast Asia). Familiar with monthly performance tracking, business planning cycles, and commercial reporting processes. Strong Excel and PowerPoint skills for planning and reporting. Experience using reporting tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau) to analyze and visualize data. Able to manage templates, processes, and documentation with discipline. Excellent communication in both English and Vietnamese. Knowledge of additional Southeast Asian languages is a plus.
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Giáo dục / Đào tạo

Job Title: Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp - Công Nghệ Marketing (Martech)
Company: Phu Hung Securities Corporation
Job Description: Bạn sẽ là người thực hiện việc triển khai hệ thống công nghệ marketing (MarTech) giúp phòng Marketing vận hành hiệu quả, đo lường chính xác và tối ưu chuyển đổi. Đồng thời, bạn sẽ phối hợp triển khai các hoạt động digital marketing để đảm bảo hiệu suất chiến dịch. Martech: 70% Quản trị và tối hoạt động automation, email marketing, chatbot, data integration. Thiết kế các phễu lead generation, nurturing, workflow, và triển khai automation đa bước. Thiết lập và giám sát tracking sự kiện (event-based tracking) thông qua Google Tag Manager & GA4. Xây dựng dashboard báo cáo công việc qua Power BI. Tích cực đề xuất và áp dụng công cụ AI/automation giúp giảm thao tác thủ công, tăng tốc độ triển khai. Là người cố vấn kỹ thuật nội bộ cho team marketing khi triển khai các chiến dịch cần nền tảng công nghệ hỗ trợ. Digital Marketing: 30% Xây dựng các campaign promotion, thu hút khách hàng tiềm năng và tối ưu performance. Đề xuất tối ưu landing page, conversion flow dựa trên dữ liệu tracking. Tham gia xây dựng nội dung cá nhân hóa (email/landing) dựa trên phân khúc người dùng. Phân tích insight hành vi và hỗ trợ xác định touchpoint cần tối ưu trong hành trình khách hàng.
Job Requirements: Tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành: Marketing, Kinh tế, Hệ thống thông tin, Phân tích dữ liệu, v.v. Có 5–6 năm kinh nghiệm triển khai thực tế các nền tảng CRM, marketing automation, tracking, MarTech. Có hiểu biết và tư duy triển khai AI tools trong marketing (ChatGPT, MidJourney, Kling AI, Sora..). Tư duy logic, nhạy bén trong kinh doanh, chi tiết, có khả năng truyền đạt kỹ thuật cho team non-tech. Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu (PowerBI/Tableau/Google Data Studio)
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Chứng khoán , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: TCL (Vietnam) Corporation Limited
Job Description: TCL is seeking a Senior E-Merchandise & Performance Ads Operation professional to lead and optimize our digital shelf presence and paid media performance across key e-commerce platforms. This role requires a strategic mindset, strong execution capability, and cross-functional coordination to ensure end-to-end excellence in both merchandising setup and media operation. You will be accountable for improving product visibility, conversion, and return on ad spend (ROAS) by leading initiatives across onsite display, campaign asset management, and performance ads planning. 1.Onsite Merchandising Management (50%) − Own and lead the planning, briefing, and implementation of thumbnails, SIS banners, landing pages (LDPs), and package banners across platforms. − Audit and optimize Product Detail Pages (PDPs) to enhance conversion rate, user experience, and platform compliance. − Coordinate with design and KAM teams to ensure timely delivery and high-quality execution of all onsite assets. − Drive continuous improvement in ratings & reviews and consumer engagement touchpoints. 2. Performance Advertising Strategy & Execution (30%) − Develop and manage full-funnel ad strategies, budget allocation, and performance forecasting across campaigns and channels. − Lead setup, monitoring, and optimization of: + Onsite ads (e.g., Shopee Ads, Lazada SD, SA, TikTok ads,) + Affiliate marketing campaigns and communication flows + Livestream ads during key campaign periods + Meta (Facebook CPAS) and Google PMAX planning − Provide real-time campaign support and take immediate action to mitigate performance risk during peak sales events. − Monitor and resolve platform alerts, maintain strong alignment with platform PICs, and stay ahead of policy changes or penalty risks. − Other task under department scope. 3.Content & Creator Collaboration (10%) − Support and supervise the video content workflow, including editing, uploading, and aligning with platform trends − Manage and enhance communication with content creators via chat box, ensuring prompt support and brand alignment. 4. Reporting & Insights (10%) − Deliver regular and ad-hoc performance reports with actionable insights and strategic recommendations. − Work closely with internal stakeholders to translate data into optimization actions and campaign refinements.
Job Requirements: − Bachelor degree in Marketing, Digital Commerce, Business Administration, or related fields − Minimum 2–3 years of experience in e-commerce merchandising and/or performance advertising. − Proven hands-on experience with performance ads (CPAS, PMAX, e-com platform ads) and onsite asset execution. − Strong analytical skills, with the ability to draw conclusions from data and make informed decisions. − Excellent project management, attention to detail, and ability to handle multiple priorities. − Strong communication and collaboration skills to work across teams (designers, CS, KAMs, platform PICs). − Proficient in English; Chinese is a plus for working with regional teams or suppliers. − Microsoft office in advance, familiar working with google sheet/doc
Industry: Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Điện / Điện tử / Điện lạnh / Điện công nghiệp

Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Đông Tây Land
Location:
Hồ Chí Minh
 Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu
Job Description: Liên hệ khách hàng tiềm năng: - Sử dụng danh sách khách hàng (data) được cung cấp từ công ty để thực hiện các cuộc gọi tư vấn. - Giới thiệu sản phẩm bất động sản (căn hộ, nhà phố, biệt thự...) phù hợp với nhu cầu của khách hàng Chăm sóc khách hàng: - Lắng nghe, giải đáp thắc mắc và cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về các dự án bất động sản. - Xây dựng mối quan hệ tốt với khách hàng, tạo ấn tượng chuyên nghiệp và đáng tin cậy. Đặt lịch hẹn và phối hợp đội ngũ: - Đặt lịch hẹn để khách hàng tham quan dự án hoặc làm việc với đội ngũ chuyên viên kinh doanh trực tiếp. - Phối hợp với đội nhóm để tối ưu hóa hiệu quả tư vấn và đạt mục tiêu doanh số. Quản lý và cập nhật thông tin: - Ghi nhận đầy đủ thông tin khách hàng trong hệ thống quản lý. - Theo dõi, báo cáo tiến độ công việc và kết quả cho quản lý trực tiếp. Phát triển kỹ năng: - Tham gia các khóa đào tạo kỹ năng bán hàng và kiến thức thị trường do công ty tổ chức. - Phối hợp với đội nhóm để đạt mục tiêu doanh số và phát triển công ty.
Job Requirements: - Tốt nghiệp trung cấp trở lên các chuyên ngành. - Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm, sẽ được đào tạo bài bản, được hỗ trợ Marketing và cung cấp data khách hàng chất lượng. - Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực telesales, chăm sóc khách hàng, tài chính, bảo hiểm. - Kỹ năng giao tiếp qua điện thoại tốt, giọng nói dễ nghe. - Kỹ năng thuyết phục và xử lý tình huống linh hoạt. - Biết cách quản lý thời gian và làm việc nhóm hiệu quả. - Chăm chỉ, kiên nhẫn, cầu tiến và yêu thích công việc tư vấn bán hàng.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Tư vấn , Bất động sản

Job Title: Trưởng phòng Kế toán / Accounting Manager
Company: Srithai (Viet Nam) Co., Ltd
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: 1. Quản lý và giám sát hoạt động hàng ngày của phòng kế toán; Managing and overseeing the daily operations of the accounting department; 2. Theo dõi và phân tích dữ liệu kế toán và lập báo cáo hoặc báo cáo tài chính; Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports or statements; 3. Thiết lập và thực thi các phương pháp, chính sách và nguyên tắc kế toán phù hợp; Establishing and enforcing proper accounting methods, policies and principles; 4. Theo dõi và phân tích dữ liệu kế toán và lập báo cáo tài chính hoặc báo cáo liên quan khác; Monitor and analyze accounting data and produce financial reports or statements; 5. Phối hợp và hoàn thành các cuộc kiểm toán hàng năm; Coordinate and complete annual audits; 6. Đưa ra các khuyến nghị để cải thiện hệ thống và quy trình và khởi xướng các hành động khắc phục; Provide recommendations to improve systems and procedures and initiate corrective actions; 7. Phân công các dự án và chỉ đạo nhân viên để đảm bảo tuân thủ và chính xác; Assign projects and direct staff to ensure compliance and accuracy; 8. Đạt được các mục tiêu kế toán tài chính; Meet financial accounting objectives; 9. Thiết lập và duy trì các hồ sơ và hồ sơ tài chính để ghi lại giao dịch; Establish and maintain fiscal files and records to document transaction; 10. Quản lý ngân sách và dự báo cho doanh nghiệp; Manage Budgeting and Forecast to Business;

Kinh nghiệm làm việc đã được chứng minh là Trưởng phòng kế toán, Giám sát kế toán hoặc Trưởng phòng tài chính; Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor or Finance Manager; c. Kiến thức đã được chứng minh về các nguyên tắc, thông lệ, tiêu chuẩn, luật và quy định về sổ sách kế toán và kế toán; Proven knowledge of bookkeeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws and regulations; d. Kỹ năng máy tính nâng cao trên MS Office, phần mềm kế toán ERP và cơ sở dữ liệu; Advanced computer skills on MS Office, accounting software ERP and databases; e. Khả năng xử lý khối lượng lớn dữ liệu; Ability to manipulate large amounts of data; f. Chú ý cao đến chi tiết và độ chính xác; High attention to detail and accuracy; g. Khả năng chỉ đạo và giám sát; Ability to direct and supervise.

Company: Chi nhánh Công ty TNHH Daesang Việt Nam tại Hà Nội
Job Description: Our company is one of the fastest growing packaged food company in Vietnam. To maximize the growth and find the new opportunity, we are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Strategic Planning and Intelligence Specialist. This role will focus on finding a new business opportunity and long term growth strategies. The ideal candidate will possess strong analytical skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.This role offers a unique opportunity to shape the company's future through data-driven strategies 1. Market Analysis Conduct in-depth market research to understand consumer behavior, market demands, and potential risks Analyze the market trends, industry development to identify growth opportunities Establish the Market Database to strengthen Company's Market Intelligence Competence Analyze competitior's investments, assets and corporate activities and "connect the dots” with regard to their strategic intent, plot out potintial next moves. 2. Support Company's Strategic Planning Develop and execute long-term business strategies aligned with corporate mission, vision and goals. Participate in multiple business strategy projects that produce recommendations for addressing major strategic issues, identify major growth opportunities and develop business plans for realizing these opportunities. Create new business cases to be presented to senior management and Board. Monitor and coordinate the vast range of company data to find the possible M&A Candidates 3. Reporting and Presentation Develop, analyze and prepare comprehensive reports and presentations for senior management and Board (Vietnam / Korea) on regular or occasional basis. Provide regular updates on Market intelligence and Industrial updates [Advantages] Career Growth: Opportunities for professional development and international exposure. Supportive Environment: Work in a collaborative and dynamic team in both Vietnam and Korea Impactful Work: Play a key role in shaping the company’s growth in Vietnam
Job Requirements: [Key Qualifications] Experience: 3+ years of experience in FMCG field or Foreign Direct Investment Company. MBA is a plus Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Economics, Finance, Marketing or a related field. Technical Skills: Proficiency in MS Office(Powerpoint, Excel, Word). Familiarity with business intelligence tools is an advantage. Communication: Proficiency in English is mandatory, Korean language is an advantage [Competencies] Strategic thinking and analytical skills, with the ability to digest and synthesize large amount of data and information into executive-level reports and documents. Integrity and Reliability: Demonstrates responsibility and consistency in delivering work. Abililty to work effectively with internal Daesang teams and executives. Respect for Others: Values diversity and respects the perspectives and contributions of others. Learning Orientation: Actively seeks opportunities to learn and grow professionally. A “can-do” attituce and tolerance of ambiguity
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Tiếp thị / Marketing

Job Title: MT Planning Specialist (Key Account - MT channel)
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH ROHTO-MENTHOLATUM (VIỆT NAM)
Job Description: JOB MISSION/OBJECTIVE : Market Expansion: Develop and implement strategies to increase market share for both offline and online MT channel. Customer Satisfaction Enhancement: Focus on improving customer experience and loyalty through various initiatives. Sales Performance Optimization: Analyze sales data to optimize product offerings and promotional strategies, aiming to exceed sales targets. Efficiency Improvement: Identify and implement improvements in supply chain and inventory management to reduce costs and increase operational efficiency. JOB DUTIES & REPONSIBILTIES : Develop and execute marketing and sales strategies across Modern Trade channels, ensuring strong business growth and brand visibility. Analyze market trends and competitor activities in MT channels Collaborate with the marketing team to execute campaigns and promotions that align with product strategies (offline & online) for MT channels. Negotiate Trading terms in approved budget and manage trade contracts. Monitor sales performance and propose action plans. Achieve revenue targets and manage promotion inventories. Coordinate with partners to resolve customer issues effectively. JOB EXPECTATIONS : Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze market trends, customer behavior, and sales data. Strategic Thinking: Develop and implement effective marketing and product strategies. Relevant Work Experience: Previous experience in retail planning, marketing, or sales, particularly in the supermarket industry. Customer Interaction: Support and resolve customer issues, ensuring customer satisfaction. Performance Metrics: Meeting or exceeding set sales targets and ensuring efficient inventory management. Proactively analyze and resolve issues: Efficiently tackle problems and ensure tasks are completed promptly and accurately. Demonstrate a strong commitment to work and the company
Job Requirements: REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related fields. 2+ years in MT/Trade Marketing/Sales Planning (both online and offline in MT channel), preferably in cosmetics / FMCG field Strong analytical skill and proficiency in Microsoft office, data systems Strong negotiation, communication skills (both Vietnamese and English) & cross-functional collaboration Detail-oriented, proactive, and organized COMPANY BENEFITS: Probationary 100% salary, full social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance after 2 months of probation 13th month salary Bonus 2 times / year 15 Annual leave days / year Annual salary review Tokyo Marine private health insurance for employees with over 2 years contribution Career promotion opportunities Career path training Parking free

Company: CÔNG TY TÀI CHÍNH TNHH NGÂN HÀNG TMCP SÀI GÒN - HÀ NỘI  (SHBFinance)
Job Description: Support Testing of the Web / Desktop Applications which developed by SHBFC IT Development team and be responsible for all aspects of testing and Quality Assurance through the full project lifecycle (from Blueprinting through Implementation) Review, analyze the software requirements then develop the manual test cases before starting to develop the automation scripts Develop automation framework components in order to reduce test cycles and overall time to market Contribute to developing and maintaining a repository of regression automation test cases Own automation test script development and execution, data sourcing or data provisioning, defect analysis, and ensure that proper test result documentation and processes are followed as per the test strategy Assist with integrating test automations with the continuous integration build environment Oversee the creation & execution of test cases and test scripts Develop Performance Test for Multi-Clients & Servers to ensure the system stable & smooth Research new technology in Automation Testing and apply to projects Develop Automated In-House Tools to reduce working time for Business Projects Perform reports to QC leader the progress and status of the assigned tasks *** LÝ DO ĐỒNG HÀNH CÙNG SHBFINANCE: Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, cởi mở Thời gian làm việc từ thứ 2 – thứ 6, nghỉ trưa 1h30’ (40h/tuần) Chế độ làm việc Hybrid working từ 1 - 2 ngày làm việc từ xa/ tuần. Đồng nghiệp thân thiện, cởi mở với tư duy đề cao sự phát triển của mỗi cá nhân; Văn phòng làm việc với không gian mở, rộng rãi, được cung cấp đầy đủ các trang thiết bị để phục vụ cho công việc. Quan tâm đặc biệt đến nhân viên: Gói đãi ngộ cạnh tranh cùng chính sách nâng lương theo định kỳ. Tổng thu nhập TB 14 tháng lương/năm; Hỗ trợ ăn trưa lên tới 1.200.000 VND/tháng; Hỗ trợ gửi xe 200.000 VND/ tháng Nghỉ hưởng lương ngày sinh nhật + quà sinh nhật Quyền lợi chăm sóc sức khỏe đặc quyền bảo hiểm sức khỏe toàn diện SHBFC Care; Khám sức khỏe thường niên tại bệnh viện hàng đầu Việt Nam; Du lịch thường niên, hoạt động team building năm. Tập trung hỗ trợ sự phát triển cá nhân: Được tư vấn, đồng hành và hỗ trợ phát triển sự nghiệp cùng các cấp quản lý tài năng, giàu kinh nghiệm; Cơ hội tham gia các dự án lớn, đối tác quốc tế, đi đầu trong lĩnh vực tài chính tiêu dùng; Chính sách hỗ trợ các hoạt động học tập, nâng cao trình độ ngoại ngữ, trao đổi, chia sẻ kiến thức, giao lưu văn hoá (Training, Seminar...)
Job Requirements: B.S Degree in Information Technology / Computer Science or equivalent Minimum of 02 years experienced in automation testing Skilled in developing test automation scripting in Java Experience in one or more automated testing tools/frameworks (Selenium, Appium, RestAssured) Good understanding of performance and load testing (JMeter) Experience with Hybrid Framework, KeywordDriven Framework, DataDriven Framework Experience in continuous testing pipelines using Jenkins Good English communication skill (both verbal & non-verbal) Ability to review / analyze software requirements & Hands-on experience in developing manual test cases & automation Be able to develop test automation frameworks Intermediate knowledge of programming languages such as JavaScript, Java, C#, …etc or any other programing languages. Solid understanding of SQL, databases, and various data management tools. Knowledge of service integration technology and communication protocols. For example, Restful API, Webservice, Message broker such as RabbitMQ, Kafka, …etc. Experience in version control system such as GIT, SVN Understanding and following software development process and methodology like Waterfall, Kanban, Agile Scrum. Flexibility to adapt to changing instructions and requirements with high sense of commitment Ability to work independently as well as be proactive result-oriented team player Willingness to troubleshoot and solve complex problems Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with other developers, and relevant partners Integrity, Teamwork, Autonomous and Customer-Oriented Priority will be given to candidates with experience in robotic process automation (RPA)

Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN UNIK XANH
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: 1. PURPOSE This role is designed to ensure that our people are equipped with the capabilities to grow, adapt, and perform in an ever-evolving work environment. The Learning & Performance Specialist/Expert plays a pivotal role in designing and delivering initiatives that enhance organizational value, accelerate employee careers, and sustain a high-performance, continuous learning culture. 2. KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES A. Learning & Capability Development - Lead the Learning Needs Analysis (LNA) across individual, team, and organizational levels. - Design, implement, and evaluate learning programs aligned with business strategy and future capability needs. - Integrate experiential learning, digital learning, and personalized development pathways. - Measure training effectiveness using recognized models (e.g., Kirkpatrick). - Collaborate on the development and maintenance of the competency framework and career pathways system. B. Performance Enablement - Co-design and operate modern performance management systems (OKRs, KPIs, Continuous Performance), ensuring fairness, transparency, and capability development. - Coach managers in goal-setting, constructive feedback, and team development. Analyze performance data to generate actionable insights, reporting, and recommendations. - Ensure performance reviews are linked to individual development, recognition, and advancement opportunities. - Foster a culture of feedback, learning agility, and accountability for results. C. Strategic HR Projects & Organizational Development - Contribute to strategic projects such as learning culture transformation, leadership succession development, and future skills readiness. - Partner with HRBPs and business units to deliver people development solutions aligned with business priorities. - Support digital transformation in learning and performance processes. - Ensure alignment of development practices and tools with international standards and CIPD’s Code of Ethics.
Job Requirements: 3. CAPABILITIES & CRITERIA A. Education & Experience - Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Education, Business Administration, or a related field. - Specialist level : 4–7 years of experience in learning & development and/or performance management. - Expert level : 10+ years of experience, with a proven track record in internal consulting or system design for large-scale talent/performance development. B. Core Competencies & Skills - Solid knowledge of learning models (ADDIE, Kirkpatrick), and performance frameworks (KPIs, OKRs, BSC). - Proficiency in LNA, program design, facilitation, and training evaluation. - Strong skills in performance data analysis and strategic recommendation. - Advanced use of PowerPoint and Excel; experience with LMS/HRIS platforms is a plus. - Excellent communication, facilitation, and presentation skills. - Strong command of English, both conversational and professional, is an advantage. Preferred Certifications - Applicants with one or more of the following certifications will be prioritized: - ATD (Association for Talent Development). - ICF (International Coaching Federation). - KPI Institute, Balanced Scorecard Institute. - Certifications in People Analytics or other HR data & performance tools. 4. WHAT YOU’LL GAIN - A people-centric environment with learning as a foundation for development. - Involvement in strategic projects focused on organizational transformation and future capability building. - Competitive compensation, a clear development roadmap, and holistic wellness benefits.
Industry: Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Giáo dục / Đào tạo , Nhân sự

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS 1. Develop and Drive BI Strategy Formulate and implement a comprehensive business intelligence strategy aligned with the company's goals. 2. Data Analysis and Insights Analyze data from various sources (including sales, marketing, operation, and finance) to identify trends, generate insights, and uncover growth opportunities. Proactively provide insightful information via reports or presentations 3. Reporting and Dashboard Proactively Design, develop, and maintain intuitive and visually appealing dashboards and reports to facilitate data-driven decision-making across the organization. 4. Team Leadership Lead, mentor, and develop a team of BI analysts, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation. Serve as a key connector and leader, inspiring and fostering strong bonds within the BI team, enabling seamless collaboration and alignment toward shared goals 5. Training and Coaching Provide training and coaching to team members and other departments to enhance data literacy and ensure effective use of BI tools and data insights across the organization. 6. Cross-Functional Collaboration Collaborate with key stakeholders across departments (e.g., marketing, sales, finance, operation,...) to ensure alignment and integration of BI initiatives. 7. Technology and Tools Management Stay updated with BI tools and technologies, ensuring the organization leverages best-in-class solutions.
Job Requirements: II. REQUIREMENTS 1. Knowledge A bachelor's degree in Data Science, Business, Economics, or a related field. Advanced degrees are a plus. 2. Skills Proficiency in SQL, Power BI, and other BI tools. Experience with Python is advantageous. Proficiency in analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a talent for translating data into actionable insights. Proficiency in verbal and written communication. Ability to create insightful reports, short and sharp presentation Demonstrated experience in leading and developing a team, with strong project management skills. 3. Experience A minimum of 5 years in a similar BI role, preferably within the e-commerce sector. 2 years experience in team management Candidate with experience in Finance, Planning, and Operation is a plus. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? 1. FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. 2. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. 3. FOR YOU TO STAY People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path: Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: Ngành khác

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH CIRQL MANUFACTURING VIETNAM
Job Description: Job role: The ERP Supervisor will be primarly responsible for the proper running of the Cirql ERP system. This role requires a deep understanding of ERP systems (especially MS Dynamics 365 Business Central), strong technical skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with various business teams, departments to ensure the system meets business needs. Giám sát ERP sẽ chịu trách nhiệm chính cho việc vận hành hệ thống ERP của Cirql. Vai trò này đòi hỏi sự hiểu biết sâu sắc về hệ thống ERP (đặc biệt là hệ thống MS Dynamics 365 Business Central), chuyên môn kỹ thuật vững chắc và khả năng làm việc cộng tác với nhiều nhóm kinh doanh, phòng ban khác nhau để đảm bảo hệ thống đáp ứng được nhu cầu kinh doanh chung của Công ty. 1. ERP Enhancement & Implementation: Implement continuous enhancements to the Cirql ERP system, including planning, configuration, testing, and deployment; play the role to bridge between users’ requirement and vendor’s design using both technical and domain knowledge. Triển khai & cải tiến hệ thống ERP: Triển khai các cải tiến liên tục cho hệ thống ERP của Cirql, bao gồm lập kế hoạch, cấu hình, thử nghiệm và triển khai; đóng vai trò là cầu nối giữa yêu cầu của người dùng và thiết kế của nhà cung cấp bằng cách sử dụng cả kiến ​​thức kỹ thuật và kiến ​​thức chuyên môn. 2. System Maintenance: Ensure the ERP system is running smoothly by performing regular updates, backups, and troubleshooting any issues that arise. Bảo trì hệ thống: Đảm bảo hệ thống ERP hoạt động trơn tru bằng cách thực hiện cập nhật thường xuyên, sao lưu và khắc phục mọi sự cố phát sinh. 3. User Support: Provide technical support and training to end-users, address any questions, problems, and ad hoc data query / reporting needs related to the ERP system. Hỗ trợ người dùng: Cung cấp hỗ trợ kỹ thuật và đào tạo cho người dùng cuối, giải quyết mọi câu hỏi, vấn đề và nhu cầu báo cáo/truy vấn dữ liệu tùy ý liên quan đến hệ thống ERP. 4. Data Management: Oversee data migration, data integrity, and data security within the ERP system. Quản lý dữ liệu: Giám sát việc di chuyển dữ liệu, tính toàn vẹn dữ liệu và bảo mật dữ liệu trong hệ thống ERP. 5. Integration: Integrate the ERP system with possible other business applications and ensure seamless data flow between systems. Tích hợp: Tích hợp hệ thống ERP với các ứng dụng kinh doanh khác có thể có và đảm bảo luồng dữ liệu liền mạch giữa các hệ thống. 6. Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and procedures. Quản lý tài liệu: Duy trì tài liệu toàn diện về cấu hình hệ thống, quy trình và thủ tục. 7. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for system enhancements and process improvements to optimize business operations. Cải tiến liên tục: Xác định các cơ hội để cải tiến hệ thống và cải tiến quy trình nhằm tối ưu hóa hoạt động kinh doanh. 8. Team coordination : Coordinate with infrastructure team to bridge hardware and software together. Phối hợp nhóm: Phối hợp với nhóm cơ sở hạ tầng để kết nối phần cứng và phần mềm với nhau.
Job Requirements: 1. Education & Knowledge : Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field. Trình độ học vấn: Bằng Cử nhân Công nghệ thông tin, Khoa học máy tính hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan. 2. Foreign language : Good command of written and spoken English. Kỹ năng ngoại ngữ: Có thể giao tiếp tốt bằng tiếng Anh (nói & viết). 3. Skills ( Kỹ năng ) : 3.1 Technical skills ( Kỹ thuật chuyên môn ) a) Proficiency in ERP (prefer MS Dynamics 365 Business Central) end-to-end process cycle, MS SQL server, Azure Cloud platform, SQL related development, and other relevant technologies. Thành thạo trong việc triển khai chu trình vận hành ERP (ưu tiên hệ thống MS Dynamics 365 Business Central) từ đầu đến cuối, máy chủ MS SQL, nền tảng Azure Cloud, phát triển liên quan đến SQL và các công nghệ liên quan khác . b) Proficient in BI (Business Intelligence) technology, experienced in PowerBI, ETL, and database logical & physical design. Thành thạo công nghệ trí tuệ kinh doanh, có kinh nghiệm về PowerBI, ETL và thiết kế logic & vật lý cơ sở dữ liệu. c) Strong sense on business processes and business data. Hiểu biết sâu sắc về quy trình kinh doanh và dữ liệu kinh doanh. 3.2 Soft skills ( Kỹ năng mềm ) a) Strong problem-solving skill. Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề tốt. b) Good analytical and interpersonal skill. Kỹ năng phân tích và giao tiếp tốt. 4. Experience : Minimum of 5 years of experience in ERP system development, implementation and support, using a pool of programming languages and technology frameworks. Kinh nghiệm: Ít nhất 5 năm kinh nghiệm trong triển khai, vận hành và hỗ trợ hệ thống ERP, sử dụng nhiều ngôn ngữ lập trình và khuôn khổ công nghệ.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Company: CÔNG TY TNHH AMERICA INDOCHINA MANAGEMENT VIETNAM
Job Description: * Summary: We are seeking a talented and experienced E-commerce Haravan Administrator to join our dynamic Digital Transformation team. As an E-commerce Haravan Administrator, you will play a crucial role in managing and optimizing our online store on the Haravan platform. Your primary responsibility will be to ensure a seamless online shopping experience for our customers while maximizing sales and efficiency. * Performance objectives: 1. Manage API development with 3rd party: Develop feature list Compile fields to transferred Test Commission Roll out 2. Product Management: Establish seamless import/export (or automatic) from ERP Inventory data to the HARAVAN website Create, edit, and optimize product listings, including descriptions, images, and pricing. Manage inventory levels and track stock movements. Implement effective product categorization and tagging strategies. 3. Order Processing: Research, evaluate (ease of use, cost, lead time to deliver) and propose logistic partner(s) for order fulfillment across all regions of Vietnam Process and fulfill orders accurately and efficiently. – evaluate api with ERP Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues related to orders and shipping. Manage returns, refunds, and exchanges. 4. Platform Management: Maintain and update the Haravan store, including theme customization, layout design, and functionality enhancements. Utilize Haravan's tools and apps to optimize store performance and user experience. Stay up-to-date with the latest Haravan features and best practices. 5. Marketing and Promotions: Create and execute marketing campaigns, including email marketing, social media promotions, and discount codes. Analyze website traffic and sales data to identify trends and opportunities. Implement strategies to improve website conversion rates and customer engagement. 6. Customer Support: Provide excellent customer service through various channels, such as email, chat, and phone. Resolve customer issues promptly and professionally. Build strong relationships with customers to foster loyalty and positive brand perception.
Job Requirements: * Requirements: Open for Fresh Graduates with prior-experience in E-commerce English and Vietnamese communication language skills Can do attitude Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Time management and project delivery driven Proven experience in e-commerce and digital marketing. Strong understanding of Haravan platform and its features. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and basic web development skills. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Strong attention to detail and accuracy. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. * What we offer: Competitive base salary + monthly bonus + 13th salary Social Insurance is fully covered after probation An open and dynamic English working environment & promotion opportunities Great chance to develop through on-the-job training methods * Working location: 117-119-121 Nguyễn Du, Bến Thành, District 1, HCMC * Working time: 8:00 – 17:30; Monday – Friday
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Thương mại điện tử , Tiếp thị trực tuyến

Job Title: Nhân viên nhập liệu tiếng nhật

Job Description: Nhập liệu dữ liệu số,chữ thông tin khảo sát địa chất vào hệ thống Thực hiện thao tác phân tích dữ liệu (Được đào tạo nghiệp vụ khi vào làm) Trao đổi trực tiếp với khách hàng qua Mail, Chatwork…
