Company: CÔNG TY TNHH LEDVANCE VIỆT NAM
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Xuất nhập khẩu Hỗ trợ công ty phối hợp với các nhà cung cấp về dịch vụ giao nhận hàng hóa để xử lý các hoạt động nhập khẩu/ xuất khẩu (sản phẩm đèn chiếu sáng). Theo dõi tiến độ thông quan và giải quyết mọi vấn đề phát sinh. Ghi lại chứng từ nhập khẩu (hóa đơn, danh sách đóng gói, vận đơn, CO, CQ, v.v.). Chuỗi cung ứng Kiểm tra mức tồn kho, lịch trình sản xuất từ công ty mẹ và thời gian giao hàng để đảm bảo sản phẩm có kịp tiến độ. Cung cấp thông tin cập nhật kịp thời cho khách hàng về tình trạng sản phẩm và tiến độ giao hàng. Tạo đơn đặt hàng để khách hàng xác nhận và tiến hành xử lý đơn hàng sau khi được chấp thuận. Xem xét và phản hồi các yêu cầu hoặc điều chỉnh đơn đặt hàng từ bộ phận bán hàng. Phối hợp với các phòng ban liên quan để đảm bảo thực hiện đơn hàng đúng hạn và chính xác. Quản lý hậu cần và kho vận Hỗ trợ các phòng ban của công ty phối hợp với các nhà cung cấp kho bãi 3PL để đảm bảo các quy trình nhập, xuất, chuẩn bị kho và tiến độ giao hàng diễn ra suôn sẻ. Đảm bảo tính nhất quán của dữ liệu giữa hệ thống nội bộ và nhà cung cấp kho 3PL, duy trì hồ sơ giao dịch hàng tồn kho Quản lý tài liệu và dữ liệu Ghi lại và duy trì dữ liệu, tài liệu (hồ sơ nhập khẩu, mã HS,...mã sản phẩm, ảnh sản phẩm, thông số kỹ thuật ảnh, v.v.). Phối hợp giữa các phòng ban và hợp tác với bộ phận sản xuất, bán hàng và các nhóm khác để đảm bảo hoạt động trơn tru. Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo yêu cầu của công ty, quản lý phòng ban. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Import Operations Assist the company in coordinating with freight forwarding suppliers to handle import/ export operations (lighting products). Follow up on customs clearance progress and address any issues that arise. Record import documentation (invoice, packing list, bill, CO, CQ, etc.). Supply Chain Operations Check inventory levels, production schedules, and delivery timelines to ensure product availability. Provide timely updates to customers regarding product status and delivery progress. Create sales orders for customer confirmation and proceed with order processing upon approval. Review and respond to sales order requests or adjustments from the sales department. Coordinate with relevant departments to ensure on-time and accurate order fulfillment. Logistics and Inventory Management Assist company departments in coordinating with 3PL warehouse suppliers to ensure smooth processes for inbound, outbound, stock preparation, and delivery progress. Ensure data consistency between the internal system and 3PL warehouse suppliers, maintain records of inventory transactions Document and Data Management Record and Maintain datas,documents (import record,HS code,...product codes, product photos, photo specifications, etc.). Communicate across departments and collaborate with production, sales, and other teams to ensure smooth operations. Fulfill other tasks as required by the company, deparment manager.

Familiarity with supply chain management processes and related systems (e.g., ERP, SAP). Strong data analysis skills and proficiency in Excel and other office software. Proficiency in English, have Chinese will be preferred. Will communicate effectively with international suppliers preferred. Benefits: Salary from 14 mils, base on expirence. Job Title: Technical Service & Application Specialist – Abbott Molecular
Company: Abbott
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Phụ cấp', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: PRIMARY FUNCTION The Technical Service & Application Specialist (Hybrid Role) provides comprehensive technical support and application expertise to drive customer satisfaction, instrument sales growth and business excellence. This includes: • Providing service/ training in application of Molecular Diagnostics products for local distributors, hospital institutions or reference laboratories in Vietnam in compliance with Abbott technical standard and local regulatory requirements to support the long-term business growth in countries. • Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction and the quality of distributors' engineers and application specialists in by proving quality and effective service activities, including interpretation, clarification, recertification, and related proactive and reactive troubleshooting in the application of Molecular assays and instruments. • Be the coordinator in between affiliate/ distributor and area for all the product technical issues and managing/ monitoring the quality of the technical support from distributors. • Serves as an engineering consultant during pre-and post-sales activities. This role will be expected to build and maintain strong relationships across district Service and Support teams, Marketing and Commercial to maximize sales growth, support instrument uptime and customer satisfaction. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES • Assist with interfacing between the field organization and internal support structure by providing timely onsite technical assistance to customers, distributors, field application specialists and territory country managers. • Provide on demand field service support to customers / distributors. Coordinate and prioritize service requests to establish best intervention method and ensure customers / distributor satisfaction. • Introduce Molecular Diagnostics Instruments and assays to both internal and external customers. Plan and conduct customer training at customer sites or in Abbott training facilities according to standards. • Support Sales and Marketing organization by providing pre-sales demonstrations of MDx systems, assay and applications; and provide technical details and input prior, during and after sales call. • Support User Group Meetings, congresses and exhibitions by providing product demonstrations , presentations and additional activities as required. • Manage complaints, coordinate all required activities to resolve customer matters and meet expectations. Provide necessary information and data, and proper documentation of customer complaints in Abbott Call Management System (CMSNext) • Escalate system or assay failures to the next level of support (APAC Support/Service Manager/ GSS) and provide all relevant data describing failure conditions to facilitate quick resolution of problem and continuous improvement product and services. • Build relationship with customers in South Asia and serve an active role in facilitating communication between Molecular Support Organization and partners. Partner with territory country managers to coordinate new system placements, promote upgrades and timely contract renewals. • Ensure full compliance to Abbott Molecular Diagnostics Quality and Regulatory Procedures. Meet the timeline and goals for complaint registration and investigation as well as compliant closure as defined by QA and Service/ Support Management. Timely completion of training requirement in Pilgrim SmartSolve. • Responsible for Field Action Execution for South Asia and remain compliant with administrative responsibilities and business expectations. • Share information, knowledge and experience with all members of the Molecular Support Organization, contribute to building and maintenance of high expertise level. Utilize and maintain up to date service documents, field service bulletins, SOP’s and facilitate remote connectivity to customer instrumentation. • Elevate/ monitor the quality of front-line technical service by routine evaluation to distributors. • Coordinate new installations and participate in large-scale installations that require facility inspections and instrument verification. • Demonstrate technical competence while installing, upgrading hardware or software, repairing, and performing preventative maintenance for Abbott products in a defined territory. • Troubleshoot instrument system problems through Abbottlink, telephone support, log file reading, or on-site client visitations. • Maintain proper inventory levels and control accuracy of service parts to promote first-time fix. • The role reports into the Application Support Manager APAC and Regional Service Manager • Primarily support assigned territory but be able to travel regionally upon request (APAC regional travel is expected to be around 30%)
Job Requirements: EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE: • Bachelor’s degree or above in Molecular Biology/Genetics or similar (preferred) • BSc in Mechanical, Electrical or Biomedical Engineering • Professional experience of at least two years in the Clinical Diagnostics environment. (preferred). • Min 2 years of experience in technical support in medical diagnostics or life sciences field, OR min 3 years’ experience in lab-based diagnostics pathology laboratory SKILL & REQUIREMENT: The selected individual is responsible for achieving service excellence through technical abilities and must be able to confidently demonstrate the assurance to meet client expectations. Candidates applying for this position should have skills and experience, which minimally meet the following requirements • Knowledge of regulations and standards in IVDs and Biologics. • Basic IT/networking knowledge • Have an ability to troubleshoot and repair electromechanical instrument systems. • A forward thinker who can prevent problems before they arise, flexible often dealing with ad-hoc queries from customers. • Ability to understand and troubleshoot software-based PC programs. • Ability to operate laboratory instrumentation including multi-meters, and data acquisition equipment. • Understanding the fabrication of parts, electromechanical motion control, and mechanical alignment is essential. • Comprehend, understand, and maintain quality compliance initiatives and procedures that are used within the organization. • Willing to travel to customer site more than 50% of the time and available for afterhours onsite support as required. • Current Driving License (preferred) • Excellent communication skills – including both verbal and written.
Industry: Y tế / Chăm sóc sức khỏe / Thẩm mỹ / Làm đẹp

Job Title: Kỹ Sư Chất Lượng Cơ Khí/ Mechanical QC Engineer
Company: AVERNA VIETNAM COMPANY LIMITED
Job Description: A/ TÓM TẮT CÔNG VIỆC/ JOB SUMMARY Kiểm soát chất lượng sản phẩm bằng cách thực hiện kiểm tra, thu thập thông tin kỹ thuật, lập các hướng dẫn cho việc kiểm tra, đo lường, đảm bảo chất lượng sản phẩm. Lưu giữ kết quả kiểm tra, hệ thống hóa dữ liệu, tổng hợp, phân tích và báo cáo kết quả kiểm tra. Control quality of product by inspecting, collecting technical information, making work instruction, checklist for inspection, measurement, assure product meet requirement. Record inspection results, summary and analyze data. B/ NHIỆM VỤ VÀ TRÁCH NHIỆM/ ESSENTIAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES · Được phân công vào dự án, lập kế hoạch kiểm soát chất lượng và biểu mẩu kiểm tra cho dự án Be assigned to project, create “Quality control plan” and checkslist for project. · Nhận và thu thập tất cả các thông tin kỹ thuật từ dự án: DFM, BOM, bản vẽ, datasheet, hướng dẫn lắp ráp, yêu cầu từ khách hàng. Collect & get all technical information: DFM, BOM, drawing, assembly SOP, customer’s requirement/specification. · Thực hiện kiểm tra, ghi chép đầy đủ kết quả kiểm tra thử nghiệm vào phiếu kiểm tra, phiếu đánh giá chất lượng Inspect and record result to checksheet, form. · Thống kê, phân tích & báo cáo chi tiết kết quả kiểm tra & thử nghiệm. Summary, analysis & report for inspection & testing results. · Viết hướng dẫn hướng dẫn cách kiểm tra, hướng dẫn sử dụng thiết bị. Make work instruction (WI), guide how to use measuring equipment. · Lập báo cáo Không phù hợp & đề xuất phương án xử lý gửi cho các bên liên quan. Make non-conforming report, give solution & inform to relative department. · Hệ thống hóa và theo dõi lỗi phát sinh trong quá trình kiểm tra và sản xuất. Keep in-process inspection data & all non-conforming (issue) into the tracking file/log · Cập nhật danh sách tài liệu và các hồ sơ nội bộ (phiếu ghi chép kết quả đo). Update the list of documents and internal records (measurement result). · Xem xét & cập nhật các yêu cầu đặc biệt trong bản vẽ nguyên vật liệu, cụm lắp ráp vào phiếu ghi chép kiểm tra. Review/update the special requirements in the drawings of materials, assembly kit to checklist. · Vận hành các thiết bị đo kiểm và các dụng cụ/thiết bị kiểm tra khác có liên quan. Use measuring equipment and other related inspection tool/equipment. · Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo sự phân công của trưởng nhóm/trưởng phòng kiểm tra chất lượng. Other assignment as assign from QA Leader/Manager.
Job Requirements: 1. Trình độ ( Education) - Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành kỹ thuật Cơ khí, Cơ điện tử Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical, Mechatronic 2. Kinh nghiệm (Experience) - Trên 2 năm kinh nghiệm tại vị trí kỹ sư sản xuất/quản lý chất lượng trong công ty đa quốc gia sản xuất sản phẩm cơ khí, máy móc hoặc liên quan. Over 02 years of work experience at position of Production Engineer/ QA/QC of MNC Manufacturing that produce mechanical part, machinery or relate field. - Kinh nghiệm làm việc liên quan đến kiểm tra cơ khí, thiết bị đo đạc chính xác. Working experience in related jobs that relate to mechanical inspection, precision measurement tool/equipment. 3. Hiểu biết và kỹ năng (Knowledge & Skills) - Giao tiếp tốt, khả năng giải quyết vấn đề và khả năng làm việc nhóm. Good communication, problem solving & teamwork - Đọc bản vẽ cơ khí và các bản vẽ kĩ thuật tiếng Anh. Technical mechanical drawing reading. - Tiếng anh giao tiếp tốt. Good English communication. - Phân tích dữ liệu và ra quyết định Data analysis and decision making - Sử dụng thành thạo MS office, phần mềm đồ họa (Auto Cad, Solidwork) Ability to use MS office, engineering software (auto CAD, Solid work) - Thành thạo trong việc làm báo cáo, các bài thuyết trình. Ability to make reports, presentations. - Có kiến thức và khả năng sử dụng máy móc thiết bị, dụng cụ kiểm tra đo lường cơ khí Have knowledge, ability using mechanical measurement equipment/tool - Hiểu biết tiêu chuẩn ISO 9001, và các công cụ quản lý chất lượng. Have knowledge about ISO9001, and quality tools.
Industry: Cơ khí / Ô tô / Tự động hóa , Quản lý chất lượng (QA/QC)

Company: Action Composites Hightech Industries
Job Description: * WE OFFER THE BENEFIT PACKAGE FOR THIS POSITION AS BELOW: OFF ALL SATURDAYS , Leave office at 4 pm on Friday. Free Shuttle bus from Ba Ria Vung Tau/ Gigamall/ Cantavil Thu Duc/ Thu Duc Crossroad/ Bien Hoa to Nhon Trach (our factory ~ 40 minutes for travelling) "Star of the Month" bonus: 2.000.000 VND /Month Health care insurance (after probation) + For Family Performance Evaluation bonus yearly Public holidays and company day bonus up to 2.000.000 VND/Year Participate in team building activities 600.000 VND/year. Job Requirements: Bachelor's degree or higher in Information Technology Engineering or a related field. Good English communication skills. 5-7 years of experience in a similar position or related field. Ability to manage and assign IT tasks to staff, operate IT systems, and support users as required. Ability to manage IT staff by recruiting, training, coaching employees, communicating job expectations, and appraising their performance. Responsibility and cooperation with internal/external operations to ensure the IT system runs smoothly. Experience handling annual budgets and ensuring cost-effectiveness. Ability to plan, organize, control, and evaluate IT and electronic data operations. Skills in designing, developing, implementing, and coordinating systems, policies, and procedures. Capability to guide and develop the IT team and advise the Board of Directors on IT solutions. Proactive in searching for and updating new technologies, as well as collaborating with vendors to solve IT problems. Strong systematic thinking and analytical skills. Ability to work under pressure, hardworking, honest, positive mindset, and effective personnel management skills. Having IoT experience is an advantage.

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in term of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have more than 500 young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry. We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets. Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently. Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing. I. JOB DESCRIPTIONS The Consumer Market Insights Manager is responsible for leading market research efforts to gather and analyze data related to consumer behavior, market trends, and industry dynamics. This role involves synthesizing information to provide strategic insights that inform decision-making processes across the organization. The Consumer Market Insights Manager plays a key role in shaping marketing strategies, product development, and overall business direction. * Market Research Strategy Develop and execute a comprehensive market research strategy aligned with organizational goals. Identify key research objectives, methodologies, and timelines. * Consumer Behavior Analysis Analyze consumer behavior data to understand preferences, motivations, and purchasing patterns. Provide insights into changing consumer sentiment and preferences. * Competitive Intelligence Monitor and analyze competitive landscapes to identify market trends and benchmark against industry standards. Deliver regular updates on competitor activities and market dynamics. * Cross-functional Collaboration Collaborate with marketing, product development, and sales teams to integrate consumer insights into business strategies. Understand stakeholder information needs and deliver relevant insights. * Data Collection and Analysis Prepare and present comprehensive reports outlining key consumer insights, market trends, and actionable recommendations. Communicate findings to stakeholders in a clear and compelling manner. * Strategic Recommendations Translate insights into actionable recommendations that guide marketing strategies, product development, and business initiatives. Contribute to strategic decision-making processes based on data-driven insights. * Technology Utilization Stay informed about advancements in market research technologies and methodologies. Leverage technology to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of market research activities.
Job Requirements: II. SKILL AND EXPERIENCE * Knowledge Bachelor's or Master's degree in Marketing, Business, Market Research, or a related field. Excellent command of English. * Skills Have logical thinking and strong problem-solving skills. Strong project management and organizational skill. Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Adaptability and flexibility. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Highly meticulous and good at coordination, able to work under extreme pressure. * Experience At least 3 years of work experience in market research, consumer insights, or a related role. Proficiency in market research tools and data analytics software. Experience in an ecommerce platform is highly desirable. III. WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US? FOR YOU TO JOIN Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances. Salary review: annually or on excellent performance. Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events. Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year. Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package. Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration. FOR YOU TO GROW Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge. Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work. Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry. FOR YOU TO STAY People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication. Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive feedback so you can perform the best. Career path: Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions. And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Quản lý điều hành , Thống kê

Company: Công Ty Tài Chính Mirae Asset (Việt Nam)
Job Description: Product Development and Management: - Define the vision, strategy, and development goals of the product based on market demands and the Company's business direction. - Plan and build the product backlog, prioritizing features based on business value and user experience. - Drive innovation and ensure the product remains competitive in the financial market. Working with the Development Team: - Collaborate closely with the development team (Dev, QC, Designer, etc.) to ensure requirements are properly understood and effectively implemented. - Develop detailed User Stories and Acceptance Criteria to guide the development team. - Ensure the product is scalable, secure, and optimized for user performance. User Research and Analysis: - Gather and analyze feedback from customers and relevant departments to continuously improve the product. - Conduct market research to identify emerging trends and new customer behaviors in the financial sector. - Analyze data, evaluate product performance, and propose improvements. Progress and Risk Management: - Monitor the development process, review results, and ensure the product meets the Company’s business, legal, and security standards. - Identify and address risks that may arise during development. - Ensure product launches on schedule without compromising quality. Collaboration with Departments: - Work closely with business, marketing, and operations teams to achieve desired product outcomes. - Coordinate with Legal - Compliance and Information Security teams to ensure the application complies with legal regulations and company policies. - Act as a bridge between customers, stakeholders, and the development team. - Collaborate with relevant departments to promptly resolve issues or product defects during user usage.
Job Requirements: Experience: - At least 2-5 years of experience as a Product Owner or in related roles (Business Analyst, Project Manager, Product Manager) in the finance, banking, or fin-tech sector. - Experience in managing financial applications on mobile platforms is a significant advantage. Skills: - Deep understanding of financial products (consumer loans, mortgages, insurance, credit cards, installment purchases, etc.). - Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills. - Experience working in a Scrum/Hybrid environment. - Excellent leadership, communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. - Ability to analyze data, proficient in SQL, Google Analytics, or similar analytical tools. - Knowledge of API integrations, third-party services, and modern app technologies. - Proactive working attitude. Additional Knowledge: - Understanding of UX/UI is a plus. - Proficient in English for communication and reading technical documents. Phúc lợi Mirae Asset Finance Viet Nam aims to build a "Professional - Friendly - Effective" working environment. Our strategic objective is to provide a working place with attractive package, growth opportunity, and sustainable development. Attractive packages with 13th salary year-end bonus and a week trip to Korea in order to recognize all your good performance and effort at MAFC. 15 days annual leave Annual health check, company events. Annual healthcare insurance package from senior level and above. Young and proactive environment; no barriers, no limitation for new idea. Flexible internal career opportunity.

Company: Yes4All Trading Services Company Limited
Job Description: The Merchandising Team Leader is responsible for overseeing the creation, optimization, and consistency of Yes4All’s product content across all e-commerce channels (primarily Amazon, and including any other marketplaces or the company website). The purpose of this role is to ensure that every product listing – from titles and descriptions to images, videos, and A+ content – is high-quality, on-brand, and optimized for maximum visibility and conversion. By managing a team of merchandising specialists, the Merchandising Leader drives the strategy for content SEO and presentation, coordinates content updates for new launches and promotions, and maintains content compliance with platform guidelines. Ultimately, this role aims to enhance the customer experience and boost sales by delivering superior product content and merchandising execution, positioning Yes4All’s products as appealing and easy to discover. 1. Content Strategy & Quality Oversight Develop and implement a strategic plan for product content optimization that will improve search rankings and conversion rates. Define standards and best practices for product titles, bullet points, descriptions, and enhanced content (A+ or rich media) to ensure consistency and quality across the catalog. Regularly audit the online catalog to ensure content is up-to-date, accurate, and reflective of Yes4All’s brand voice and values. 2. Team Leadership & Project Management Lead and mentor the merchandising/content team (listing content writers, graphic designers for images/A+ content, etc.), setting clear goals and workflows. Prioritize the team’s workload, from new product launches to periodic content refreshes, and ensure timely completion of tasks. Provide guidance and feedback to team members, and coordinate cross-functional efforts when developing content (e.g., liaising with product managers for correct product specs or with marketing for campaign themes) 3. Product Launch Content Management Oversee the end-to-end content creation process for new product listings. Ensure that before a product goes live, all required assets and data are prepared and meet retailer requirements (image counts/dimensions, attribute data, etc.). Use internal templates or marketplace upload tools (such as Amazon flat files via Seller Central) to efficiently launch products with complete and optimized content, verifying that everything (pricing, specs, imagery) is correctly reflected online by launch deadlines. 4. SEO and Keyword Optimization Direct the team in conducting thorough keyword research for each product category to inform content optimization. Ensure product titles, descriptions, and backend keywords are SEO-rich and incorporate high-value search terms while still being clear and appealing to customers. Continuously update content with evolving keywords or new customer search trends, and utilize Amazon SEO best practices (e.g., proper title formatting, using all available character counts, etc.) to improve organic ranking. 5. Enhanced Content & Visual Merchandising Guide the development of Enhanced Brand Content (A+ Content on Amazon) and other rich media assets. Approve layouts and copy for A+ pages that highlight product USPs and storytelling, ensuring they meet brand guidelines and boost conversion. Similarly, oversee the maintenance of the Amazon Brand Store and any other brand storefronts, making updates for new collections or seasonal promotions. Ensure that imagery (product photos, infographics, lifestyle shots) and videos are high resolution, correctly sized, and effectively convey product features and use-cases. 6. Content Audits & Continuous Improvement Regularly perform content audits for accuracy and completeness. This includes verifying that existing listings have correct information (dimensions, features, pricing), checking for content errors or policy flags, and benchmarking our listings against competitors for opportunities. Identify listings that need updates (due to changes in product or to test improved copy) and schedule the team’s efforts to refresh those. Use site analytics and heatmaps (if available) to assess how customers engage with content (e.g., are they scrolling through all images, reading A+ content) and refine content strategy accordingly. 7. Promotion & Event Readiness Coordinate with the marketing and sales teams to align content with promotions or seasonal events. For example, ensure that when Yes4All participates in a major sale event, the product listings have appropriate messaging (coupon callouts, promotional banners in images if allowed) and that any time-sensitive content updates (like price changes or special badges) are executed accurately and on schedule. Post-promotion, make sure any temporary content is reverted and gather learnings on what content drove higher conversion during the event. 8. Metrics & Reporting Define and track key content performance indicators, such as conversion rate improvements after content changes, average rating of content completeness, or search visibility for key products. Regularly review these KPIs and service level metrics (like content turnaround time for new launches). Provide reports and updates to senior management on the impact of content optimizations (e.g., “After rewriting descriptions and updating images for the home gym category, conversion rates increased by X%”). Use data to celebrate successes and to identify areas for further improvement. 9.Cross-Functional Collaboration Work alongside Performance Marketing (ads) and Social Media teams to ensure a cohesive customer journey. Communicate to the marketing teams what content is available or upcoming (like new product imagery or updated descriptions) so they can leverage it in ads or social posts. Conversely, incorporate feedback from customer service (common questions or complaints that can be addressed in content) and from performance data (if an ad highlights a feature that's converting well, ensure that feature is prominent in the listing content). 10. Innovation & Capability Building Stay informed about the latest e-commerce content capabilities and tools. For instance, keep up with new Amazon content features (like video shorts on listings, interactive Q&A, or upcoming changes to A+ modules) and evaluate their usefulness for Yes4All. Advocate for and implement new tools or processes that could improve content creation efficiency or quality (such as content management systems, PIMS (Product Information Management System) tools, or AI-driven content suggestions). Train and upskill team members in new best practices or tools to continuously enhance the team’s output.
Job Requirements: REQUIREMENTS Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Business or a related field. 3+ years of experience in e-commerce merchandising, content management, or digital marketing, with at least 1–2 years in a supervisory or lead role. Extensive experience with Amazon marketplace content is essential; familiarity with content management on other marketplaces (Walmart, Wayfair) or on D2C websites is a strong plus. Demonstrated success in improving online product content and seeing a measurable impact on business results (e.g., led a content revamp that increased conversion or traffic significantly). A portfolio or examples of past optimized listings, A+ content created, or before-and-after performance case studies would be beneficial. Proficiency in SEO as it applies to e-commerce (understanding of how keywords, search algorithms, and browse structure work on Amazon and similar platforms). Experience with keyword research tools specifically for Amazon (like Helium 10, Jungle Scout, etc.) and analytics tools (Amazon Brand Analytics, Google Analytics for web) is expected. Strong project management capabilities – experience coordinating cross-functional projects or managing a content calendar. Familiarity with project management tools (Asana, Trello, etc.) or PIM systems is a plus. Excellent English writing and editing skills, with an eye for persuasive yet concise copy. Able to guide others in writing with correct grammar, tone, and clarity. Proficiency in Vietnamese for effective internal communication and coordination in our Vietnam office environment. Technical comfort with e-commerce platforms: experienced in using Amazon Seller Central (or Vendor Central) for content uploads, handling flat file templates, and resolving listing issues. Basic HTML or content formatting skills for marketplace templates can be useful. Analytical mindset with ability to use Excel (including functions like VLOOKUP, pivot tables) to manage and analyze product data and content performance metrics. Experience in pulling reports from Amazon (search term reports, business reports) and deriving insights is desirable. High degree of organization, accountability, and self-motivation. This role requires taking ownership of the entire content quality across thousands of SKUs; the ideal candidate must be proactive in identifying what needs improvement and relentless in pursuit of excellence in product presentation. Passion for e-commerce and the products we sell (fitness equipment, home and outdoor goods, etc.). A genuine interest in how customers shop for these items and how to best communicate value to them through content will help drive creative and effective merchandising.
Industry: Tiếp thị trực tuyến , Thương mại điện tử , CNTT - Phần mềm

Company: De Heus LLC
Job Description: A. REPORT TO: Group Security Manager (CISO) B. JOB PURPOSE: The IT/OT & Cloud Security Solutions Architect will play a pivotal role in designing, ensuring implementation, and verifying robust security solutions across our IT, OT, and Cloud environments. Additionally, this role will encompass responsibilities for OT security, ensuring secure integration and segregation between IT systems and OT environments. This position demands a deep understanding of cybersecurity principles, architectural frameworks, and best practices. Furthermore, the role will actively participate in security-related projects as a Subject Matter Expert (SME), providing specialized knowledge and guidance to ensure project success. C. ACCOUNTABILITIES: 1. Define, Enforce, and Verify Develop and enforce standardized security standards and baselines across IT, OT, and Cloud environments. Ensure compliance with industry security standards and regulations. Ensure consistency in security practices through comprehensive documentation and adherence to established standards and baselines. Verify the implementation of security measures to ensure compliance with the defined standards and baselines by performing regular security assessments and audits. 2. Standardization Collaborate closely with the Cloud & Infra team, ensuring that security solutions are designed according to the established standards and baselines. Define security hardening measures for all IT, OT, and Cloud systems to mitigate vulnerabilities and reduce attack surfaces. Conduct regular security assessments and audits to ensure compliance with hardening guidelines. 3. Continuous Monitoring and SOC Integration Connect required log sources to the SOC for continuous monitoring. Ensure the proper application of SOC use cases to maintain situational awareness and proactive security posture. Perform firewall rule reviews and other security configurations to support advanced threat detection and mitigation. Provide periodic (and eventually realtime) operational outcome-driven security metrics, to be included in our security dashboard. 4. Segregation between IT & OT Design and implement network segmentation strategies to securely separate IT and OT environments. Ensure secure data exchange between IT and OT systems while preventing cyber threats from spreading across environments. 5. Security Architecture Develop a global security architecture and solutions that include IT, OT, and Cloud systems and solutions while ensuring efficient integration and operations in cooperation with the Cloud & Infra team. Lead efforts to standardize security practices across the organization, leveraging the latest technologies and methodologies. Stay up-to-date with the latest security systems, standards, authentication protocols, and products. 6. Subject Matter Expert (SME) in Security-Related Projects Participate in security-related projects as a Subject Matter Expert, providing specialized knowledge and guidance to ensure project success. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements, objectives, and deliverables. Provide expertise in risk assessment, mitigation strategies, and security solutions design. Ensure that security measures are appropriately integrated into project plans and execution. D. EXPECTED RESULTS: Standardized and compliant security measures are consistently defined, enforced, and verified across all IT, OT, and Cloud environments Security solutions are designed according to established standards and baselines, with effective hardening measures implemented across all systems All required log sources are integrated with the SOC, enabling proactive threat detection and the provision of actionable security metrics Secure network segmentation strategies are designed and implemented to prevent cyber threats from spreading between IT and OT environments. A global, integrated security architecture for IT, OT, and Cloud systems is developed, leveraging the latest technologies and ensuring efficient operations. Specialized security knowledge and guidance are provided to ensure successful project outcomes, risk mitigation, and integrated security measures
Job Requirements: Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Experience Minimum of 8 years of experience in cybersecurity, with a focus on IT, OT, and Cloud security architecture. Extensive knowledge of cybersecurity frameworks, including NIST and ISO27001. Understanding of network segmentation and segregation principles, particularly in IT environments. Proficiency in developing security standards and baselines for infrastructure, cloud, applications, and data. Proficiency in security hardening techniques and continuous monitoring tools. Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or CCSP are highly desirable. Understanding of OT systems is a plus, as a similar OT role will be created later. Competencies Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess complex security scenarios and develop effective solutions. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Language(s) Fluency in English, both speaking and writing, as communication with teams across our global organization is required. Other Requirements Full-time position based at any Global hub location, such as Asia or Africa. Occasional travel may be required for collaboration with global IT teams and participation in security conferences and workshops.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm , CNTT - Phần cứng / Mạng

Job Title: [HCM] Chuyên Viên Phân Tích Dữ Liệu Kế Toán
Company: Ahamove
Job Description: 1. Quản lý và tối ưu quy trình (40%) Theo dõi và phân tích dữ liệu từ hệ thống xử lý hóa đơn để phát hiện lỗi, điểm nghẽn và các tình huống ngoại lệ ảnh hưởng đến hiệu suất vận hành kế toán. Đề xuất cải tiến quy trình xử lý chứng từ dựa trên phân tích thực tế và phản hồi từ các bộ phận liên quan, nhằm chuẩn hóa thao tác và giảm phụ thuộc thủ công. Cập nhật tài liệu nghiệp vụ (SOP, checklist) và phối hợp đảm bảo quy trình mới được áp dụng đồng nhất, có thể kiểm soát và dễ truy xuất khi cần kiểm toán. 2. Tự động hóa quy trình (40%) Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để triển khai các công cụ tự động hóa xử lý chứng từ kế toán như thanh toán tự động, đối chiếu công nợ, hoá đơn. Thực hiện rà soát và điều chỉnh luồng xử lý nghiệp vụ kế toán nhằm chuẩn hoá quy trình, tăng mức độ tự động và giảm thao tác thủ công. Ghi nhận các lỗi phát sinh và phối hợp xử lý các trường hợp ngoại lệ trong quy trình thanh toán. Đóng vai trò trung gian nghiệp vụ để đảm bảo các thay đổi kỹ thuật phù hợp với chuẩn mực kế toán, kiểm soát nội bộ và tính pháp lý. 3. Kiểm soát tài chính (15%) Phối hợp với bộ phận FP&A và Procurement để xây dựng và kiểm soát ngân sách hiệu quả theo từng phòng ban/dự án. Theo dõi và báo cáo các chỉ số kiểm soát tài chính. 4. Các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên (5%)
Job Requirements: Bằng cử nhân kế toán hoặc tài chính Kiến thức về thương mại điện tử hoặc công ty vận chuyển sẽ là một lợi thế. Có 2 - 3 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương hoặc đảm nhận công việc kế toán công nợ. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng truy vấn SQL hoặc Python để trích xuất dữ liệu, trực quan hóa dữ liệu. Thành thạo Excel, Google Sheet, Google Slide. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với phần mềm hệ thống kế toán. Khả năng làm việc độc lập cũng như làm việc nhóm & quản lý nhiều nhiệm vụ. Kỹ năng giao tiếp và thuyết trình tốt. Chịu được áp lực và cường độ công việc cao. Sẵn sàng học hỏi và sẵn sàng thay đổi.
Industry: Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Job Title: Senior Integrated Risk Management Officer – Risk Strategy team – Integrated Risk Management Center - HN - TA133
Company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - VPBANK
Job Description: Position: Senior Integrated Risk Management Officer – Risk Strategy team – Integrated Risk Management Center Job description : 1. Risk Management Framework Development: Design, implement, periodically review and revise key components of the risk management framework, ensure alignment with SBV regulations and requirements from external parties: Risk management framework policy Risk Appetite Statement (RAS) and related framework Risk limit structures (e.g., RAS, Top-down limits) Stress testing methodology Governance structure and escalation/reporting mechanisms 2. Risk Council/Committee supports: Act as Secretary for internal risk councils and committees (e.g., RCO, CRC) - Prepare meeting materials and agendas; draft meeting minutes and resolutions; coordinate logistics (scheduling, interpretation, …); track and follow up on post-meeting action items 3. External Stakeholder Management: Serve as contact point from Risk Management Division for external-stakeholders-related tasks, including but not limited to periodical report, forecast, ad-hoc questionnaires, etc. 4. Internal Reporting & Risk Monitoring : Lead the preparation of internal risk reports such as: RAS & Top down compliance status report 5. System Management & Data Governance: Maintain and enhance risk-related systems; Collaborate with IT and related units to ensure systems meet governance and reporting needs. 6. Portfolio risk analysis: conduct research and analysis of change impact related to proposed risk management policies and processes, risk limit system to ensure the effectiveness of the Bank’s risk management framework 7. Others : Supervise and support junior team members in producing high-quality reports and deliverables; responsible for presenting individual and team’s workings towards team, team leader, Product Owner; perform other ad hoc task assigned by and report directly to team leader and Product Owner
Job Requirements: 1.Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Finance, Banking, Economics, Risk Management, or a related field; Professional certifications (FRM, CFA) are highly preferred. 2.Experience: Minimum 5 years of relevant experience in risk management, strategy, regulatory reporting or investor relations in banks or Big 4 consulting firms 3.Skills: Strong command of Excel, PowerPoint, and data tools (SQL, BI platforms). Excellent English and Vietnamese communication (both verbal and written). Proven ability to work independently and manage projects with cross-functional teams. Strong strategic thinking, analytical reasoning, and problem-solving skills. Benefits: Competitive salary and bonus package Staff loan with special interest rates Traing courses based on the job, Training framework/Learning RoadMap for each position Insurance in accordance with Labor laws + VPBank Care insurance for all employees. (insurance covered for family members for entitled employees); Annual leave (varied based on job grade) Travel allowance A dynamic and friendly working environment, full of great opportunities to develop your career and abundant interesting activities to join (Sports competitions, talent contests, teambuilding…) Working time: from Monday to Friday & 2 Saturday mornings/month
Industry: Ngân hàng , Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Tài chính / Đầu tư

Company: New Viet Dairy - Công Ty CP Đại Tân Việt
Job Description: Job Description The senior internal auditor is responsible for implementing an annual internal audit plan covering all departments/ processes of company based on assignment from IA Manager, including assessment on adequacy and effectiveness of internal control system, compliance with policies and procedures, reliability and integrity of information, safeguarding of assets… He or she also must proactively identify risks and recommend appropriate recommendations to management to mitigate risks effectively. 1. Perform internal audit engagements on annual audit plan Carry out annual audit plan and ad-hoc tasks according to assignment from IA manager. Perform preliminary survey, understanding on engagement client (risk assessment, relevant law requirements, current policy/ procedure,..) Prepare audit program, define audit scope and objectives with effective audit tests for each assigned audit engagement. Conduct audit tests following approved audit program, collect and make analysis data. Evaluation and perform testing of systems and controls to assess the adequacy and effectiveness of internal control, compliance with policies and procedures, reliability and integrity of information, safeguarding of assets, etc. Discuss with relevant Departments on identified issues/ areas for improvement and propose appropriate remedial actions. Prepare and submit draft-report, writing working paper in accordance with IA standard and regulation for Internal Audit Manager’s review in accordance with deadline. Follow-up on reported findings at appropriate intervals, obtain reply from related department and validate the implementation status of corrective actions. Coordinate with Operations Department to support, advise business units in establishing business processes; Perform J-Sox test as assigned by IA Manager, documents evidences in accordance with Group Guideline. 2. Other duties assigned by Internal Audit manager Assist Internal Audit Manager in preparation of annual risk assessment and internal audit plan. Assist Internal Audit Manager in attending special projects and unexpected tasks assigned by BOD, often undertaking specific elements of assignment with minimal supervision. Maintain relationship and work closely with external auditors, control owners and management to ensure communication of critical issues in a timely manner.
Job Requirements: Candidate Requirements University degree in Auditing, Accounting or Finance. CIA, ACCA is a plus Minimum 03 years experiences in Audit, controlling or process consulting field, exposure to FMCG/ F&B/ Retail is preffered. Good knowledge in risk assessment, internal control, consulting, data analysis. Good knowledge about IT (Microsoft office, power point, ERP…) Strong analytical and problem solving skill. Ability to build relationships with related departments. Excellent written and oral communication ability in English. Presentation skill. Time-management and organizational skills. Honest, objective, integrity, responsibility and professionalism. Seeking candidates who are eager to take on challenges and develop their careers in the field of internal auditing. Salary & Benefits: Competitive fixed salary. Lunch allowance: 50,000 VND/day from Monday to Friday (lunch at the company). Parking allowance: 300,000 VND/month. 13th-month salary bonus. Year-end performance bonus: 1- 2 months’ salary (based on performance evaluation). Full salary during 60-day probation period. Full salary-based social insurance, accident insurance during probation, and Bảo Việt health insurance after signing the labor contract. Annual leave: 17 – 19 days/year. Annual salary review. Employee engagement policies for NVD staff. Working hours: 8 AM – 5 PM (Monday to Friday), half-day on Saturdays. Work location: 145 Tôn Thất Đạm, P. Bến Nghé, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City.
Industry: Bán lẻ / Bán sỉ , Thực phẩm & Đồ uống , Kế toán / Kiểm toán

Job Title: GIÁM SÁT BẢO MẬT HỆ THỐNG_SECURITY SYSTEMS SUPERVISOR
Company: Công ty TNHH Cảng Quốc Tế Sài Gòn Việt Nam
Job Description: NHIỆM VỤ CHÍNH/ MAIN DUTIES: Chịu trách nhiệm đảm bảo an ninh thông tin, quản trị hạ tầng mạng và các hệ thống CNTT, hỗ trợ người dùng, và các công việc khác được giao bởi Trưởng phòng CNTT / Manage information security, manage networking system and infrastructure, support users, and process jobs as assigned by IT Manager. Quản trị an ninh mạng: Triển khai và quản lý các công cụ SIEM; ứng phó với các sự cố bảo mật bằng cấu hình tường lửa, hệ thống chống xâm nhập, và triển khai biện phảo bảo vệ thiết bị đầu cuối; quản lý danh tính và quản lý quyền truy cập của người dùng; thực hiện đánh giá rà soát lỗ hổng bảo mật và kịp thời khắc phục các phát hiện; đề xuất các cải tiến để cải thiện tình hình an ninh thông tin; đảm bảo tuân thủ các tiêu chuẩn và chính sách của Tập đoàn/ Cybersecurity administration: Implement and manage SIEM tools; respond to security incidents using firewall devicess, IDS/IPS, and endpoint protection; manage identity and access management; conduct vulnerability assessments and remediate the findings; recommend enhancements to improve security posture; ensure compliance with the Group’s standards and policies. Quản trị các hệ thống IT: Triển khai, cấu hình và bảo trì các hệ thống CNTT hiện hữu, ví dụ: Servers (Windows/Linux), các dịch vụ đám mây, sao lưu dữ liệu và phục hồi sau thảm họa để đảm bảo tính liên tục của hoạt động kinh doanh/ IT systems administration: Deploy, configure, and maintain the current IT systems, e.g., server instances (Windows/Linux), cloud services, data backup and disaster recovery for business continuity. Quản trị mạng và cơ sở hạ tầng: Cấu hình và tối ưu hóa các quy tắc tường lửa, truy cập mạng riêng ảo, và phân đoạn mạng để bảo mật; giám sát và khắc phục sự cố ảnh hưởng hiệu suất mạng, định tuyến và chính sách bảo mật; đảm bảo tính khả dụng cao và dự phòng cho cơ sở hạ tầng CNTT quan trọng/ Networking & infrastructure administration: Configure and optimize firewall rules, VPNs, and network segmentation for security; monitor and troubleshoot network performance, routing, and security policies; ensure high availability and redundancy for critical IT infrastructure.
Job Requirements: Trình độ học vấn: Cử nhân CNTT, Khoa học Máy tính, An ninh Thông tin, hoặc ngành có liên quan/ Education : Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, Cybersecurity, or a relevant field. Kinh nghiệm: Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm về bảo mật và quản trị hạ tầng hệ thống CNTT. Thành thạo các kỹ năng sau/ Experiences: Minimum 3 years of experience in administrating cybersecurity and IT infrastructure systems. Hands-on experience with: - Data backup and disaster recovery (Veeam, Veritas NetBackup) - Fortinet security & networking products administration (FortiGate firewall, Forti switch, etc.) - SIEM tools (Microsoft Sentinel, Splunk, LogRhythm, etc.) - Vulnerability scanning tools (Qualys, Fortify) - Azure Hybrid Cloud Administration (Azure Stack HCI, Azure Kubernetes Service) Experience and knowledge in the areas below is a significant advantage: - DevSecOps and container security - Knowledge of regulatory industry standards (NIST, CIS) - Scripting skills (PowerShell, Bash, Python) for automation Additional Mandatory Requirements: - Fluent in English (both written and verbal communication). - Flexibility to work beyond regular hours and maintain 24/7 phone availability for critical incident support.
Industry: CNTT - Phần mềm

Job Title: 120038 - [HN] Sales & Marketing Assistant Manager - Real Estate
Company: RGF HR Agent Vietnam Co., LTD
Welfare: ['Chế độ bảo hiểm', 'Du Lịch', 'Chế độ thưởng']
Job Description: Position: Sales & Marketing Assistant Manager - Real Estate Job Code: 120038 - Working location: Ba Dinh District, Hanoi - Monthly Salary: 27,000,000～32,500,000VND Responsibility 1. Campaign Monitoring & Performance Analysis Supervise all marketing campaigns implemented by partners (digital, branding, PR, events, etc.). Review campaign KPIs: impressions, CTR, CPC, CPL, engagement, lead quality, and conversion performance. Analyze campaign effectiveness across different channels and vendors; identify opportunities to optimize ROI. Consolidate reports and provide data-driven insights to the Team Leader for strategic decision-making. Ensure campaigns are aligned with brand strategy, project timeline, and messaging. 2. Budget Tracking & Cost Monitoring Track and record campaign budgets, spending per vendor/ category and activity. Identify budget discrepancies, and overspending risks, and recommend cost-saving measures. Maintain organized budget tracking reports for monthly and quarterly review. Support the Team Leader in preparing cost-performance summaries for leadership. 3. Creative Production Supervision Coordinate with partners to ensure timely production of: - Project brochures, sales kits, POSM, and event materials. - Project introduction videos, animation clips, and teaser campaigns. - Visuals: 3D renderings, lifestyle shoots, branding visuals. - Any OOH and advertisements. Review creative outputs to ensure consistency with brand guidelines and high-quality execution. Track content production timelines and facilitate feedback/approval processes across departments. Ensure all materials are version-controlled, archived, and accessible for use across sales and PR teams. 4. Cross-functional Collaboration Collaborate with internal teams (Sales, Design) to gather up-to-date project content. Align messaging across different campaign assets and ensure the brand tone is consistent. Assist the Team Leader in preparing strategic presentations and proposals for campaign optimization. Assist the Team Leader in supervising the Mock-up Units and working closely with related partners (technical, property management, decoration vendors, receptionist, security, housekeeping,...) to ensure the Mock-up Units are running smoothly.
Job Requirements: Requirements <Necessary Skill / Experience > ・Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Business Administration, or a related field. ・Language: English - Business Level ・Experience: - Minimum 3 years of experience in marketing campaign execution, performance analytics, or creative project management. - Experience working with external agencies, preferably in real estate, creative production, or advertising. ・Skills & Competencies: Solid understanding of digital marketing KPIs and reporting tools. Familiarity with budgeting and quotation analysis. Strong attention to detail with an aesthetic eye for branding and creative output. Excellent project management, time management, and cross-functional coordination skills. Proficient in Excel, PowerPoint, and tools like Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager. Strong communication skills – both verbal and written in English and Vietnamese. Will be based in the Hanoi Office, but business trips to Hai Phong (3-4 times per month). ・Personal Attributes: Proactive and self-motivated with strong ownership of assigned tasks. Able to multitask and manage deadlines under pressure. Analytical mindset with the ability to turn data into insights. Team player with a positive attitude and continuous improvement mindset. NOTICE: Only shortlisted candidates will be approached by RGF's consultant. Your resumes will be recorded in our system, and you will receive our Job Introduction Auto-email with suitable jobs in the coming time. Please check your email to get our vacant job. Thanks so much!
Industry: Tiếp thị / Marketing , Bán hàng / Kinh doanh , Bất động sản

Job Title: Senior Integrated Risk Management Officer – Risk Strategy team – Integrated Risk Management Center - HN - TA133
Company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Việt Nam Thịnh Vượng - VPBANK
Job Description: Position: Senior Integrated Risk Management Officer – Risk Strategy team – Integrated Risk Management Center Job description : 1. Risk Management Framework Development: Design, implement, periodically review and revise key components of the risk management framework, ensure alignment with SBV regulations and requirements from external parties: Risk management framework policy Risk Appetite Statement (RAS) and related framework Risk limit structures (e.g., RAS, Top-down limits) Stress testing methodology Governance structure and escalation/reporting mechanisms 2. Risk Council/Committee supports: Act as Secretary for internal risk councils and committees (e.g., RCO, CRC) - Prepare meeting materials and agendas; draft meeting minutes and resolutions; coordinate logistics (scheduling, interpretation, …); track and follow up on post-meeting action items 3. External Stakeholder Management: Serve as contact point from Risk Management Division for external-stakeholders-related tasks, including but not limited to periodical report, forecast, ad-hoc questionnaires, etc. 4. Internal Reporting & Risk Monitoring : Lead the preparation of internal risk reports such as: RAS & Top down compliance status report 5. System Management & Data Governance: Maintain and enhance risk-related systems; Collaborate with IT and related units to ensure systems meet governance and reporting needs. 6. Portfolio risk analysis: conduct research and analysis of change impact related to proposed risk management policies and processes, risk limit system to ensure the effectiveness of the Bank’s risk management framework 7. Others : Supervise and support junior team members in producing high-quality reports and deliverables; responsible for presenting individual and team’s workings towards team, team leader, Product Owner; perform other ad hoc task assigned by and report directly to team leader and Product Owner
Job Requirements: 1.Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Finance, Banking, Economics, Risk Management, or a related field; Professional certifications (FRM, CFA) are highly preferred. 2.Experience: Minimum 5 years of relevant experience in risk management, strategy, regulatory reporting or investor relations in banks or Big 4 consulting firms 3.Skills: Strong command of Excel, PowerPoint, and data tools (SQL, BI platforms). Excellent English and Vietnamese communication (both verbal and written). Proven ability to work independently and manage projects with cross-functional teams. Strong strategic thinking, analytical reasoning, and problem-solving skills. Benefits: Competitive salary and bonus package Staff loan with special interest rates Traing courses based on the job, Training framework/Learning RoadMap for each position Insurance in accordance with Labor laws + VPBank Care insurance for all employees. (insurance covered for family members for entitled employees); Annual leave (varied based on job grade) Travel allowance A dynamic and friendly working environment, full of great opportunities to develop your career and abundant interesting activities to join (Sports competitions, talent contests, teambuilding…) Working time: from Monday to Friday & 2 Saturday mornings/month
Industry: Ngân hàng , Kế toán / Kiểm toán , Tài chính / Đầu tư
